GE09ram_04_u:1: 4.001.001a sa tāṃ puṣkariṇīṃ gatvā padmotpalajhaṣākulām 4.001.001c rāmaḥ saumitrisahito
GE09ram_04_u:2: 4.001.002a tasya dṛṣṭvaiva tāṃ harṣād indriyāṇi cakampire
GE09ram_04_u:3: 4.001.002c sa kāmavaśam āpannaḥ saumitrim idam abravīt
GE09ram_04_u:4: 4.001.003a saumitre paśya pampāyāḥ kānanaṃ śubhadarśanam 4.001.003c yatra rājanti śailābhā drumāḥ saśikharā iva
GE09ram_04_u:5: 4.001.004a māṃ tu śokābhisaṃtaptam ādhayaḥ pīḍayanti vai
GE09ram_04_u:6: 4.001.004c bharatasya ca duḥkhena vaidehyā haraṇena ca
GE09ram_04_u:7: 4.001.005a adhikaṃ pravibhāty etan nīlapītaṃ tu śādvalam
GE09ram_04_u:8: 4.001.005c drumāṇāṃ vividhaiḥ puṣpaiḥ paristomair ivārpitam 4.001.006a sukhānilo 'yaṃ saumitre kālaḥ pracuramanmathaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:10: 4.001.007a paśya rūpāṇi saumitre vanānāṃ puṣpaśālinām 4.001.007c sṛjatāṃ puṣpavarṣāṇi varṣaṃ toyamucām iva 4.001.008a prastareṣu ca ramyeṣu vividhāḥ kānanadrumāḥ 4.001.008c vāyuvegapracalitāḥ puṣpair avakiranti gām
GE09ram_04_u:11: 4.001.009a mārutaḥ sukhaṃ saṃsparśe vāti candanaśītalaḥ 4.001.009c ṣaṭpadair anukūjadbhir vaneṣu madhugandhiṣu
GE09ram_04_u:14: 4.001.011a puṣpitāgrāṃś ca paśyemān karṇikārān samantataḥ 4.001.011c hāṭakapratisaṃchannān narān pītāmbarān iva
GE09ram_04_u:17: 4.001.013a māṃ hi śokasamākrāntaṃ saṃtāpayati manmathaḥ 4.001.013c hṛṣṭaḥ pravadamānaś ca samāhvayati kokilaḥ 4.001.014a eṣa dātyūhako hṛṣṭo ramye māṃ vananirjhare
GE09ram_04_u:21: 4.001.016a māṃ hi sā mṛgaśāvākṣī cintāśokabalātkṛtam 4.001.016c saṃtāpayati saumitre krūraś
GE09ram_04_u:24: 4.001.018a paśya lakṣṇama nṛtyantaṃ mayūram upanṛtyati 4.001.018c śikhinī manmathārtaiṣā bhartāraṃ girisānuṣu
GE09ram_04_u:25: 4.001.019a mayūrasya vane nūnaṃ rakṣasā na hṛtā priyā
GE09ram_04_u:26: 4.001.019c mama tv ayaṃ vinā vāsaḥ puṣpamāse suduḥsahaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:27: 4.001.020a paśya lakṣmaṇa puṣpāṇi niṣphalāni bhavanti me
GE09ram_04_u:29: 4.001.021a vadanti rāvaṃ muditāḥ śakunāḥ saṃghaśaḥ kalam
GE09ram_04_u:31: 4.001.022a nūnaṃ paravaśā sītā sāpi śocaty ahaṃ yathā
GE09ram_04_u:32: 4.001.022c śyāmā padmapalāśākṣī mṛdubhāṣā ca me priyā
GE09ram_04_u:33: 4.001.023a eṣa puṣpavaho vāyuḥ sukhasparśo himāvahaḥ 4.001.023c tāṃ vicintayataḥ kāntāṃ pāvakapratimo mama 4.001.024a tāṃ vinātha vihaṃgo 'sau pakṣī praṇaditas tadā
GE09ram_04_u:35: 4.001.025a eṣa vai tatra vaidehyā vihagaḥ pratihārakaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:36: 4.001.025c pakṣī māṃ tu viśālākṣyāḥ samīpam upaneṣyati
GE09ram_04_u:37: 4.001.026a paśya lakṣmaṇa saṃnādaṃ vane madavivardhanam 4.001.026c puṣpitāgreṣu vṛkṣeṣu dvijānām upakūjatām
GE09ram_04_u:38: 4.001.027a saumitre paśya pampāyāś citrāsu vanarājiṣu 4.001.027c nalināni prakāśante jale
GE09ram_04_u:43: 4.001.030a padmakośapalāśāni draṣṭuṃ dṛṣṭir hi manyate 4.001.030c sītāyā netrakośābhyāṃ sadṛśānīti lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_04_u:44: 4.001.031a padmakesarasaṃsṛṣṭo vṛkṣāntaraviniḥsṛtaḥ 4.001.031c niḥśvāsa iva sītāyā vāti vāyur manoharaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:45: 4.001.032a saumitre paśya pampāyā dakṣiṇe girisānuni 4.001.032c puṣpitāṃ karṇikārasya yaṣṭiṃ
GE09ram_04_u:48: 4.001.034a giriprasthās tu saumitre sarvataḥ saṃprapuṣpitaiḥ 4.001.034c niṣpatraiḥ sarvato ramyaiḥ pradīpā iva kuṃśukaiḥ
GE09ram_04_u:51: 4.001.036a ketakyaḥ sinduvārāś ca vāsantyaś ca supuṣpitāḥ
GE09ram_04_u:52: 4.001.036c mādhavyo gandhapūrṇāś ca kundagulmāś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:53: 4.001.037a ciribilvā madhūkāś ca vañjulā bakulās tathā
GE09ram_04_u:54: 4.001.037c campakās tilakāś caiva nāgavṛkṣāś ca puṣpitāḥ
GE09ram_04_u:55: 4.001.038a nīpāś ca varaṇāś caiva kharjūrāś ca supuṣpitāḥ
GE09ram_04_u:56: 4.001.038c aṅkolāś ca kuraṇṭāś ca cūrṇakāḥ pāribhadrakāḥ
GE09ram_04_u:57: 4.001.039a cūtāḥ pāṭalayaś caiva kovidārāś ca puṣpitāḥ
GE09ram_04_u:59: 4.001.040a ketakoddālakāś caiva śirīṣāḥ śiṃśapā dhavāḥ 4.001.040c śālmalyaḥ kiṃśukāś caiva raktāḥ kurabakās tathā
GE09ram_04_u:60: 4.001.040e tiniśā nakta mālāś ca candanāḥ syandanās tathā
GE09ram_04_u:61: 4.001.041a vividhā vividhaiḥ puṣpais tair eva nagasānuṣu
GE09ram_04_u:62: 4.001.041c vikīrṇaiḥ pītaraktābhāḥ saumitre prastarāḥ kṛtāḥ 4.001.042a himānte paśya saumitre vṛkṣāṇāṃ puṣpasaṃbhavam 4.001.042c puṣpamāse hi taravaḥ saṃgharṣād iva puṣpitāḥ
GE09ram_04_u:63: 4.001.043a paśya śītajalāṃ cemāṃ saumitre puṣkarāyutām 4.001.043c cakravākānucaritāṃ kāraṇḍavaniṣevitām 4.001.043e plavaiḥ krauñcaiś ca saṃpūrṇāṃ varāhamṛgasevitām 4.001.044a adhikaṃ śobhate pampāvikūjadbhir vihaṃgamaiḥ
GE09ram_04_u:64: 4.001.045a dīpayantīva me kāmaṃ vividhā muditā dvijāḥ
GE09ram_04_u:65: 4.001.045c śyāmāṃ candramukhīṃ smṛtvā priyāṃ padmanibhekṣaṇām 4.001.046a paya sānuṣu citreṣu mṛgībhiḥ sahitān mṛgān
GE09ram_04_u:66: 4.001.046c māṃ punar mṛgaśāvākṣyā vaidehyā virahīkṛtam 4.001.047a evaṃ sa vilapaṃs tatra śokopahatacetanaḥ 4.001.047c avekṣata śivāṃ pampāṃ ramyavārivahāṃ śubhām 4.001.048a nirīkṣamāṇaḥ sahasā mahātmā; sarvaṃ vanaṃ nirjharakandaraṃ ca
GE09ram_04_u:67: 4.001.048c udvignacetāḥ saha lakṣmaṇena; vicārya duḥkhopahataḥ pratasthe
GE09ram_04_u:68: 4.001.049a tāv ṛṣyamūkaṃ sahitau prayātau; sugrīvaśākhāmṛgasevitaṃ tam 4.001.049c trastās tu dṛṣṭvā harayo babhūvur; mahaujasau rāghavalakṣmaṇau tau
GE09ram_04_u:69: 4.002.001a tau tu dṛṣṭvā mahātmānau bhrātarau rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_04_u:72: 4.002.002c na vyatiṣṭhata kasmiṃś cid deśe vānarapuṃgavaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:73: 4.002.003a naiva cakre manaḥ sthāne vīkṣamāṇo mahābalau
GE09ram_04_u:74: 4.002.003c kapeḥ paramabhītasya cittaṃ vyavasasāda ha 4.002.004a cintayitvā sa dharmātmā vimṛśya gurulāghavam 4.002.004c sugrīvaḥ paramodvignaḥ sarvair anucaraiḥ saha 4.002.005a tataḥ sa sacivebhyas tu sugrīvaḥ plavagādhipaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:75: 4.002.005c śaśaṃsa paramodvignaḥ paśyaṃs tau rāmalakṣmaṇau 4.002.006a etau vanam idaṃ durgaṃ vālipraṇihitau dhruvam
GE09ram_04_u:78: 4.002.007c jagmur giritaṭāt tasmād anyac chikharam uttamam
GE09ram_04_u:79: 4.002.008a te kṣipram abhigamyātha yūthapā yūthaparṣabham 4.002.008c harayo vānaraśreṣṭhaṃ
GE09ram_04_u:80: 4.002.009a ekam ekāyanagatāḥ plavamānā girer girim 4.002.009c prakampayanto vegena girīṇāṃ śikharāṇi ca 4.002.010a tataḥ śākhāmṛgāḥ sarve plavamānā mahābalāḥ 4.002.010c babhañjuś ca nagāṃs tatra puṣpitān durgasaṃśritān
GE09ram_04_u:81: 4.002.011a āplavanto harivarāḥ sarvatas taṃ mahāgirim 4.002.011c mṛgamārjāraśārdūlāṃs trāsayanto yayus tadā
GE09ram_04_u:83: 4.002.012c saṃgamya kapimukhyena sarve prāñjalayaḥ sthitāḥ 4.002.013a tatas taṃ bhayasaṃtrastaṃ
GE09ram_04_u:84: 4.002.013c uvāca hanumān vākyaṃ sugrīvaṃ vākyakovidaḥ 4.002.014a yasmād udvignacetās tvaṃ pradruto haripuṃgava 4.002.014c taṃ krūradarśanaṃ krūraṃ neha paśyāmi vālinam
GE09ram_04_u:85: 4.002.015a yasmāt tava bhayaṃ saumya pūrvajāt pāpakarmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:86: 4.002.015c sa neha vālī duṣṭātmā na te paśyāmy ahaṃ bhayam
GE09ram_04_u:87: 4.002.016a aho śākhāmṛgatvaṃ te vyaktam eva plavaṃgama
GE09ram_04_u:88: 4.002.016c laghucittatayātmānaṃ na sthāpayasi yo matau 4.002.017a buddhivijñānasaṃpanna iṅgitaiḥ sarvam ācara
GE09ram_04_u:89: 4.002.017c na hy abuddhiṃ gato rājā sarvabhūtāni śāsti hi 4.002.018a sugrīvas tu śubhaṃ vākyaṃ śrutvā sarvaṃ hanūmataḥ
GE09ram_04_u:90: 4.002.018c tataḥ śubhataraṃ vākyaṃ hanūmantam uvāca ha
GE09ram_04_u:92: 4.002.019c kasya na syād bhayaṃ dṛṣṭvā etau surasutopamau
GE09ram_04_u:94: 4.002.020c rājāno bahumitrāś ca viśvāso nātra hi kṣamaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:95: 4.002.021a arayaś ca manuṣyeṇa vijñeyāś channacāriṇaḥ 4.002.021c viśvastānām aviśvastāś chidreṣu praharanti hi 4.002.022a kṛtyeṣu vālī medhāvī rājāno bahudarśanāḥ 4.002.022c bhavanti parahantāras te jñeyāḥ prākṛtair naraiḥ
GE09ram_04_u:96: 4.002.023a tau tvayā prākṛtenaiva gatvā jñeyau plavaṃgama
GE09ram_04_u:97: 4.002.023c śaṅkitānāṃ prakāraiś ca rūpavyābhāṣaṇena ca 4.002.024a lakṣayasva tayor bhāvaṃ prahṛṣṭamanasau yadi 4.002.024c viśvāsayan praśaṃsābhir iṅgitaiś ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:98: 4.002.025a mamaivābhimukhaṃ sthitvā pṛccha tvaṃ haripuṃgava 4.002.025c prayojanaṃ praveśasya vanasyāsya dhanurdharau
GE09ram_04_u:99: 4.002.026a śuddhātmānau yadi tv etau jānīhi tvaṃ plavaṃgama
GE09ram_04_u:100: 4.002.026c vyābhāṣitair vā rūpair vā vijñeyā duṣṭatānayoḥ
GE09ram_04_u:101: 4.002.027a ity evaṃ kapirājena saṃdiṣṭo mārutātmajaḥ 4.002.027c cakāra gamane buddhiṃ yatra tau rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_04_u:102: 4.002.028a tatheti saṃpūjya vacas tu tasya; kapeḥ subhītasya durāsadasya
GE09ram_04_u:103: 4.002.028c mahānubhāvo hanumān yayau tadā; sa yatra rāmo 'tibalaś ca lakṣmaṇaḥ 4.003.001a vaco vijñāya hanumān sugrīvasya mahātmanaḥ 4.003.001c parvatād ṛśyamūkāt tu pupluve yatra rāghavau
GE09ram_04_u:104: 4.003.002a sa tatra gatvā hanumān balavān vānarottamaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:105: 4.003.002c upacakrāma tau vāgbhir mṛdvībhiḥ satyavikramaḥ 4.003.003a svakaṃ rūpaṃ parityajya bhikṣurūpeṇa vānaraḥ 4.003.003c ābabhāṣe ca tau vīrau yathāvat praśaśaṃsa ca
GE09ram_04_u:107: 4.003.004c deśaṃ katham imaṃ prāptau bhavantau varavarṇinau
GE09ram_04_u:108: 4.003.005a trāsayantau mṛgagaṇān anyāṃś ca vanacāriṇaḥ 4.003.005c pampātīraruhān vṛkṣān vīkṣamāṇau samantataḥ
GE09ram_04_u:109: 4.003.006a imāṃ nadīṃ śubhajalāṃ śobhayantau tarasvinau 4.003.006c dhairyavantau suvarṇābhau kau yuvāṃ cīravāsasau 4.003.007a siṃhaviprekṣitau vīrau siṃhātibalavikramau
GE09ram_04_u:110: 4.003.007c śakracāpanibhe cāpe pragṛhya vipulair bhujaiḥ 4.003.008a śrīmantau rūpasaṃpannau
GE09ram_04_u:112: 4.003.009a prabhayā parvatendro 'yaṃ yuvayor avabhāsitaḥ 4.003.009c rājyārhāv amaraprakhyau kathaṃ deśam ihāgatau 4.003.010a padmapatrekṣaṇau vīrau jaṭāmaṇḍaladhāriṇau
GE09ram_04_u:116: 4.003.012a siṃhaskandhau mahāsattvau samadāv iva govṛṣau 4.003.012c āyatāś ca suvṛttāś ca bāhavaḥ parighottamāḥ
GE09ram_04_u:117: 4.003.012e sarvabhūṣaṇabhūṣārhāḥ kim arthaṃ na vibhūṣitaḥ 4.003.013a ubhau yogyāv ahaṃ manye rakṣituṃ pṛthivīm imām
GE09ram_04_u:119: 4.003.014a ime ca dhanuṣī citre ślakṣṇe citrānulepane
GE09ram_04_u:121: 4.003.015a saṃpūrṇā niśitair bāṇair tūṇāś ca śubhadarśanāḥ
GE09ram_04_u:122: 4.003.015c jīvitāntakarair ghorair jvaladbhir iva pannagaiḥ 4.003.016a mahāpramāṇau vipulau
GE09ram_04_u:123: 4.003.016c khaḍgāv etau virājete nirmuktabhujagāv iva 4.003.017a evaṃ māṃ paribhāṣantaṃ kasmād vai nābhibhāṣathaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:124: 4.003.018a sugrīvo nāma dharmātmā kaś cid vānarayūthapaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:125: 4.003.018c vīro vinikṛto bhrātrā jagad bhramati duḥkhitaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:127: 4.003.019c rājñā vānaramukhyānāṃ hanumān nāma vānaraḥ 4.003.020a yuvābhyāṃ saha dharmātmā sugrīvaḥ sakhyam icchati
GE09ram_04_u:128: 4.003.020c tasya māṃ sacivaṃ vittaṃ vānaraṃ pavanātmajam
GE09ram_04_u:129: 4.003.021a bhikṣurūpapraticchannaṃ sugrīvapriyakāmyayā 4.003.021c ṛśyamūkād iha prāptaṃ kāmagaṃ kāmarūpiṇam 4.003.022a evam uktvā tu hanumāṃs tau vīrau rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_04_u:130: 4.003.022c vākyajñau vākyakuśalaḥ punar novāca kiṃ cana
GE09ram_04_u:131: 4.003.023a etac chrutvā vacas tasya rāmo lakṣmaṇam abravīt
GE09ram_04_u:132: 4.003.023c prahṛṣṭavadanaḥ śrīmān bhrātaraṃ pārśvataḥ sthitam 4.003.024a sacivo 'yaṃ kapīndrasya sugrīvasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:133: 4.003.024c tam eva kāṅkṣamāṇasya mamāntikam upāgataḥ 4.003.025a tam abhyabhāṣa saumitre sugrīvasacivaṃ kapim 4.003.025c vākyajñaṃ madhurair vākyaiḥ snehayuktam ariṃdamam 4.004.001a tataḥ prahṛṣṭo hanumān kṛtyavān iti tad vacaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:134: 4.004.001c śrutvā madhurasaṃbhāṣaṃ sugrīvaṃ manasā gataḥ 4.004.002a bhavyo rājyāgamas tasya sugrīvasya mahātmanaḥ 4.004.002c yad ayaṃ kṛtyavān prāptaḥ kṛtyaṃ caitad upāgatam
GE09ram_04_u:136: 4.004.003c pratyuvāca tato vākyaṃ rāmaṃ vākyaviśāradaḥ 4.004.004a kimarthaṃ tvaṃ vanaṃ ghoraṃ pampākānanamaṇḍitam 4.004.004c āgataḥ sānujo durgaṃ nānāvyālamṛgāyutam
GE09ram_04_u:137: 4.004.005a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā lakṣmaṇo rāmacoditaḥ 4.004.005c ācacakṣe mahātmānaṃ rāmaṃ daśarathātmajam
GE09ram_04_u:138: 4.004.006a rājā daśaratho nāma dyutimān dharmavatsalaḥ 4.004.006c tasyāyaṃ pūrvajaḥ putro rāmo nāma janaiḥ śrutaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:141: 4.004.008a rājyād bhraṣṭo vane vastuṃ mayā sārdham ihāgataḥ
GE09ram_04_u:142: 4.004.008c bhāryayā ca mahātejāḥ sītayānugato vaśī 4.004.008e dinakṣaye mahātejāḥ prabhayeva
GE09ram_04_u:143: 4.004.009a aham asyāvaro bhrātā guṇair dāsyam upāgataḥ
GE09ram_04_u:144: 4.004.009c kṛtajñasya bahujñasya lakṣmaṇo nāma nāmataḥ 4.004.010a sukhārhasya mahārhasya
GE09ram_04_u:147: 4.004.011c tac ca na jñāyate rakṣaḥ patnī yenāsya sā hṛtā
GE09ram_04_u:148: 4.004.012a danur nāma śriyaḥ putraḥ śāpād rākṣasatāṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_04_u:149: 4.004.012c ākhyātas tena sugrīvaḥ samartho vānarādhipaḥ 4.004.013a sa jñāsyati mahāvīryas tava bhāryāpahāriṇam 4.004.013c evam uktvā danuḥ svargaṃ bhrājamāno gataḥ sukham
GE09ram_04_u:150: 4.004.014a etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ yāthātathyena pṛcchataḥ
GE09ram_04_u:151: 4.004.014c ahaṃ caiva hi rāmaś ca sugrīvaṃ śaraṇaṃ gatau 4.004.015a eṣa dattvā ca vittāni prāpya cānuttamaṃ yaśaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:152: 4.004.015c lokanāthaḥ purā bhūtvā sugrīvaṃ nātham icchati
GE09ram_04_u:153: 4.004.016a śokābhibhūte rāme tu śokārte śaraṇaṃ gate
GE09ram_04_u:154: 4.004.016c kartum arhati sugrīvaḥ prasādaṃ saha yūthapaiḥ
GE09ram_04_u:155: 4.004.017a evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ saumitriṃ karuṇaṃ sāśrupātanam 4.004.017c hanūmān pratyuvācedaṃ vākyaṃ vākyaviśāradaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:157: 4.004.018c draṣṭavyā vānarendreṇa diṣṭyā darśanam āgatāḥ 4.004.019a sa hi rājyāc ca vibhraṣṭaḥ kṛtavairaś ca vālinā 4.004.019c hṛtadāro vane trasto bhrātrā vinikṛto bhṛśam
GE09ram_04_u:158: 4.004.020a kariṣyati sa sāhāyyaṃ yuvayor bhāskarātmajaḥ 4.004.020c sugrīvaḥ saha cāsmābhiḥ sītāyāḥ parimārgaṇe 4.004.021a ity evam uktvā hanumāñ ślakṣṇaṃ madhurayā girā
GE09ram_04_u:160: 4.004.022a evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ dharmātmā hanūmantaṃ sa lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:161: 4.004.022c pratipūjya yathānyāyam idaṃ provāca rāghavam 4.004.023a kapiḥ kathayate hṛṣṭo yathāyaṃ mārutātmajaḥ 4.004.023c kṛtyavān so 'pi saṃprāptaḥ kṛtakṛtyo 'si rāghava
GE09ram_04_u:162: 4.004.024a prasannamukhavarṇaś ca vyaktaṃ hṛṣṭaś ca bhāṣate
GE09ram_04_u:163: 4.004.024c nānṛtaṃ vakṣyate vīro hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ 4.004.025a tataḥ sa tu mahāprājño hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:164: 4.004.025c jagāmādāya tau vīrau harirājāya rāghavau 4.004.026a sa tu vipula yaśāḥ kapipravīraḥ; pavanasutaḥ kṛtakṛtyavat prahṛṣṭaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:165: 4.004.026c girivaram uruvikramaḥ prayātaḥ; sa śubhamatiḥ saha
GE09ram_04_u:167: 4.005.001a ṛśyamūkāt tu hanumān gatvā taṃ malayaṃ giram
GE09ram_04_u:168: 4.005.001c ācacakṣe tadā vīrau kapirājāya rāghavau 4.005.002a ayaṃ rāmo mahāprājñaḥ saṃprāpto dṛḍhavikramaḥ 4.005.002c lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā rāmo 'yaṃ satyavikramaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:169: 4.005.003a ikṣvākūṇāṃ kule jāto rāmo daśarathātmajaḥ 4.005.003c dharme nigaditaś caiva pitur nirdeśapālakaḥ 4.005.004a tasyāsya vasato 'raṇye niyatasya mahātmanaḥ 4.005.004c rakṣasāpahṛtā bhāryā sa tvāṃ śaraṇam āgataḥ
GE09ram_04_u:171: 4.005.005c dakṣiṇāś ca tathotsṛṣṭā gāvaḥ śatasahasraśaḥ 4.005.006a tapasā satyavākyena vasudhā yena pālitā 4.005.006c strīhetos tasya putro 'yaṃ rāmas tvāṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_04_u:172: 4.005.007a bhavatā sakhyakāmau tau bhrātarau rāmalakṣmaṇau 4.005.007c pratigṛhyārcayasvemau pūjanīyatamāv ubhau
GE09ram_04_u:173: 4.005.008a śrutvā hanumato vākyaṃ sugrīvo hṛṣṭamānasaḥ 4.005.008c bhayaṃ sa rāghavād ghoraṃ prajahau vigatajvaraḥ
GE09ram_04_u:174: 4.005.009a sa kṛtvā mānuṣaṃ rūpaṃ sugrīvaḥ plavagādhipaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:175: 4.005.009c darśanīyatamo bhūtvā prītyā provāca rāghavam 4.005.010a bhavān dharmavinītaś ca vikrāntaḥ sarvavatsalaḥ 4.005.010c ākhyātā vāyuputreṇa tattvato me bhavadguṇāḥ 4.005.011a tan mamaivaiṣa satkāro lābhaś caivottamaḥ prabho
GE09ram_04_u:176: 4.005.011c yat tvam icchasi sauhārdaṃ vānareṇa mayā saha
GE09ram_04_u:177: 4.005.012a rocate yadi vā sakhyaṃ bāhur eṣa prasāritaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:178: 4.005.012c gṛhyatāṃ pāṇinā pāṇir maryādā vadhyatāṃ dhruvā
GE09ram_04_u:179: 4.005.013a etat tu vacanaṃ śrutvā sugrīvasya subhāṣitam
GE09ram_04_u:180: 4.005.013c saṃprahṛṣṭamanā hastaṃ pīḍayām āsa pāṇinā 4.005.013e hṛdyaṃ sauhṛdam ālambya paryaṣvajata pīḍitam 4.005.014a tato hanūmān saṃtyajya bhikṣurūpam ariṃdamaḥ 4.005.014c kāṣṭhayoḥ svena rūpeṇa janayām āsa pāvakam
GE09ram_04_u:181: 4.005.015a dīpyamānaṃ tato vahniṃ puṣpair abhyarcya satkṛtam
GE09ram_04_u:182: 4.005.015c tayor madhye tu suprīto nidadhe susamāhitaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:183: 4.005.016a tato 'gniṃ dīpyamānaṃ tau cakratuś ca pradakṣiṇam 4.005.016c sugrīvo rāghavaś caiva vayasyatvam upāgatau 4.005.017a tataḥ suprīta manasau tāv ubhau harirāghavau
GE09ram_04_u:184: 4.005.017c anyonyam abhivīkṣantau na tṛptim upajagmatuḥ 4.005.018a tataḥ sarvārthavidvāṃsaṃ rāmaṃ daśarathātmajam
GE09ram_04_u:185: 4.005.018c sugrīvaḥ prāha tejasvī vākyam ekamanās tadā
GE09ram_04_u:186: 4.006.001a ayam ākhyāti me rāma sacivo mantrisattamaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:187: 4.006.001c hanumān yannimittaṃ tvaṃ nirjanaṃ vanam āgataḥ
GE09ram_04_u:188: 4.006.002a lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā vasataś ca vane tava
GE09ram_04_u:190: 4.006.003a tvayā viyuktā rudatī lakṣmaṇena ca dhīmatā
GE09ram_04_u:191: 4.006.003c antaraṃ prepsunā tena hatvā gṛdhraṃ jaṭāyuṣam
GE09ram_04_u:192: 4.006.004a bhāryāviyogajaṃ duḥkhaṃ nacirāt tvaṃ vimokṣyase 4.006.004c ahaṃ tām ānayiṣyāmi naṣṭāṃ vedaśrutiṃ yathā
GE09ram_04_u:193: 4.006.005a rasātale vā vartantīṃ vartantīṃ vā nabhastale
GE09ram_04_u:194: 4.006.005c aham ānīya dāsyāmi tava bhāryām ariṃdama
GE09ram_04_u:195: 4.006.006a idaṃ tathyaṃ mama vacas tvam avehi ca rāghava 4.006.006c tyaja śokaṃ mahābāho tāṃ kāntām ānayāmi te
GE09ram_04_u:196: 4.006.007a anumānāt tu jānāmi maithilī sā na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:197: 4.006.007c hriyamāṇā mayā dṛṣṭā rakṣasā krūrakarmaṇā 4.006.008a krośantī rāma rāmeti lakṣmaṇeti ca visvaram
GE09ram_04_u:199: 4.006.009a ātmanā pañcamaṃ māṃ hi dṛṣṭvā śailataṭe sthitam
GE09ram_04_u:200: 4.006.009c uttarīyaṃ tayā tyaktaṃ śubhāny ābharaṇāni ca
GE09ram_04_u:201: 4.006.010a tāny asmābhir gṛhītāni nihitāni ca rāghava
GE09ram_04_u:202: 4.006.010c ānayiṣyāmy ahaṃ tāni pratyabhijñātum arhasi 4.006.011a tam abravīt tato rāmaḥ sugrīvaṃ priyavādinam
GE09ram_04_u:203: 4.006.011c ānayasva sakhe śīghraṃ kimarthaṃ pravilambase 4.006.012a evam uktas tu sugrīvaḥ śailasya gahanāṃ guhām
GE09ram_04_u:205: 4.006.013a uttarīyaṃ gṛhītvā tu śubhāny ābharaṇāni ca
GE09ram_04_u:206: 4.006.013c idaṃ paśyeti rāmāya darśayām āsa vānaraḥ
GE09ram_04_u:207: 4.006.014a tato gṛhītvā tadvāsaḥ śubhāny ābharaṇāni ca
GE09ram_04_u:209: 4.006.015a sītāsnehapravṛttena sa tu bāṣpeṇa dūṣitaḥ 4.006.015c hā priyeti rudan dhairyam utsṛjya nyapatat kṣitau
GE09ram_04_u:210: 4.006.016a hṛdi kṛtvā sa bahuśas tam alaṃkāram uttamam
GE09ram_04_u:211: 4.006.016c niśaśvāsa bhṛśaṃ sarpo bilastha iva roṣitaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:212: 4.006.017a avicchinnāśruvegas tu saumitriṃ vīkṣya pārśvataḥ 4.006.017c paridevayituṃ dīnaṃ rāmaḥ samupacakrame
GE09ram_04_u:213: 4.006.018a paśya lakṣmaṇa vaidehyā saṃtyaktaṃ hriyamāṇayā 4.006.018c uttarīyam idaṃ bhūmau śarīrād bhūṣaṇāni ca
GE09ram_04_u:214: 4.006.019a śādvalinyāṃ dhruvaṃ bhūmyāṃ sītayā hriyamāṇayā 4.006.019c utsṛṣṭaṃ bhūṣaṇam idaṃ tathārūpaṃ hi dṛśyate
GE09ram_04_u:215: 4.006.020a brūhi sugrīva kaṃ deśaṃ hriyantī lakṣitā tvayā
GE09ram_04_u:216: 4.006.020c rakṣasā raudrarūpeṇa mama prāṇasamā priyā 4.006.021a kva vā vasati tad rakṣo mahad vyasanadaṃ mama 4.006.021c yannimittam ahaṃ sarvān nāśayiṣyāmi rākṣasān 4.006.022a haratā maithilīṃ yena māṃ ca roṣayatā bhṛśam
GE09ram_04_u:218: 4.006.023a mama dayitatamā hṛtā vanād; rajanicareṇa vimathya yena sā
GE09ram_04_u:219: 4.006.023c kathaya mama ripuṃ tam adya vai; pravagapate yamasaṃnidhiṃ nayāmi
GE09ram_04_u:220: 4.007.001a evam uktas tu sugrīvo rāmeṇārtena vānaraḥ
GE09ram_04_u:221: 4.007.001c abravīt prāñjalir vākyaṃ sabāṣpaṃ bāṣpagadgadaḥ 4.007.002a na jāne nilayaṃ tasya sarvathā pāparakṣasaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:222: 4.007.002c sāmarthyaṃ vikramaṃ vāpi dauṣkuleyasya vā kulam
GE09ram_04_u:223: 4.007.003a satyaṃ tu pratijānāmi tyaja śokam ariṃdama
GE09ram_04_u:224: 4.007.003c kariṣyāmi tathā yatnaṃ yathā prāpsyasi maithilīm
GE09ram_04_u:226: 4.007.004c tathāsmi kartā nacirād yathā prīto bhaviṣyasi
GE09ram_04_u:227: 4.007.005a alaṃ vaiklavyam ālambya dhairyam ātmagataṃ smara
GE09ram_04_u:228: 4.007.005c tvadvidhānāṃ na sadṛśam īdṛśaṃ buddhilāghavam 4.007.006a mayāpi vyasanaṃ prāptaṃ bhāryā haraṇajaṃ mahat
GE09ram_04_u:229: 4.007.006c na cāham evaṃ śocāmi na ca dhairyaṃ parityaje 4.007.007a nāhaṃ tām anuśocāmi prākṛto vānaro 'pi san
GE09ram_04_u:230: 4.007.007c mahātmā ca vinītaś cā kiṃ punar dhṛtimān bhavān 4.007.008a bāṣpam āpatitaṃ dhairyān nigrahītuṃ tvam arhasi
GE09ram_04_u:231: 4.007.008c maryādāṃ sattvayuktānāṃ dhṛtiṃ notsraṣṭum arhasi 4.007.009a vyasane vārtha kṛcchre vā bhaye vā jīvitāntage
GE09ram_04_u:232: 4.007.009c vimṛśan vai svayā buddhyā dhṛtimān nāvasīdati
GE09ram_04_u:233: 4.007.010a bāliśas tu naro nityaṃ vaiklavyaṃ yo 'nuvartate
GE09ram_04_u:234: 4.007.010c sa majjaty avaśaḥ śoke bhārākrānteva naur jale
GE09ram_04_u:235: 4.007.011a eṣo 'ñjalir mayā baddhaḥ praṇayāt tvāṃ prasādaye 4.007.011c pauruṣaṃ śraya śokasya nāntaraṃ dātum arhasi
GE09ram_04_u:236: 4.007.012a ye śokam anuvartante na teṣāṃ vidyate sukham
GE09ram_04_u:237: 4.007.012c tejaś ca kṣīyate teṣāṃ na tvaṃ śocitum arhasi 4.007.013a hitaṃ vayasya bhāvena brūhi nopadiśāmi te
GE09ram_04_u:238: 4.007.013c vayasyatāṃ pūjayan me na tvaṃ śocitum arhasi
GE09ram_04_u:239: 4.007.014a madhuraṃ sāntvitas tena sugrīveṇa sa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:241: 4.007.015a prakṛtiṣṭhas tu kākutsthaḥ sugrīvavacanāt prabhuḥ 4.007.015c saṃpariṣvajya sugrīvam idaṃ vacanam abravīt 4.007.016a kartavyaṃ yad vayasyena snigdhena ca hitena ca
GE09ram_04_u:242: 4.007.016c anurūpaṃ ca yuktaṃ ca kṛtaṃ sugrīva tat tvayā 4.007.017a eṣa ca prakṛtiṣṭho 'ham anunītas tvayā sakhe
GE09ram_04_u:243: 4.007.017c durlabho hīdṛśo bandhur asmin kāle viśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_04_u:244: 4.007.018a kiṃ tu yatnas tvayā kāryo maithilyāḥ parimārgaṇe
GE09ram_04_u:245: 4.007.018c rākṣasasya ca raudrasya rāvaṇasya durātmanaḥ 4.007.019a mayā ca yad anuṣṭheyaṃ visrabdhena tad ucyatām
GE09ram_04_u:246: 4.007.019c varṣāsv iva ca sukṣetre sarvaṃ saṃpadyate tava
GE09ram_04_u:247: 4.007.020a mayā ca yad idaṃ vākyam abhimānāt samīritam
GE09ram_04_u:248: 4.007.020c tat tvayā hariśārdūla tattvam ity upadhāryatām
GE09ram_04_u:249: 4.007.021a anṛtaṃ noktapūrvaṃ me na ca vakṣye kadā cana 4.007.021c etat te pratijānāmi satyenaiva śapāmi te
GE09ram_04_u:250: 4.007.022a tataḥ prahṛṣṭaḥ sugrīvo vānaraiḥ sacivaiḥ saha
GE09ram_04_u:251: 4.007.022c rāghavasya vacaḥ śrutvā pratijñātaṃ viśeṣataḥ 4.007.023a mahānubhāvasya vaco niśamya; harir narāṇām ṛṣabhasya tasya
GE09ram_04_u:252: 4.007.023c kṛtaṃ sa mene harivīra mukhyas; tadā svakāryaṃ hṛdayena vidvān
GE09ram_04_u:253: 4.008.001a parituṣṭas tu sugrīvas tena vākyena vānaraḥ
GE09ram_04_u:254: 4.008.001c lakṣmaṇasyāgrajaṃ rāmam idaṃ vacanam abravīt 4.008.002a sarvathāham anugrāhyo devatānām asaṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:255: 4.008.002c upapannaguṇopetaḥ sakhā yasya bhavān mama 4.008.003a śakyaṃ khalu bhaved rāma sahāyena tvayānagha
GE09ram_04_u:256: 4.008.003c surarājyam api prāptuṃ svarājyaṃ kiṃ punaḥ prabho
GE09ram_04_u:257: 4.008.004a so 'haṃ sabhājyo bandhūnāṃ suhṛdāṃ caiva rāghava 4.008.004c yasyāgnisākṣikaṃ mitraṃ labdhaṃ rāghavavaṃśajam
GE09ram_04_u:258: 4.008.005a aham apy anurūpas te vayasyo jñāsyase śanaiḥ
GE09ram_04_u:259: 4.008.005c na tu vaktuṃ samartho 'haṃ svayam ātmagatān guṇān
GE09ram_04_u:260: 4.008.006a mahātmanāṃ tu bhūyiṣṭhaṃ tvadvidhānāṃ kṛtātmanām 4.008.006c niścalā bhavati prītir dhairyam ātmavatām iva
GE09ram_04_u:261: 4.008.007a rajataṃ vā suvarṇaṃ vā vastrāṇy ābharaṇāni vā
GE09ram_04_u:263: 4.008.008a āḍhyo vāpi daridro vā duḥkhitaḥ sukhito 'pi vā
GE09ram_04_u:264: 4.008.008c nirdoṣo vā sadoṣo vā vayasyaḥ paramā gatiḥ
GE09ram_04_u:265: 4.008.009a dhanatyāgaḥ sukhatyāgo dehatyāgo 'pi vā punaḥ 4.008.009c vayasyārthe pravartante snehaṃ dṛṣṭvā tathāvidham 4.008.010a tat tathety abravīd rāmaḥ sugrīvaṃ priyavādinam
GE09ram_04_u:267: 4.008.011a tato rāmaṃ sthitaṃ dṛṣṭvā lakṣmaṇaṃ ca mahābalam
GE09ram_04_u:268: 4.008.011c sugrīvaḥ sarvataś cakṣur vane lolam apātayat
GE09ram_04_u:269: 4.008.012a sa dadarśa tataḥ sālam avidūre harīśvaraḥ
GE09ram_04_u:271: 4.008.013a tasyaikāṃ parṇabahulāṃ bhaṅktvā śākhāṃ supuṣpitām 4.008.013c sālasyāstīrya sugrīvo niṣasāda sarāghavaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:272: 4.008.014a tāv āsīnau tato dṛṣṭvā hanūmān api lakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_04_u:274: 4.008.015a tataḥ prahṛṣṭaḥ sugrīvaḥ ślakṣṇaṃ madhurayā girā
GE09ram_04_u:276: 4.008.016a ahaṃ vinikṛto bhrātrā carāmy eṣa bhayārditaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:278: 4.008.017a so 'haṃ trasto bhaye magno vasāmy udbhrāntacetanaḥ 4.008.017c vālinā nikṛto bhrātrā kṛtavairaś ca rāghava
GE09ram_04_u:280: 4.008.018c mamāpi tvam anāthasya prasādaṃ kartum arhasi
GE09ram_04_u:281: 4.008.019a evam uktas tu tejasvī dharmajño dharmavatsalaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:282: 4.008.019c pratyuvāca sa kākutsthaḥ sugrīvaṃ prahasann iva
GE09ram_04_u:284: 4.008.020c adyaiva taṃ haniṣyāmi tava bhāryāpahāriṇam 4.008.021a ime hi me mahāvegāḥ patriṇas
GE09ram_04_u:286: 4.008.022a kaṅkapatrapraticchannā mahendrāśanisaṃnibhāḥ 4.008.022c suparvāṇaḥ sutīkṣṇāgrā saroṣā bhujagā iva 4.008.023a bhrātṛsaṃjñam amitraṃ te vālinaṃ kṛtakilbiṣam 4.008.023c śarair vinihataṃ paśya vikīrṇam iva parvatam
GE09ram_04_u:287: 4.008.024a rāghavasya vacaḥ śrutvā sugrīvo vāhinīpatiḥ 4.008.024c praharṣam atulaṃ lebhe sādhu sādhv iti cābravīt
GE09ram_04_u:289: 4.008.025c vayasya iti kṛtvā hi tvayy ahaṃ paridevaye
GE09ram_04_u:291: 4.008.026c kṛtaḥ prāṇair bahumataḥ satyenāpi śapāmy aham
GE09ram_04_u:292: 4.008.027a vayasya iti kṛtvā ca visrabdhaṃ pravadāmy aham
GE09ram_04_u:293: 4.008.027c duḥkham antargataṃ yan me mano dahati nityaśaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:295: 4.008.028c bāṣpopahatayā vācā noccaiḥ śaknoti bhāṣitum 4.008.029a bāṣpavegaṃ tu sahasā nadīvegam ivāgatam 4.008.029c dhārayām āsa dhairyeṇa sugrīvo rāmasaṃnidhau 4.008.030a saṃnigṛhya tu taṃ bāṣpaṃ pramṛjya nayane śubhe
GE09ram_04_u:296: 4.008.030c viniḥśvasya ca tejasvī rāghavaṃ punar abravīt
GE09ram_04_u:297: 4.008.031a purāhaṃ valinā rāma rājyāt svād avaropitaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:299: 4.008.032a hṛtā bhāryā ca me tena prāṇebhyo 'pi garīyasī
GE09ram_04_u:300: 4.008.032c suhṛdaś ca madīyā ye saṃyatā bandhaneṣu te
GE09ram_04_u:301: 4.008.033a yatnavāṃś ca suduṣṭātmā mad vināśāya rāghava
GE09ram_04_u:302: 4.008.033c bahuśas tat prayuktāś ca vānarā nihatā mayā
GE09ram_04_u:303: 4.008.034a śaṅkayā tv etayā cāhaṃ dṛṣṭvā tvām api rāghava 4.008.034c nopasarpāmy ahaṃ bhīto bhaye sarve hi bibhyati
GE09ram_04_u:304: 4.008.035a kevalaṃ hi sahāyā me hanumat pramukhās tv ime 4.008.035c ato 'haṃ dhārayāmy adya prāṇān kṛcchra gato 'pi san
GE09ram_04_u:305: 4.008.036a ete hi kapayaḥ snigdhā māṃ rakṣanti samantataḥ
GE09ram_04_u:306: 4.008.036c saha gacchanti gantavye nityaṃ tiṣṭhanti ca sthite
GE09ram_04_u:307: 4.008.037a saṃkṣepas tv eṣa me rāma kim uktvā vistaraṃ hi te
GE09ram_04_u:308: 4.008.037c sa me jyeṣṭho ripur bhrātā vālī viśrutapauruṣaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:309: 4.008.038a tadvināśād dhi me duḥkhaṃ pranaṣṭaṃ syād anantaram
GE09ram_04_u:310: 4.008.038c sukhaṃ me jīvitaṃ caiva tadvināśanibandhanam 4.008.039a eṣa me rāma śokāntaḥ śokārtena niveditaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:311: 4.008.039c duḥkhito 'duḥkhito vāpi sakhyur nityaṃ sakhā gatiḥ 4.008.040a śrutvaitac ca vaco rāmaḥ sugrīvam idam abravīt
GE09ram_04_u:312: 4.008.040c kiṃnimittam abhūd vairaṃ śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥ
GE09ram_04_u:313: 4.008.041a sukhaṃ hi kāraṇaṃ śrutvā vairasya tava vānara
GE09ram_04_u:315: 4.008.042a balavān hi mamāmarṣaḥ śrutvā tvām avamānitam
GE09ram_04_u:317: 4.008.043a hṛṣṭaḥ kathaya visrabdho yāvad āropyate dhanuḥ
GE09ram_04_u:318: 4.008.043c sṛṣṭaś ca hi mayā bāṇo nirastaś ca ripus tava
GE09ram_04_u:319: 4.008.044a evam uktas tu sugrīvaḥ kākutsthena mahātmanā
GE09ram_04_u:320: 4.008.044c praharṣam atulaṃ lebhe caturbhiḥ saha vānaraiḥ
GE09ram_04_u:322: 4.008.045c vairasya kāraṇaṃ tattvam ākhyātum upacakrame 4.009.001a vālī nāma mama bhrātā jyeṣṭhaḥ śatruniṣūdanaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:323: 4.009.001c pitur bahumato nityaṃ mama cāpi tathā purā
GE09ram_04_u:324: 4.009.002a pitary uparate 'smākaṃ jyeṣṭho 'yam iti mantribhiḥ 4.009.002c kapīnām īśvaro rājye kṛtaḥ paramasaṃmataḥ 4.009.003a rājyaṃ praśāsatas tasya pitṛpaitāmahaṃ mahat 4.009.003c ahaṃ sarveṣu kāleṣu praṇataḥ preṣyavat sthitaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:325: 4.009.004a māyāvī nāma tejasvī pūrvajo dundubheḥ sutaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:326: 4.009.004c tena tasya mahad vairaṃ strīkṛtaṃ viśrutaṃ purā
GE09ram_04_u:327: 4.009.005a sa tu supte jane rātrau kiṣkindhād vāram āgataḥ 4.009.005c nardati sma susaṃrabdho vālinaṃ cāhvayad raṇe
GE09ram_04_u:328: 4.009.006a prasuptas tu mama bhrātā narditaṃ bhairavasvanam
GE09ram_04_u:329: 4.009.006c śrutvā na mamṛṣe vālī niṣpapāta javāt tadā
GE09ram_04_u:330: 4.009.007a sa tu vai niḥsṛtaḥ krodhāt taṃ hantum asurottamam 4.009.007c vāryamāṇas tataḥ strībhir mayā ca praṇatātmanā
GE09ram_04_u:331: 4.009.008a sa tu nirdhūya sarvānno nirjagāma mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:332: 4.009.008c tato 'ham api sauhārdān niḥsṛto vālinā saha 4.009.009a sa tu me bhrātaraṃ dṛṣṭvā māṃ ca dūrād avasthitam
GE09ram_04_u:333: 4.009.009c asuro jātasaṃtrāsaḥ pradudrāva tadā bhṛśam 4.009.010a tasmin dravati saṃtraste hy āvāṃ drutataraṃ gatau
GE09ram_04_u:335: 4.009.011a sa tṛṇair āvṛtaṃ durgaṃ dharaṇyā vivaraṃ mahat
GE09ram_04_u:336: 4.009.011c praviveśāsuro vegād āvām āsādya viṣṭhitau 4.009.012a taṃ praviṣṭaṃ ripuṃ dṛṣṭvā bilaṃ roṣavaśaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_04_u:337: 4.009.012c mām uvāca tadā vālī vacanaṃ kṣubhitendriyaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:338: 4.009.013a iha tvaṃ tiṣṭha sugrīva biladvāri samāhitaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:339: 4.009.013c yāvad atra praviśyāhaṃ nihanmi samare ripum
GE09ram_04_u:340: 4.009.014a mayā tv etad vacaḥ śrutvā yācitaḥ sa paraṃtapa 4.009.014c śāpayitvā ca māṃ padbhyāṃ praviveśa bilaṃ tadā
GE09ram_04_u:341: 4.009.015a tasya praviṣṭasya bilaṃ sāgraḥ saṃvatsaro gataḥ
GE09ram_04_u:342: 4.009.015c sthitasya ca mama dvāri sa kālo vyatyavartata
GE09ram_04_u:343: 4.009.016a ahaṃ tu naṣṭaṃ taṃ jñātvā snehād āgatasaṃbhramaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:344: 4.009.016c bhrātaraṃ na hi paśyāmi pāpaśaṅki ca me manaḥ 4.009.017a atha dīrghasya kālasya bilāt tasmād viniḥsṛtam
GE09ram_04_u:345: 4.009.017c saphenaṃ rudhiraṃ raktam ahaṃ dṛṣṭvā suduḥkhitaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:346: 4.009.018a nardatām asurāṇāṃ ca dhvanir me śrotram āgataḥ
GE09ram_04_u:347: 4.009.018c nirastasya ca saṃgrāme krośato niḥsvano guroḥ
GE09ram_04_u:348: 4.009.019a ahaṃ tv avagato buddhyā cihnais tair bhrātaraṃ hatam 4.009.019c pidhāya ca biladvāraṃ śilayā girimātrayā 4.009.019e śokārtaś codakaṃ kṛtvā kiṣkindhām āgataḥ sakhe
GE09ram_04_u:349: 4.009.020a gūhamānasya me tattvaṃ yatnato mantribhiḥ śrutam
GE09ram_04_u:351: 4.009.021a rājyaṃ praśāsatas tasya nyāyato mama rāghava
GE09ram_04_u:352: 4.009.021c ājagāma ripuṃ hatvā vālī tam asurottamam
GE09ram_04_u:353: 4.009.022a abhiṣiktaṃ tu māṃ dṛṣṭvā krodhāt saṃraktalocanaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:354: 4.009.022c madīyān mantriṇo baddhvā paruṣaṃ vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_04_u:355: 4.009.023a nigrahe 'pi samarthasya taṃ pāpaṃ prati rāghava 4.009.023c na prāvartata me buddhir bhrātṛgauravayantritā 4.009.024a mānayaṃs taṃ mahātmānaṃ yathāvac cābhyavādayam 4.009.024c uktāś ca nāśiṣas tena saṃtuṣṭenāntarātmanā 4.010.001a tataḥ krodhasamāviṣṭaṃ saṃrabdhaṃ tam upāgatam 4.010.001c ahaṃ prasādayāṃ cakre bhrātaraṃ priyakāmyayā 4.010.002a diṣṭyāsi kuśalī prāpto nihataś ca tvayā ripuḥ
GE09ram_04_u:356: 4.010.002c anāthasya hi me nāthas tvam eko 'nāthanandanaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:357: 4.010.003a idaṃ bahuśalākaṃ te pūrṇacandram ivoditam 4.010.003c chatraṃ savālavyajanaṃ pratīcchasva mayodyatam
GE09ram_04_u:358: 4.010.004a tvam eva rājā mānārhaḥ sadā cāhaṃ yathāpurā
GE09ram_04_u:359: 4.010.004c nyāsabhūtam idaṃ rājyaṃ tava niryātayāmy aham
GE09ram_04_u:360: 4.010.005a mā ca roṣaṃ kṛthāḥ saumya mayi śatrunibarhaṇa
GE09ram_04_u:361: 4.010.005c yāce tvāṃ śirasā rājan mayā baddho 'yam añjaliḥ
GE09ram_04_u:362: 4.010.006a balād asmi samāgamya mantribhiḥ puravāsibhiḥ 4.010.006c rājabhāve niyukto 'haṃ
GE09ram_04_u:363: 4.010.007a snigdham evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ māṃ sa tu nirbhartsya vānaraḥ 4.010.007c dhik tvām iti ca mām uktvā bahu tat tad uvāca ha 4.010.008a prakṛtīś ca samānīya mantriṇaś caiva saṃmatān
GE09ram_04_u:364: 4.010.008c mām āha suhṛdāṃ madhye vākyaṃ paramagarhitam
GE09ram_04_u:365: 4.010.009a viditaṃ vo yathā rātrau māyāvī sa mahāsuraḥ
GE09ram_04_u:366: 4.010.009c māṃ samāhvayata krūro yuddhākāṅkṣī sudurmatiḥ 4.010.010a tasya tad garjitaṃ śrutvā niḥsṛto 'haṃ nṛpālayāt
GE09ram_04_u:367: 4.010.010c anuyātaś ca māṃ tūrṇam ayaṃ bhrātā sudāruṇaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:368: 4.010.011a sa tu dṛṣṭvaiva māṃ rātrau sadvitīyaṃ mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:369: 4.010.011c prādravad bhayasaṃtrasto vīkṣyāvāṃ tam anudrutau 4.010.011e anudrutas tu vegena praviveśa mahābilam 4.010.012a taṃ praviṣṭaṃ viditvā tu sughoraṃ sumahad bilam
GE09ram_04_u:370: 4.010.012c ayam ukto 'tha me bhrātā mayā tu krūradarśanaḥ 4.010.013a ahatvā nāsti me śaktiḥ pratigantum itaḥ purīm
GE09ram_04_u:371: 4.010.013c biladvāri pratīkṣa tvaṃ yāvad enaṃ nihanmy aham
GE09ram_04_u:372: 4.010.014a sthito 'yam iti matvā tu praviṣṭo 'haṃ durāsadam
GE09ram_04_u:373: 4.010.014c taṃ ca me mārgamāṇasya gataḥ saṃvatsaras tadā
GE09ram_04_u:374: 4.010.015a sa tu dṛṣṭo mayā śatrur anirvedād bhayāvahaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:375: 4.010.015c nihataś ca mayā tatra so 'suro bandhubhiḥ saha 4.010.016a tasyāsyāt tu pravṛttena rudhiraugheṇa tad bilam
GE09ram_04_u:376: 4.010.016c pūrṇam āsīd durākrāmaṃ stanatas tasya bhūtale
GE09ram_04_u:377: 4.010.017a sūdayitvā tu taṃ śatruṃ vikrāntaṃ dundubheḥ sutam
GE09ram_04_u:378: 4.010.017c niṣkrāmann eva paśyāmi bilasya pihitaṃ mukham
GE09ram_04_u:379: 4.010.018a vikrośamānasya tu me sugrīveti punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:381: 4.010.019a pādaprahārais tu mayā bahuśas tad vidāritam
GE09ram_04_u:382: 4.010.019c tato 'haṃ tena niṣkramya yathā punar upāgataḥ 4.010.020a tatrānenāsmi saṃruddho rājyaṃ mārgayatātmanaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:384: 4.010.021a evam uktvā tu māṃ tatra vastreṇaikena vānaraḥ
GE09ram_04_u:385: 4.010.021c tadā nirvāsayām āsa vālī vigatasādhvasaḥ 4.010.022a tenāham apaviddhaś ca hṛtadāraś ca rāghava
GE09ram_04_u:386: 4.010.022c tadbhayāc ca mahīkṛtsnā krānteyaṃ savanārṇavā 4.010.023a ṛśyamūkaṃ girivaraṃ
GE09ram_04_u:388: 4.010.024a etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ vairānukathanaṃ mahat
GE09ram_04_u:389: 4.010.024c anāgasā mayā prāptaṃ vyasanaṃ paśya rāghava
GE09ram_04_u:391: 4.010.025c kartum arhasi me vīra prasādaṃ tasya nigrahāt
GE09ram_04_u:392: 4.010.026a evam uktaḥ sa tejasvī dharmajño dharmasaṃhitam
GE09ram_04_u:393: 4.010.026c vacanaṃ vaktum ārebhe sugrīvaṃ prahasann iva
GE09ram_04_u:394: 4.010.027a amoghāḥ sūryasaṃkāśā mameme niśitāḥ śarāḥ 4.010.027c tasmin vālini durvṛtte patiṣyanti ruṣānvitāḥ 4.010.028a yāvat taṃ na hi paśyeyaṃ tava bhāryāpahāriṇam
GE09ram_04_u:395: 4.010.028c tāvat sa jīvet pāpātmā vālī cāritradūṣakaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:396: 4.010.029a ātmānumānāt paśyāmi magnaṃ tvāṃ śokasāgare 4.010.029c tvām ahaṃ tārayiṣyāmi kāmaṃ prāpsyasi puṣkalam
GE09ram_04_u:398: 4.011.001c sugrīvaḥ pūjayāṃ cakre rāghavaṃ praśaśaṃsa ca
GE09ram_04_u:399: 4.011.002a asaṃśayaṃ prajvalitais tīkṣṇair marmātigaiḥ śaraiḥ 4.011.002c tvaṃ daheḥ kupito lokān yugānta iva bhāskaraḥ
GE09ram_04_u:400: 4.011.003a vālinaḥ pauruṣaṃ yat tad yac ca vīryaṃ dhṛtiś ca yā
GE09ram_04_u:401: 4.011.003c tan mamaikamanāḥ śrutvā vidhatsva yadanantaram 4.011.004a samudrāt paścimāt pūrvaṃ dakṣiṇād api cottaram
GE09ram_04_u:402: 4.011.004c krāmaty anudite sūrye vālī vyapagataklamaḥ 4.011.005a agrāṇy āruhya śailānāṃ śikharāṇi mahānty api
GE09ram_04_u:403: 4.011.005c ūrdhvam utkṣipya tarasā pratigṛhṇāti vīryavān 4.011.006a bahavaḥ sāravantaś ca vaneṣu vividhā drumāḥ
GE09ram_04_u:404: 4.011.006c vālinā tarasā bhagnā balaṃ prathayatātmanaḥ 4.011.007a mahiṣo dundubhir nāma
GE09ram_04_u:405: 4.011.007c balaṃ nāgasahasrasya dhārayām āsa vīryavān 4.011.008a vīryotsekena duṣṭātmā varadānāc ca mohitaḥ 4.011.008c jagāma sa mahākāyaḥ samudraṃ saritāṃ patim
GE09ram_04_u:407: 4.011.009c mama yuddhaṃ prayaccheti tam uvāca mahārṇavam
GE09ram_04_u:408: 4.011.010a tataḥ samudro dharmātmā samutthāya mahābalaḥ 4.011.010c abravīd vacanaṃ rājann asuraṃ kālacoditam 4.011.011a samartho nāsmi te dātuṃ yuddhaṃ yuddhaviśārada
GE09ram_04_u:409: 4.011.011c śrūyatām abhidhāsyāmi yas te yuddhaṃ pradāsyati
GE09ram_04_u:411: 4.011.012c śaṃkaraśvaśuro nāmnā himavān iti viśrutaḥ 4.011.013a guhā prasravaṇopeto bahukandaranirjharaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:412: 4.011.013c sa samarthas tava prītim atulāṃ kartum āhave
GE09ram_04_u:413: 4.011.014a taṃ bhītam iti vijñāya samudram asurottamaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:414: 4.011.014c himavadvanam āgacchac charaś cāpād iva cyutaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:415: 4.011.015a tatas tasya gireḥ śvetā gajendravipulāḥ śilāḥ
GE09ram_04_u:416: 4.011.015c cikṣepa bahudhā bhūmau dundubhir vinanāda ca
GE09ram_04_u:418: 4.011.016c himavān abravīd vākyaṃ sva eva śikhare sthitaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:419: 4.011.017a kleṣṭum arhasi māṃ na tvaṃ dundubhe dharmavatsala
GE09ram_04_u:420: 4.011.017c raṇakarmasv akuśalas tapasviśaraṇaṃ hy aham 4.011.018a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā girirājasya dhīmataḥ 4.011.018c uvāca dundubhir vākyaṃ krodhāt saṃraktalocanaḥ 4.011.019a yadi yuddhe 'samarthas tvaṃ madbhayād vā nirudyamaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:421: 4.011.019c tam ācakṣva pradadyān me yo 'dya yuddhaṃ yuyutsataḥ 4.011.020a himavān abravīd vākyaṃ śrutvā vākyaviśāradaḥ 4.011.020c anuktapūrvaṃ dharmātmā krodhāt tam asurottamam 4.011.021a vālī nāma mahāprājñaḥ śakratulyaparākramaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:422: 4.011.021c adhyāste vānaraḥ śrīmān kiṣkindhām atulaprabhām 4.011.022a sa samartho mahāprājñas tava yuddhaviśāradaḥ 4.011.022c dvandvayuddhaṃ mahad dātuṃ namucer iva vāsavaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:423: 4.011.023a taṃ śīghram abhigaccha tvaṃ yadi yuddham ihecchasi
GE09ram_04_u:424: 4.011.023c sa hi durdharṣaṇo nityaṃ śūraḥ samarakarmaṇi
GE09ram_04_u:425: 4.011.024a śrutvā himavato vākyaṃ krodhāviṣṭaḥ sa dundubhiḥ
GE09ram_04_u:426: 4.011.024c jagāma tāṃ purīṃ tasya kiṣkindhāṃ vālinas tadā
GE09ram_04_u:427: 4.011.025a dhārayan māhiṣaṃ rūpaṃ tīkṣṇaśṛṅgo bhayāvahaḥ 4.011.025c prāvṛṣīva mahāmeghas toyapūrṇo nabhastale
GE09ram_04_u:428: 4.011.026a tatas tu dvāram āgamya kiṣkindhāyā mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:429: 4.011.026c nanarda kampayan bhūmiṃ dundubhir dundubhir yathā
GE09ram_04_u:430: 4.011.027a samīpajān drumān bhañjan vasudhāṃ dārayan khuraiḥ
GE09ram_04_u:431: 4.011.027c viṣāṇenollekhan darpāt taddvāraṃ dvirado yathā 4.011.028a antaḥpuragato vālī śrutvā śabdam amarṣaṇaḥ 4.011.028c niṣpapāta saha strībhis tārābhir iva candramāḥ
GE09ram_04_u:432: 4.011.029a mitaṃ vyaktākṣarapadaṃ tam uvāca sa dundubhim
GE09ram_04_u:433: 4.011.029c harīṇām īśvaro vālī sarveṣāṃ vanacāriṇām 4.011.030a kimarthaṃ nagaradvāram idaṃ ruddhvā vinardasi 4.011.030c dundubhe vidito me 'si rakṣa prāṇān mahābala
GE09ram_04_u:434: 4.011.031a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā vānarendrasya dhīmataḥ 4.011.031c uvāca dundubhir vākyaṃ krodhāt saṃraktalocanaḥ 4.011.032a na tvaṃ strīsaṃnidhau vīra vacanaṃ vaktum arhasi
GE09ram_04_u:435: 4.011.032c mama yuddhaṃ prayaccha tvaṃ tato jñāsyāmi te balam 4.011.033a atha vā dhārayiṣyāmi krodham adya niśām imām
GE09ram_04_u:436: 4.011.033c gṛhyatām udayaḥ svairaṃ kāmabhogeṣu vānara 4.011.034a yo hi mattaṃ pramattaṃ vā suptaṃ vā rahitaṃ bhṛśam
GE09ram_04_u:437: 4.011.034c hanyāt sa bhrūṇahā loke tvadvidhaṃ madamohitam
GE09ram_04_u:438: 4.011.035a sa prahasyābravīn mandaṃ krodhāt tam asurottamam
GE09ram_04_u:439: 4.011.035c visṛjya tāḥ striyaḥ sarvās tārā prabhiṛtikās tadā
GE09ram_04_u:440: 4.011.036a matto 'yam iti mā maṃsthā yady abhīto 'si saṃyuge
GE09ram_04_u:441: 4.011.036c mado 'yaṃ saṃprahāre 'smin vīrapānaṃ samarthyatām 4.011.037a tam evam uktvā saṃkruddho mālām utkṣipya kāñcanīm
GE09ram_04_u:442: 4.011.037c pitrā dattāṃ mahendreṇa yuddhāya vyavatiṣṭhata 4.011.038a viṣāṇayor gṛhītvā taṃ dundubhiṃ girisaṃnibham 4.011.038c vālī vyāpātayāṃ cakre nanarda ca mahāsvanam
GE09ram_04_u:443: 4.011.039a yuddhe prāṇahare tasmin niṣpiṣṭo dundubhis tadā
GE09ram_04_u:444: 4.011.039c śrotrābhyām atha raktaṃ tu tasya susrāva pātyataḥ
GE09ram_04_u:445: 4.011.039e papāta ca mahākāyaḥ kṣitau pañcatvam āgataḥ
GE09ram_04_u:446: 4.011.040a taṃ tolayitvā bāhubhyāṃ gatasattvam acetanam 4.011.040c cikṣepa vegavān vālī vegenaikena yojanam 4.011.041a tasya vegapraviddhasya vaktrāt kṣatajabindavaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:448: 4.011.042a tān dṛṣṭvā patitāṃs tatra muniḥ śoṇitavipruṣaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:449: 4.011.042c utsasarja mahāśāpaṃ kṣeptāraṃ vālinaṃ prati 4.011.042e iha tenāpraveṣṭavyaṃ praviṣṭasya badho bhavet 4.011.043a sa maharṣiṃ samāsādya yācate sma kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_04_u:450: 4.011.044a tataḥ śāpabhayād bhīta ṛśyamūkaṃ mahāgirim 4.011.044c praveṣṭuṃ necchati harir draṣṭuṃ vāpi nareśvara
GE09ram_04_u:451: 4.011.045a tasyāpraveśaṃ jñātvāham idaṃ rāma mahāvanam 4.011.045c vicarāmi sahāmātyo viṣādena
GE09ram_04_u:454: 4.011.047a ime ca vipulāḥ sālāḥ sapta śākhāvalambinaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:455: 4.011.047c yatraikaṃ ghaṭate vālī niṣpatrayitum ojasā 4.011.048a etad asyāsamaṃ vīryaṃ mayā rāma prakāśitam
GE09ram_04_u:456: 4.011.048c kathaṃ taṃ vālinaṃ hantuṃ samare śakṣyase nṛpa
GE09ram_04_u:457: 4.011.049a yadi bhindyād bhavān sālān imāṃs tv ekeṣuṇā tataḥ 4.011.049c jānīyāṃ tvāṃ mahābāho samarthaṃ vālino vadhe
GE09ram_04_u:458: 4.011.050a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā sugrīvasya mahātmanaḥ 4.011.050c rāghavo dundubheḥ kāyaṃ pādāṅguṣṭhena līlayā 4.011.050e tolayitvā mahābāhuś cikṣepa daśayojanam
GE09ram_04_u:459: 4.011.051a kṣiptaṃ dṛṣṭvā tataḥ kāyaṃ sugrīvaḥ punar abravīt
GE09ram_04_u:460: 4.011.051c lakṣmaṇasyāgrato rāmam idaṃ vacanam arthavat 4.011.052a ārdraḥ samāṃsapratyagraḥ kṣiptaḥ kāyaḥ purā sakhe
GE09ram_04_u:461: 4.011.052c laghuḥ saṃprati nirmāṃsas tṛṇabhūtaś ca rāghava
GE09ram_04_u:462: 4.011.052e nātra śakyaṃ balaṃ jñātuṃ tava vā tasya vādhikam 4.012.001a etac ca vacanaṃ śrutvā sugrīveṇa subhāṣitam
GE09ram_04_u:463: 4.012.001c pratyayārthaṃ mahātejā rāmo jagrāha kārmukam 4.012.002a sa gṛhītvā dhanur ghoraṃ śaram ekaṃ ca mānadaḥ 4.012.002c sālān uddiśya cikṣepa jyāsvanaiḥ pūrayan diśaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:464: 4.012.003a sa visṛṣṭo balavatā bāṇaḥ svarṇapariṣkṛtaḥ 4.012.003c bhittvā sālān giriprasthe sapta bhūmiṃ viveśa ha
GE09ram_04_u:465: 4.012.004a praviṣṭas tu muhūrtena rasāṃ bhittvā mahājavaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:466: 4.012.004c niṣpatya ca punas tūrṇaṃ svatūṇīṃ praviveśa ha
GE09ram_04_u:467: 4.012.005a tān dṛṣṭvā sapta nirbhinnān sālān vānarapuṃgavaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:468: 4.012.005c rāmasya śaravegena vismayaṃ paramaṃ gataḥ 4.012.006a sa mūrdhnā nyapatad bhūmau pralambīkṛtabhūṣaṇaḥ 4.012.006c sugrīvaḥ paramaprīto rāghavāya kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_04_u:469: 4.012.007a idaṃ covāca dharmajñaṃ karmaṇā tena harṣitaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:470: 4.012.007c rāmaṃ sarvāstraviduṣāṃ śreṣṭhaṃ śūram avasthitam 4.012.008a sendrān api surān sarvāṃs tvaṃ bāṇaiḥ puruṣarṣabha
GE09ram_04_u:471: 4.012.008c samarthaḥ samare hantuṃ kiṃ punar vālinaṃ prabho
GE09ram_04_u:472: 4.012.009a yena sapta mahāsālā girir bhūmiś ca dāritāḥ
GE09ram_04_u:473: 4.012.009c bāṇenaikena kākutstha sthātā te ko raṇāgrataḥ
GE09ram_04_u:474: 4.012.010a adya me vigataḥ śokaḥ prītir adya parā mama 4.012.010c suhṛdaṃ tvāṃ samāsādya
GE09ram_04_u:475: 4.012.011a tam adyaiva priyārthaṃ me vairiṇaṃ bhrātṛrūpiṇam
GE09ram_04_u:476: 4.012.011c vālinaṃ jahi kākutstha mayā baddho 'yam añjaliḥ
GE09ram_04_u:477: 4.012.012a tato rāmaḥ pariṣvajya sugrīvaṃ priyadarśanam 4.012.012c pratyuvāca mahāprājño lakṣmaṇānumataṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:478: 4.012.013a asmād gacchāma kiṣkindhāṃ kṣipraṃ gaccha tvam agrataḥ
GE09ram_04_u:479: 4.012.013c gatvā cāhvaya sugrīva vālinaṃ bhrātṛgandhinam 4.012.014a sarve te tvaritaṃ gatvā kiṣkindhāṃ vālinaḥ purīm
GE09ram_04_u:480: 4.012.014c vṛkṣair ātmānam āvṛtya vyatiṣṭhan gahane vane
GE09ram_04_u:481: 4.012.015a sugrīvo vyanadad ghoraṃ vālino hvānakāraṇāt 4.012.015c gāḍhaṃ parihito vegān nādair bhindann ivāmbaram
GE09ram_04_u:482: 4.012.016a taṃ śrutvā ninadaṃ bhrātuḥ kruddho vālī mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:484: 4.012.017a tataḥ sutumulaṃ yuddhaṃ vālisugrīvayor abhūt 4.012.017c gagane grahayor ghoraṃ budhāṅgārakayor iva 4.012.018a talair aśanikalpaiś ca vajrakalpaiś ca muṣṭibhiḥ
GE09ram_04_u:485: 4.012.018c jaghnatuḥ samare 'nyonyaṃ bhrātarau krodhamūrchitau 4.012.019a tato rāmo dhanuṣpāṇis tāv ubhau samudīkṣya tu
GE09ram_04_u:486: 4.012.019c anyonyasadṛśau vīrāv ubhau devāv ivāśvinau 4.012.020a yan nāvagacchat sugrīvaṃ vālinaṃ vāpi rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:487: 4.012.020c tato na kṛtavān buddhiṃ moktum antakaraṃ śaram
GE09ram_04_u:488: 4.012.021a etasminn antare bhagnaḥ sugrīvas tena vālinā
GE09ram_04_u:489: 4.012.021c apaśyan rāghavaṃ nātham ṛśyamūkaṃ pradudruve 4.012.022a klānto rudhirasiktāṅgaḥ prahārair jarjarīkṛtaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:491: 4.012.023a taṃ praviṣṭaṃ vanaṃ dṛṣṭvā vālī śāpabhayāt tataḥ
GE09ram_04_u:492: 4.012.023c mukto hy asi tvam ity uktvā sa nivṛtto mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:493: 4.012.024a rāghavo 'pi saha bhrātrā saha caiva hanūmatā 4.012.024c tad eva vanam āgacchat sugrīvo yatra vānaraḥ
GE09ram_04_u:494: 4.012.025a taṃ samīkṣyāgataṃ rāmaṃ sugrīvaḥ sahalakṣmaṇam 4.012.025c hrīmān dīnam uvācedaṃ vasudhām avalokayan 4.012.026a āhvayasveti mām uktvā darśayitvā ca vikramam
GE09ram_04_u:495: 4.012.026c vairiṇā ghātayitvā ca kim idānīṃ tvayā kṛtam
GE09ram_04_u:496: 4.012.027a tām eva velāṃ vaktavyaṃ tvayā rāghava tattvataḥ
GE09ram_04_u:497: 4.012.027c vālinaṃ na nihanmīti tato nāham ito vraje
GE09ram_04_u:498: 4.012.028a tasya caivaṃ bruvāṇasya sugrīvasya mahātmanaḥ 4.012.028c karuṇaṃ dīnayā vācā rāghavaḥ punar abravīt
GE09ram_04_u:499: 4.012.029a sugrīva śrūyatāṃ tātaḥ krodhaś ca vyapanīyatām
GE09ram_04_u:500: 4.012.029c kāraṇaṃ yena bāṇo 'yaṃ na mayā sa visarjitaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:501: 4.012.030a alaṃkāreṇa veṣeṇa pramāṇena gatena ca 4.012.030c tvaṃ ca sugrīva vālī ca sadṛśau sthaḥ parasparam 4.012.031a svareṇa varcasā caiva prekṣitena ca vānara
GE09ram_04_u:502: 4.012.031c vikrameṇa ca vākyaiś ca vyaktiṃ vāṃ nopalakṣaye
GE09ram_04_u:505: 4.012.033a etanmuhūrte tu mayā paśya vālinam āhave
GE09ram_04_u:507: 4.012.034a abhijñānaṃ kuruṣva tvam ātmano vānareśvara 4.012.034c yena tvām abhijānīyāṃ dvandvayuddham upāgatam 4.012.035a gajapuṣpīm imāṃ phullām utpāṭya śubhalakṣaṇām 4.012.035c kuru lakṣmaṇa kaṇṭhe 'sya sugrīvasya mahātmanaḥ 4.012.036a tato giritaṭe jātām utpāṭya kusumāyutām 4.012.036c lakṣmaṇo gajapuṣpīṃ tāṃ tasya kaṇṭhe vyasarjayat
GE09ram_04_u:508: 4.012.037a sa tathā śuśubhe śrīmāṃl latayā kaṇṭhasaktayā
GE09ram_04_u:509: 4.012.037c mālayeva balākānāṃ sasaṃdhya iva toyadaḥ 4.012.038a vibhrājamāno vapuṣā rāmavākyasamāhitaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:510: 4.012.038c jagāma saha rāmeṇa kiṣkindhāṃ vālipālitām 4.013.001a ṛśyamūkāt sa dharmātmā kiṣkindhāṃ lakṣmaṇāgrajaḥ 4.013.001c jagāma sahasugrīvo vālivikramapālitām
GE09ram_04_u:511: 4.013.002a samudyamya mahac cāpaṃ rāmaḥ kāñcanabhūṣitam 4.013.002c śarāṃś cāditya saṃkāśān gṛhītvā raṇasādhakān 4.013.003a agratas tu yayau tasya rāghavasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:512: 4.013.003c sugrīvaḥ saṃhatagrīvo lakṣmaṇaś ca mahābalaḥ 4.013.004a pṛṣṭhato hanumān vīro nalo nīlaś ca vānaraḥ
GE09ram_04_u:513: 4.013.004c tāraś caiva mahātejā hariyūthapa yūthapāḥ 4.013.005a te vīkṣamāṇā vṛkṣāṃś ca puṣpabhārāvalambinaḥ 4.013.005c prasannāmbuvahāś caiva saritaḥ sāgaraṃ gamāḥ 4.013.006a kandarāṇi ca śailāṃś ca nirjharāṇi guhās tathā
GE09ram_04_u:514: 4.013.006c śikharāṇi ca mukhyāni darīś ca priyadarśanāḥ
GE09ram_04_u:516: 4.013.007c śobhitān sajalān mārge taṭākāṃś ca vyalokayan
GE09ram_04_u:517: 4.013.008a kāraṇḍaiḥ sārasair haṃsair vañjūlair jalakukkuṭaiḥ 4.013.008c cakravākais tathā cānyaiḥ śakunaiḥ pratināditān 4.013.009a mṛduśaṣpāṅkurāhārān nirbhayān vanagocarān
GE09ram_04_u:520: 4.013.010c ghorān ekacarān vanyān dviradān kūlaghātinaḥ 4.013.011a vane vanacarāṃś cānyān khecarāṃś ca vihaṃgamān
GE09ram_04_u:522: 4.013.012a teṣāṃ tu gacchatāṃ tatra tvaritaṃ raghunandanaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:523: 4.013.012c drumaṣaṇḍaṃ vanaṃ dṛṣṭvā rāmaḥ sugrīvam abravīt
GE09ram_04_u:524: 4.013.013a eṣa megha ivākāśe vṛkṣaṣaṇḍaḥ prakāśate 4.013.013c meghasaṃghātavipulaḥ paryantakadalīvṛtaḥ 4.013.014a kim etaj jñātum icchāmi sakhe kautūhalaṃ mama
GE09ram_04_u:525: 4.013.014c kautūhalāpanayanaṃ kartum icchāmy ahaṃ tvayā 4.013.015a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā rāghavasya mahātmanaḥ 4.013.015c gacchann evācacakṣe 'tha sugrīvas tan mahad vanam
GE09ram_04_u:526: 4.013.016a etad rāghava vistīrṇam āśramaṃ śramanāśanam 4.013.016c udyānavanasaṃpannaṃ svādumūlaphalodakam 4.013.017a atra saptajanā nāma munayaḥ saṃśitavratāḥ 4.013.017c saptaivāsann adhaḥśīrṣā niyataṃ jalaśāyinaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:528: 4.013.018c divaṃ varṣaśatair yātāḥ saptabhiḥ sakalevarāḥ 4.013.019a teṣām evaṃ prabhāvena
GE09ram_04_u:529: 4.013.019c āśramaṃ sudurādharṣam api sendraiḥ surāsuraiḥ 4.013.020a pakṣiṇo varjayanty etat tathānye vanacāriṇaḥ 4.013.020c viśanti mohād ye 'py atra nivartante na te punaḥ 4.013.021a vibhūṣaṇaravāś cātra śrūyante sakalākṣarāḥ
GE09ram_04_u:530: 4.013.021c tūryagītasvanāś cāpi gandho divyaś ca rāghava
GE09ram_04_u:531: 4.013.022a tretāgnayo 'pi dīpyante dhūmo hy eṣa pradṛśyate 4.013.022c veṣṭayann iva vṛkṣāgrān kapotāṅgāruṇo ghanaḥ 4.013.023a kuru praṇāmaṃ dharmātmaṃs tān samuddiśya rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:532: 4.013.023c lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā prayataḥ saṃyatāñjaliḥ 4.013.024a praṇamanti hi ye teṣām ṛṣīṇāṃ bhāvitātmanām
GE09ram_04_u:533: 4.013.024c na teṣām aśubhaṃ kiṃ cic charīre rāma dṛśyate 4.013.025a tato rāmaḥ saha bhrātrā lakṣmaṇena kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_04_u:534: 4.013.025c samuddiśya mahātmānas tān ṛṣīn abhyavādayat 4.013.026a abhivādya ca dharmātmā rāmo bhrātā ca lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:535: 4.013.026c sugrīvo vānarāś caiva jagmuḥ saṃhṛṣṭamānasāḥ 4.013.027a te gatvā dūram adhvānaṃ tasmāt saptajanāśramāt
GE09ram_04_u:536: 4.013.027c dadṛśus tāṃ durādharṣāṃ kiṣkindhāṃ vālipālitām 4.014.001a sarve te tvaritaṃ gatvā kiṣkindhāṃ vālipālitām
GE09ram_04_u:537: 4.014.001c vṛkṣair ātmānam āvṛtya vyatiṣṭhan gahane vane
GE09ram_04_u:538: 4.014.002a vicārya sarvato dṛṣṭiṃ kānane kānanapriyaḥ 4.014.002c sugrīvo vipulagrīvaḥ krodham āhārayad bhṛśam 4.014.003a tataḥ sa ninadaṃ ghoraṃ kṛtvā yuddhāya cāhvayat
GE09ram_04_u:539: 4.014.003c parivāraiḥ parivṛto nādair bhindann ivāmbaram 4.014.004a atha bālārkasadṛśo dṛptasiṃhagatis tadā
GE09ram_04_u:540: 4.014.004c dṛṣṭvā rāmaṃ kriyādakṣaṃ sugrīvo vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_04_u:542: 4.014.005c prāptāḥ sma dhvajayantrāḍhyāṃ kiṣkindhāṃ vālinaḥ purīm
GE09ram_04_u:543: 4.014.006a pratijñā yā tvayā vīra kṛtā vālivadhe purā
GE09ram_04_u:544: 4.014.006c saphalāṃ tāṃ kuru kṣipraṃ latāṃ kāla ivāgataḥ
GE09ram_04_u:545: 4.014.007a evam uktas tu dharmātmā sugrīveṇa sa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:546: 4.014.007c tam athovāca sugrīvaṃ vacanaṃ śatrusūdanaḥ 4.014.008a kṛtābhijñāna cihnas tvam anayā gajasāhvayā 4.014.008c viparīta ivākāśe sūryo nakṣatra mālayā 4.014.009a adya vālisamutthaṃ te bhayaṃ vairaṃ ca vānara
GE09ram_04_u:549: 4.014.010c vālī vinihato yāvad vane pāṃsuṣu veṣṭate
GE09ram_04_u:550: 4.014.011a yadi dṛṣṭipathaṃ prāpto jīvan sa vinivartate
GE09ram_04_u:551: 4.014.011c tato doṣeṇa mā gacchet sadyo garhec ca mā bhavān
GE09ram_04_u:552: 4.014.012a pratyakṣaṃ sapta te sālā mayā bāṇena dāritāḥ
GE09ram_04_u:553: 4.014.012c tato vetsi balenādya bālinaṃ nihataṃ mayā
GE09ram_04_u:554: 4.014.013a anṛtaṃ noktapūrvaṃ me vīra kṛcchre 'pi tiṣṭhatā
GE09ram_04_u:555: 4.014.013c dharmalobhaparītena na ca vakṣye kathaṃ cana
GE09ram_04_u:556: 4.014.014a saphalāṃ ca kariṣyāmi pratijñāṃ jahi saṃbhramam
GE09ram_04_u:557: 4.014.014c prasūtaṃ kalamaṃ kṣetre varṣeṇeva śatakratuḥ 4.014.015a tadāhvānanimittaṃ tvaṃ vālino hemamālinaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:558: 4.014.015c sugrīva kuru taṃ śabdaṃ niṣpated yena vānaraḥ
GE09ram_04_u:559: 4.014.016a jitakāśī jayaślāghī tvayā cādharṣitaḥ purāt 4.014.016c niṣpatiṣyaty asaṃgena vālī sa priyasaṃyugaḥ 4.014.017a ripūṇāṃ dharṣaṇaṃ śūrā marṣayanti na saṃyuge
GE09ram_04_u:560: 4.014.017c jānantas tu svakaṃ vīryaṃ strīsamakṣaṃ viśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_04_u:561: 4.014.018a sa tu rāmavacaḥ śrutvā sugrīvo hemapiṅgalaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:563: 4.014.019a tasya śabdena vitrastā gāvo yānti hataprabhāḥ
GE09ram_04_u:565: 4.014.020a dravanti ca mṛgāḥ śīghraṃ bhagnā iva raṇe hayāḥ 4.014.020c patanti ca khagā bhūmau kṣīṇapuṇyā iva grahāḥ
GE09ram_04_u:566: 4.014.021a tataḥ sa jīmūtagaṇapraṇādo; nādaṃ vyamuñcat tvarayā pratītaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:567: 4.014.021c sūryātmajaḥ śauryavivṛddhatejāḥ; saritpatir vānilacañcalormiḥ 4.015.001a atha tasya ninādaṃ taṃ sugrīvasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:569: 4.015.002a śrutvā tu tasya ninadaṃ sarvabhūtaprakampanam 4.015.002c madaś caikapade naṣṭaḥ krodhaś cāpatito mahān
GE09ram_04_u:570: 4.015.003a sa tu roṣaparītāṅgo vālī saṃdhyātapaprabhaḥ 4.015.003c uparakta ivādityaḥ sadyo niṣprabhatāṃ gataḥ 4.015.004a vālī daṃṣṭrā karālas tu krodhād dīptāgnisaṃnibhaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:571: 4.015.004c bhāty utpatitapadmābhaḥ samṛṇāla iva hradaḥ 4.015.005a śabdaṃ durmarṣaṇaṃ śrutvā niṣpapāta tato hariḥ
GE09ram_04_u:572: 4.015.005c vegena caraṇanyāsair dārayann iva medinīm 4.015.006a taṃ tu tārā pariṣvajya snehād darśitasauhṛdā
GE09ram_04_u:573: 4.015.006c uvāca trastasaṃbhrāntā hitodarkam idaṃ vacaḥ 4.015.007a sādhu krodham imaṃ vīra nadī vegam ivāgatam
GE09ram_04_u:574: 4.015.007c śayanād utthitaḥ kālyaṃ tyaja bhuktām iva srajam
GE09ram_04_u:575: 4.015.008a sahasā tava niṣkrāmo mama tāvan na rocate
GE09ram_04_u:577: 4.015.009a pūrvam āpatitaḥ krodhāt sa tvām āhvayate yudhi
GE09ram_04_u:578: 4.015.009c niṣpatya ca nirastas te hanyamāno diśo gataḥ
GE09ram_04_u:579: 4.015.010a tvayā tasya nirastasya pīḍitasya viśeṣataḥ 4.015.010c ihaitya punar āhvānaṃ śaṅkāṃ janayatīva me
GE09ram_04_u:580: 4.015.011a darpaś ca vyavasāyaś ca yādṛśas tasya nardataḥ
GE09ram_04_u:581: 4.015.011c ninādasya ca saṃrambho naitad alpaṃ hi kāraṇam
GE09ram_04_u:582: 4.015.012a nāsahāyam ahaṃ manye sugrīvaṃ tam ihāgatam
GE09ram_04_u:583: 4.015.012c avaṣṭabdhasahāyaś ca yam āśrityaiṣa garjati 4.015.013a prakṛtyā nipuṇaś caiva buddhimāṃś caiva vānaraḥ
GE09ram_04_u:585: 4.015.014a pūrvam eva mayā vīra śrutaṃ kathayato vacaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:586: 4.015.014c aṅgadasya kumārasya vakṣyāmi tvā hitaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:587: 4.015.015a tava bhrātur hi vikhyātaḥ sahāyo raṇakarkaśaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:589: 4.015.016a nivāsavṛkṣaḥ sādhūnām āpannānāṃ parā gatiḥ 4.015.016c ārtānāṃ saṃśrayaś caiva yaśasaś caikabhājanam 4.015.017a jñānavijñānasaṃpanno nideśo nirataḥ pituḥ
GE09ram_04_u:590: 4.015.017c dhātūnām iva śailendro guṇānām ākaro mahān
GE09ram_04_u:591: 4.015.018a tatkṣamaṃ na virodhas te saha tena mahātmanā
GE09ram_04_u:593: 4.015.019a śūra vakṣyāmi te kiṃ cin na cecchāmy abhyasūyitum 4.015.019c śrūyatāṃ kriyatāṃ caiva tava vakṣyāmi yad dhitam
GE09ram_04_u:594: 4.015.020a yauvarājyena sugrīvaṃ tūrṇaṃ sādhv abhiṣecaya 4.015.020c vigrahaṃ mā kṛthā vīra bhrātrā rājan balīyasā
GE09ram_04_u:595: 4.015.021a ahaṃ hi te kṣamaṃ manye tava rāmeṇa sauhṛdam 4.015.021c sugrīveṇa ca saṃprītiṃ vairam utsṛjya dūrataḥ
GE09ram_04_u:596: 4.015.022a lālanīyo hi te bhrātā yavīyān eṣa vānaraḥ
GE09ram_04_u:597: 4.015.022c tatra vā sann ihastho vā sarvathā bandhur eva te
GE09ram_04_u:598: 4.015.023a yadi te matpriyaṃ kāryaṃ yadi cāvaiṣi māṃ hitām 4.015.023c yācyamānaḥ prayatnena sādhu vākyaṃ kuruṣva me
GE09ram_04_u:599: 4.016.001a tām evaṃ bruvatīṃ tārāṃ tārādhipanibhānanām 4.016.001c vālī nirbhartsayām āsa vacanaṃ cedam abravīt
GE09ram_04_u:600: 4.016.002a garjato 'sya ca saṃrambhaṃ bhrātuḥ śatror viśeṣataḥ 4.016.002c marṣayiṣyāmy ahaṃ kena kāraṇena varānane 4.016.003a adharṣitānāṃ śūrāṇāṃ samareṣv anivartinām
GE09ram_04_u:602: 4.016.004a soḍhuṃ na ca samartho 'haṃ yuddhakāmasya saṃyuge 4.016.004c sugrīvasya ca saṃrambhaṃ hīnagrīvasya garjataḥ 4.016.005a na ca kāryo viṣādas te rāghavaṃ prati matkṛte 4.016.005c dharmajñaś ca kṛtajñaś ca kathaṃ pāpaṃ kariṣyati
GE09ram_04_u:604: 4.016.006c sauhṛdaṃ darśitaṃ tāre mayi bhaktiḥ kṛtā tvayā
GE09ram_04_u:605: 4.016.007a pratiyotsyāmy ahaṃ gatvā sugrīvaṃ jahi saṃbhramam
GE09ram_04_u:606: 4.016.007c darpaṃ cāsya vineṣyāmi na ca prāṇair vimokṣyate
GE09ram_04_u:607: 4.016.008a śāpitāsi mama prāṇair nivartasva jayena ca
GE09ram_04_u:608: 4.016.008c ahaṃ jitvā nivartiṣye tam alaṃ bhrātaraṃ raṇe
GE09ram_04_u:609: 4.016.009a taṃ tu tārā pariṣvajya vālinaṃ priyavādinī
GE09ram_04_u:610: 4.016.009c cakāra rudatī mandaṃ dakṣiṇā sā pradakṣiṇam
GE09ram_04_u:611: 4.016.010a tataḥ svastyayanaṃ kṛtvā mantravad vijayaiṣiṇī 4.016.010c antaḥpuraṃ saha strībhiḥ praviṣṭā śokamohitā 4.016.011a praviṣṭāyāṃ tu tārāyāṃ saha strībhiḥ svam ālayam
GE09ram_04_u:612: 4.016.011c nagarān niryayau kruddho mahāsarpa iva śvasan
GE09ram_04_u:613: 4.016.012a sa niḥśvasya mahāvego vālī paramaroṣaṇaḥ 4.016.012c sarvataś cārayan dṛṣṭiṃ
GE09ram_04_u:614: 4.016.013a sa dadarśa tataḥ śrīmān sugrīvaṃ hemapiṅgalam
GE09ram_04_u:616: 4.016.014a sa taṃ dṛṣṭvā mahāvīryaṃ sugrīvaṃ paryavasthitam
GE09ram_04_u:617: 4.016.014c gāḍhaṃ paridadhe vāso vālī paramaroṣaṇaḥ 4.016.015a sa vālī gāḍhasaṃvīto muṣṭim udyamya vīryavān
GE09ram_04_u:618: 4.016.015c sugrīvam evābhimukho yayau yoddhuṃ kṛtakṣaṇaḥ 4.016.016a śliṣṭamuṣṭiṃ samudyamya saṃrabdhataram āgataḥ
GE09ram_04_u:620: 4.016.017a taṃ vālī krodhatāmrākṣaḥ sugrīvaṃ raṇapaṇḍitam 4.016.017c āpatantaṃ mahāvegam idaṃ vacanam abravīt 4.016.018a eṣa muṣṭir mayā baddho gāḍhaḥ sunihitāṅguliḥ
GE09ram_04_u:621: 4.016.018c mayā vegavimuktas te prāṇān ādāya yāsyati
GE09ram_04_u:622: 4.016.019a evam uktas tu sugrīvaḥ kruddho vālinam abravīt
GE09ram_04_u:623: 4.016.019c tavaiva ca haran prāṇān muṣṭiḥ patatu mūrdhani
GE09ram_04_u:624: 4.016.020a tāḍitas tena saṃkruddhaḥ samabhikramya vegataḥ 4.016.020c abhavac choṇitodgārī sotpīḍa iva parvataḥ 4.016.021a sugrīveṇa tu niḥsaṃgaṃ sālam utpāṭya tejasā
GE09ram_04_u:625: 4.016.021c gātreṣv abhihato vālī vajreṇeva mahāgiriḥ 4.016.022a sa tu vālī pracaritaḥ sālatāḍanavihvalaḥ 4.016.022c gurubhārasamākrāntā sāgare naur ivābhavat
GE09ram_04_u:628: 4.016.024a vālinā bhagnadarpas tu sugrīvo mandavikramaḥ 4.016.024c vālinaṃ prati sāmarṣo darśayām āsa lāghavam
GE09ram_04_u:629: 4.016.025a tato dhanuṣi saṃdhāya śaram āśīviṣopamam 4.016.025c rāghaveṇa mahābāṇo vālivakṣasi
GE09ram_04_u:631: 4.016.027a athokṣitaḥ śoṇitatoyavisravaiḥ ; supuṣpitāśoka ivāniloddhataḥ 4.016.027c vicetano vāsavasūnur āhave; prabhraṃśitendradhvajavat kṣitiṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_04_u:633: 4.017.001c papāta sahasā vālī nikṛtta iva pādapaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:635: 4.017.002c apatad devarājasya muktaraśmir iva dhvajaḥ 4.017.003a tasmin nipatite bhūmau haryṛṣāṇāṃ gaṇeśvare 4.017.003c naṣṭacandram iva vyoma na vyarājata bhūtalam
GE09ram_04_u:636: 4.017.004a bhūmau nipatitasyāpi tasya dehaṃ mahātmanaḥ 4.017.004c na śrīr jahāti na prāṇā na tejo na parākramaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:637: 4.017.005a śakradattā varā mālā kāñcanī ratnabhūṣitā 4.017.005c dadhāra harimukhyasya prāṇāṃs tejaḥ śriyaṃ ca sā
GE09ram_04_u:638: 4.017.006a sa tayā mālayā vīro haimayā hariyūthapaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:640: 4.017.007a tasya mālā ca dehaś ca marmaghātī ca yaḥ śaraḥ
GE09ram_04_u:641: 4.017.007c tridheva racitā lakṣmīḥ patitasyāpi śobhate 4.017.008a tad astraṃ tasya vīrasya svargamārgaprabhāvanam 4.017.008c rāmabāṇāsanakṣiptam āvahat paramāṃ gatim
GE09ram_04_u:642: 4.017.009a taṃ tathā patitaṃ saṃkhye gatārciṣam ivānalam
GE09ram_04_u:643: 4.017.009c yayātim iva puṇyānte devalokāt paricyutam 4.017.010a ādityam iva kālena yugānte bhuvi pātitam
GE09ram_04_u:644: 4.017.010c mahendram iva durdharṣaṃ mahendram iva duḥsaham
GE09ram_04_u:648: 4.017.012a sa dṛṣṭvā rāghavaṃ vālī lakṣmaṇaṃ ca mahābalam
GE09ram_04_u:649: 4.017.012c abravīt praśritaṃ vākyaṃ paruṣaṃ dharmasaṃhitam 4.017.013a parāṅmukhavadhaṃ kṛtvā ko nu prāptas tvayā guṇaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:650: 4.017.013c yad ahaṃ yuddhasaṃrabdhas tvatkṛte nidhanaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_04_u:652: 4.017.014c rāmaḥ karuṇavedī ca prajānāṃ ca hite rataḥ
GE09ram_04_u:654: 4.017.015c iti te sarvabhūtāni kathayanti yaśo bhuvi
GE09ram_04_u:655: 4.017.016a tān guṇān saṃpradhāryāham agryaṃ cābhijanaṃ tava
GE09ram_04_u:656: 4.017.016c tārayā pratiṣiddhaḥ san sugrīveṇa samāgataḥ 4.017.017a na mām anyena saṃrabdhaṃ pramattaṃ veddhum arhasi
GE09ram_04_u:657: 4.017.017c iti me buddhir utpannā babhūvādarśane tava
GE09ram_04_u:658: 4.017.018a na tvāṃ vinihatātmānaṃ dharmadhvajam adhārmikam 4.017.018c jāne pāpasamācāraṃ tṛṇaiḥ kūpam ivāvṛtam 4.017.019a satāṃ veṣadharaṃ pāpaṃ pracchannam iva pāvakam
GE09ram_04_u:660: 4.017.020a viṣaye vā pure vā te yadā nāpakaromy aham 4.017.020c na ca tvāṃ pratijāne 'haṃ kasmāt tvaṃ haṃsy akilbiṣam
GE09ram_04_u:662: 4.017.021c mām ihāpratiyudhyantam anyena ca samāgatam 4.017.022a tvaṃ narādhipateḥ putraḥ pratītaḥ priyadarśanaḥ 4.017.022c liṅgam apy asti te rājan dṛśyate dharmasaṃhitam
GE09ram_04_u:663: 4.017.023a kaḥ kṣatriyakule jātaḥ śrutavān naṣṭasaṃśayaḥ 4.017.023c dharmaliṅga praticchannaḥ krūraṃ karma samācaret 4.017.024a rāma rājakule jāto dharmavān iti viśrutaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:665: 4.017.025a sāma dānaṃ kṣamā dharmaḥ satyaṃ dhṛtiparākramau
GE09ram_04_u:666: 4.017.025c pārthivānāṃ guṇā rājan daṇḍaś cāpy apakāriṣu
GE09ram_04_u:667: 4.017.026a vayaṃ vanacarā rāma mṛgā mūlaphalāśanāḥ 4.017.026c eṣā prakṛtir asmākaṃ puruṣas tvaṃ nareśvaraḥ
GE09ram_04_u:668: 4.017.027a bhūmir hiraṇyaṃ rūpyaṃ ca nigrahe kāraṇāni ca
GE09ram_04_u:669: 4.017.027c tatra kas te vane lobho madīyeṣu phaleṣu vā 4.017.028a nayaś ca vinayaś cobhau nigrahānugrahāv api
GE09ram_04_u:670: 4.017.028c rājavṛttir asaṃkīrṇā na nṛpāḥ kāmavṛttayaḥ 4.017.029a tvaṃ tu kāmapradhānaś ca kopanaś cānavasthitaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:672: 4.017.030a na te 'sty apacitir dharme nārthe buddhir avasthitā 4.017.030c indriyaiḥ kāmavṛttaḥ san kṛṣyase manujeśvara 4.017.031a hatvā bāṇena kākutstha mām ihānaparādhinam 4.017.031c kiṃ vakṣyasi satāṃ madhye karma kṛtvā jugupsitam
GE09ram_04_u:673: 4.017.032a rājahā brahmahā goghnaś coraḥ prāṇivadhe rataḥ
GE09ram_04_u:674: 4.017.032c nāstikaḥ parivettā ca sarve nirayagāminaḥ 4.017.033a adhāryaṃ carma me sadbhī romāṇy asthi ca varjitam 4.017.033c abhakṣyāṇi ca māṃsāni tvadvidhair dharmacāribhiḥ 4.017.034a pañca pañcanakhā bhakṣyā brahmakṣatreṇa rāghava 4.017.034c śalyakaḥ śvāvidho godhā śaśaḥ kūrmaś ca pañcamaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:675: 4.017.035a carma cāsthi ca me rājan na spṛśanti manīṣiṇaḥ 4.017.035c abhakṣyāṇi ca māṃsāni so 'haṃ pañcanakho hataḥ 4.017.036a tvayā nāthena kākutstha na sanāthā vasuṃdharā
GE09ram_04_u:676: 4.017.036c pramadā śīlasaṃpannā dhūrtena patitā yathā 4.017.037a śaṭho naikṛtikaḥ kṣudro mithyā praśritamānasaḥ 4.017.037c kathaṃ daśarathena tvaṃ jātaḥ pāpo mahātmanā
GE09ram_04_u:679: 4.017.039a dṛśyamānas tu yudhyethā mayā yudhi nṛpātmaja
GE09ram_04_u:680: 4.017.039c adya vaivasvataṃ devaṃ paśyes tvaṃ nihato mayā
GE09ram_04_u:682: 4.017.040c prasuptaḥ pannageneva naraḥ pānavaśaṃ gataḥ 4.017.041a sugrīvapriyakāmena yad ahaṃ nihatas tvayā 4.017.041c kaṇṭhe baddhvā pradadyāṃ te 'nihataṃ rāvaṇaṃ raṇe 4.017.042a nyastāṃ sāgaratoye vā pātāle vāpi maithilīm
GE09ram_04_u:683: 4.017.042c jānayeyaṃ tavādeśāc chvetām aśvatarīm iva 4.017.043a yuktaṃ yat prapnuyād rājyaṃ sugrīvaḥ svargate mayi
GE09ram_04_u:684: 4.017.043c ayuktaṃ yad adharmeṇa tvayāhaṃ nihato raṇe
GE09ram_04_u:685: 4.017.044a kāmam evaṃvidhaṃ lokaḥ kālena viniyujyate 4.017.044c kṣamaṃ ced bhavatā prāptam uttaraṃ sādhu cintyatām
GE09ram_04_u:686: 4.017.045a ity evam uktvā pariśuṣkavaktraḥ; śarābhighātād vyathito mahātmā
GE09ram_04_u:687: 4.017.045c samīkṣya rāmaṃ ravisaṃnikāśaṃ; tūṣṇīṃ babhūvāmararājasūnuḥ 4.018.001a ity uktaḥ praśritaṃ vākyaṃ dharmārthasahitaṃ hitam
GE09ram_04_u:688: 4.018.001c paruṣaṃ vālinā rāmo nihatena vicetasā 4.018.002a taṃ niṣprabham ivādityaṃ muktatoyam ivāmbudam 4.018.002c uktavākyaṃ hariśreṣṭham upaśāntam ivānalam
GE09ram_04_u:690: 4.018.003c adhikṣiptas tadā rāmaḥ paścād vālinam abravīt
GE09ram_04_u:691: 4.018.004a dharmam arthaṃ ca kāmaṃ ca samayaṃ cāpi laukikam 4.018.004c avijñāya kathaṃ bālyān mām ihādya vigarhase
GE09ram_04_u:693: 4.018.005c saumya vānaracāpalyāt tvaṃ māṃ vaktum ihecchasi
GE09ram_04_u:696: 4.018.007a tāṃ pālayati dharmātmā bharataḥ satyavāg ṛjuḥ
GE09ram_04_u:698: 4.018.008a nayaś ca vinayaś cobhau yasmin satyaṃ ca susthitam 4.018.008c vikramaś ca yathā dṛṣṭaḥ sa rājā deśakālavit
GE09ram_04_u:699: 4.018.009a tasya dharmakṛtādeśā vayam anye ca pārthivaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:700: 4.018.009c carāmo vasudhāṃ kṛtsnāṃ dharmasaṃtānam icchavaḥ 4.018.010a tasmin nṛpatiśārdūla bharate dharmavatsale
GE09ram_04_u:701: 4.018.010c pālayaty akhilāṃ bhūmiṃ kaś cared dharmanigraham
GE09ram_04_u:702: 4.018.011a te vayaṃ mārgavibhraṣṭaṃ svadharme parame sthitāḥ
GE09ram_04_u:704: 4.018.012a tvaṃ tu saṃkliṣṭadharmā ca karmaṇā ca vigarhitaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:705: 4.018.012c kāmatantrapradhānaś ca na sthito rājavartmani 4.018.013a jyeṣṭho bhrātā pitā caiva yaś ca vidyāṃ prayacchati 4.018.013c trayas te pitaro jñeyā dharme ca pathi vartinaḥ 4.018.014a yavīyān ātmanaḥ putraḥ śiṣyaś cāpi guṇoditaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:706: 4.018.014c putravat te trayaś cintyā dharmaś ced atra kāraṇam 4.018.015a sūkṣmaḥ paramadurjñeyaḥ satāṃ dharmaḥ plavaṃgama 4.018.015c hṛdisthaḥ sarvabhūtānām ātmā veda śubhāśubham 4.018.016a capalaś capalaiḥ sārdhaṃ vānarair akṛtātmabhiḥ 4.018.016c jātyandha iva jātyandhair mantrayan drakṣyase nu kim
GE09ram_04_u:707: 4.018.017a ahaṃ tu vyaktatām asya vacanasya bravīmi te
GE09ram_04_u:708: 4.018.017c na hi māṃ kevalaṃ roṣāt tvaṃ vigarhitum arhasi 4.018.018a tad etat kāraṇaṃ paśya yadarthaṃ tvaṃ mayā hataḥ 4.018.018c bhrātur vartasi bhāryāyāṃ tyaktvā dharmaṃ sanātanam
GE09ram_04_u:709: 4.018.019a asya tvaṃ dharamāṇasya sugrīvasya mahātmanaḥ 4.018.019c rumāyāṃ vartase kāmāt snuṣāyāṃ pāpakarmakṛt 4.018.020a tad vyatītasya te dharmāt kāmavṛttasya vānara
GE09ram_04_u:711: 4.018.021a na hi dharmaviruddhasya lokavṛttād apeyuṣaḥ 4.018.021c daṇḍād anyatra paśyāmi nigrahaṃ hariyūthapa 4.018.022a aurasīṃ bhaginīṃ vāpi bhāryāṃ vāpy anujasya yaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:712: 4.018.022c pracareta naraḥ kāmāt tasya daṇḍo vadhaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:713: 4.018.023a bharatas tu mahīpālo vayaṃ tv ādeśavartinaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:714: 4.018.023c tvaṃ ca dharmād atikrāntaḥ kathaṃ śakyam upekṣitum
GE09ram_04_u:717: 4.018.025a vayaṃ tu bharatādeśaṃ vidhiṃ kṛtvā harīśvara
GE09ram_04_u:719: 4.018.026a sugrīveṇa ca me sakhyaṃ lakṣmaṇena yathā tathā
GE09ram_04_u:720: 4.018.026c dārarājyanimittaṃ ca niḥśreyasi rataḥ sa me
GE09ram_04_u:721: 4.018.027a pratijñā ca mayā dattā tadā vānarasaṃnidhau
GE09ram_04_u:722: 4.018.027c pratijñā ca kathaṃ śakyā madvidhenānavekṣitum 4.018.028a tad ebhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ sarvair mahadbhir dharmasaṃhitaiḥ
GE09ram_04_u:723: 4.018.028c śāsanaṃ tava yad yuktaṃ tad bhavān anumanyatām
GE09ram_04_u:724: 4.018.029a sarvathā dharma ity eva draṣṭavyas tava nigrahaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:726: 4.018.030a rājabhir dhṛtadaṇḍās tu kṛtvā pāpāni mānavāḥ
GE09ram_04_u:727: 4.018.030c nirmalāḥ svargam āyānti santaḥ sukṛtino yathā
GE09ram_04_u:728: 4.018.031a āryeṇa mama māndhātrā vyasanaṃ ghoram īpsitam
GE09ram_04_u:729: 4.018.031c śramaṇena kṛte pāpe yathā pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ tvayā
GE09ram_04_u:730: 4.018.032a anyair api kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ pramattair vasudhādhipaiḥ
GE09ram_04_u:731: 4.018.032c prāyaścittaṃ ca kurvanti tena tac chāmyate rajaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:732: 4.018.033a tad alaṃ paritāpena dharmataḥ parikalpitaḥ 4.018.033c vadho vānaraśārdūla na vayaṃ svavaśe sthitāḥ
GE09ram_04_u:733: 4.018.034a vāgurābhiś ca pāśaiś ca kūṭaiś ca vividhair narāḥ 4.018.034c praticchannāś ca dṛśyāś ca gṛhṇanti subahūn mṛgān
GE09ram_04_u:734: 4.018.034e pradhāvitān vā vitrastān visrabdhān ativiṣṭhitān 4.018.035a pramattān apramattān vā narā māṃsārthino bhṛśam
GE09ram_04_u:735: 4.018.035c vidhyanti vimukhāṃś cāpi na ca doṣo 'tra vidyate
GE09ram_04_u:736: 4.018.036a yānti rājarṣayaś cātra mṛgayāṃ dharmakovidāḥ 4.018.036c tasmāt tvaṃ nihato yuddhe mayā bāṇena vānara
GE09ram_04_u:737: 4.018.036e ayudhyan pratiyudhyan vā yasmāc chākhāmṛgo hy asi
GE09ram_04_u:738: 4.018.037a durlabhasya ca dharmasya jīvitasya śubhasya ca
GE09ram_04_u:739: 4.018.037c rājāno vānaraśreṣṭha pradātāro na saṃśayaḥ 4.018.038a tān na hiṃsyān na cākrośen nākṣipen nāpriyaṃ vadet 4.018.038c devā mānuṣarūpeṇa caranty ete mahītale 4.018.039a tvaṃ tu dharmam avijñāya kevalaṃ roṣam āsthitaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:740: 4.018.039c pradūṣayasi māṃ dharme pitṛpaitāmahe sthitam 4.018.040a evam uktas tu rāmeṇa vālī pravyathito bhṛśam
GE09ram_04_u:741: 4.018.040c pratyuvāca tato rāmaṃ prāñjalir vānareśvaraḥ 4.018.041a yat tvam āttha naraśreṣṭha tad evaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ 4.018.041c prativaktuṃ prakṛṣṭe hi nāpakṛṣṭas tu śaknuyāt
GE09ram_04_u:742: 4.018.042a yad ayuktaṃ mayā pūrvaṃ pramādād vākyam apriyam
GE09ram_04_u:743: 4.018.042c tatrāpi khalu me doṣaṃ kartuṃ nārhasi rāghava
GE09ram_04_u:744: 4.018.043a tvaṃ hi dṛṣṭārthatattvajñaḥ prajānāṃ ca hite rataḥ
GE09ram_04_u:745: 4.018.043c kāryakāraṇasiddhau te prasannā buddhir avyayā 4.018.044a mām apy avagataṃ dharmād vyatikrāntapuraskṛtam 4.018.044c dharmasaṃhitayā vācā dharmajña paripālaya
GE09ram_04_u:746: 4.018.045a bāṣpasaṃruddhakaṇṭhas tu vālī sārtaravaḥ śanaiḥ 4.018.045c uvāca rāmaṃ saṃprekṣya paṅkalagna iva dvipaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:747: 4.018.046a na tv ātmānam ahaṃ śoce na tārāṃ nāpi bāndhavān
GE09ram_04_u:748: 4.018.046c yathā putraṃ guṇaśreṣṭham aṅgadaṃ kanakāṅgadam 4.018.047a sa mamādarśanād dīno bālyāt prabhṛti lālitaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:749: 4.018.047c taṭāka iva pītāmbur upaśoṣaṃ gamiṣyati 4.018.048a sugrīve cāṅgade caiva vidhatsva matim uttamām
GE09ram_04_u:750: 4.018.048c tvaṃ hi śāstā ca goptā ca kāryākāryavidhau sthitaḥ 4.018.049a yā te narapate vṛttir bharate lakṣmaṇe ca yā 4.018.049c sugrīve cāṅgade rājaṃs tāṃ cintayitum arhasi
GE09ram_04_u:751: 4.018.050a maddoṣakṛtadoṣāṃ tāṃ yathā tārāṃ tapasvinīm 4.018.050c sugrīvo nāvamanyeta tathāvasthātum
GE09ram_04_u:752: 4.018.051a tvayā hy anugṛhītena śakyaṃ rājyam upāsitum
GE09ram_04_u:754: 4.018.052a sa tam āśvāsayad rāmo vālinaṃ vyaktadarśanam
GE09ram_04_u:755: 4.018.053a na vayaṃ bhavatā cintyā nāpy ātmā harisattama
GE09ram_04_u:757: 4.018.054a daṇḍye yaḥ pātayed daṇḍaṃ daṇḍyo yaś cāpi daṇḍyate 4.018.054c kāryakāraṇasiddhārthāv ubhau tau nāvasīdataḥ
GE09ram_04_u:758: 4.018.055a tad bhavān daṇḍasaṃyogād asmād vigatakalmaṣaḥ 4.018.055c gataḥ svāṃ prakṛtiṃ dharmyāṃ dharmadṛṣṭtena vartmanā
GE09ram_04_u:759: 4.018.056a sa tasya vākyaṃ madhuraṃ mahātmanaḥ; samāhitaṃ dharmapathānuvartinaḥ 4.018.056c niśamya rāmasya raṇāvamardino; vacaḥ suyuktaṃ nijagāda vānaraḥ
GE09ram_04_u:760: 4.018.057a śarābhitaptena vicetasā mayā; pradūṣitas tvaṃ yad ajānatā prabho 4.018.057c idaṃ mahendropamabhīmavikrama; prasāditas tvaṃ kṣama me mahīśvara 4.019.001a sa vānaramahārājaḥ śayānaḥ śaravikṣataḥ
GE09ram_04_u:762: 4.019.002a aśmabhiḥ paribhinnāṅgaḥ pādapair āhato bhṛśam 4.019.002c rāmabāṇena cākrānto jīvitānte mumoha saḥ 4.019.003a taṃ bhāryābāṇamokṣeṇa rāmadattena saṃyuge
GE09ram_04_u:763: 4.019.003c hataṃ plavagaśārdūlaṃ tārā śuśrāva vālinam 4.019.004a sā saputrāpriyaṃ śrutvā vadhaṃ bhartuḥ sudāruṇam
GE09ram_04_u:764: 4.019.004c niṣpapāta bhṛśaṃ trastā vividhād girigahvarāt 4.019.005a ye tv aṅgadaparīvārā vānarā hi mahābalāḥ
GE09ram_04_u:765: 4.019.005c te sakārmukam ālokya rāmaṃ trastāḥ pradudruvuḥ
GE09ram_04_u:766: 4.019.006a sā dadarśa tatas trastān harīn āpatato drutam
GE09ram_04_u:767: 4.019.006c yūthād iva paribhraṣṭān mṛgān nihatayūthapān 4.019.007a tān uvāca samāsādya duḥkhitān duḥkhitā satī
GE09ram_04_u:768: 4.019.007c rāma vitrāsitān sarvān anubaddhān iveṣubhiḥ 4.019.008a vānarā rājasiṃhasya yasya yūyaṃ puraḥsarāḥ 4.019.008c taṃ vihāya suvitrastāḥ kasmād dravata durgatāḥ
GE09ram_04_u:769: 4.019.009a rājyahetoḥ sa ced bhrātā bhrātā raudreṇa pātitaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:770: 4.019.009c rāmeṇa prasṛtair dūrān mārgaṇair dūra pātibhiḥ
GE09ram_04_u:771: 4.019.010a kapipatnyā vacaḥ śrutvā kapayaḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ 4.019.010c prāptakālam aviśliṣṭam ūcur vacanam aṅganām 4.019.011a jīva putre nivartasya putraṃ rakṣasva cāndagam
GE09ram_04_u:772: 4.019.011c antako rāma rūpeṇa hatvā nayati vālinam
GE09ram_04_u:773: 4.019.012a kṣiptān vṛkṣān samāvidhya vipulāś ca śilās tathā
GE09ram_04_u:774: 4.019.012c vālī vajrasamair bāṇair vajreṇeva nipātitaḥ 4.019.013a abhidrutam idaṃ sarvaṃ vidrutaṃ prasṛtaṃ balam
GE09ram_04_u:776: 4.019.014a rakṣyatāṃ nagaraṃ śūrair aṅgadaś cābhiṣicyatām 4.019.014c padasthaṃ vālinaḥ putraṃ bhajiṣyanti plavaṃgamāḥ 4.019.015a atha vā ruciraṃ sthānam iha te rucirānane
GE09ram_04_u:777: 4.019.015c āviśanti hi durgāṇi kṣipram adyaiva vānarāḥ
GE09ram_04_u:778: 4.019.016a abhāryāḥ saha bhāryāś ca santy atra vanacāriṇaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:779: 4.019.016c lubdhebhyo viprayuktebhyaḥ svebhyo nas tumulaṃ bhayam
GE09ram_04_u:780: 4.019.017a alpāntaragatānāṃ tu śrutvā vacanam aṅganā 4.019.017c ātmanaḥ pratirūpaṃ sā babhāṣe cāruhāsinī 4.019.018a putreṇa mama kiṃ kāryaṃ kiṃ rājyena kim ātmanā 4.019.018c kapisiṃhe mahābhāge tasmin bhartari naśyati 4.019.019a pādamūlaṃ gamiṣyāmi tasyaivāhaṃ mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:782: 4.019.020a evam uktvā pradudrāva rudatī śokakarśitā 4.019.020c śiraś coraś ca bāhubhyāṃ duḥkhena samabhighnatī
GE09ram_04_u:783: 4.019.021a āvrajantī dadarśātha patiṃ nipatitaṃ bhuvi 4.019.021c hantāraṃ dānavendrāṇāṃ samareṣv anivartinām
GE09ram_04_u:784: 4.019.022a kṣeptāraṃ parvatendrāṇāṃ vajrāṇām iva vāsavam 4.019.022c mahāvātasamāviṣṭaṃ mahāmeghaughaniḥsvanam 4.019.023a śakratulyaparākrāntaṃ vṛṣṭvevoparataṃ ghanam
GE09ram_04_u:785: 4.019.023c nardantaṃ nardatāṃ bhīmaṃ śūraṃ śūreṇa pātitam
GE09ram_04_u:788: 4.019.025a nāgahetoḥ suparṇena caityam unmathitaṃ yathā 4.019.025c avaṣṭabhyāvatiṣṭhantaṃ dadarśa dhanur ūrjitam
GE09ram_04_u:789: 4.019.026a rāmaṃ rāmānujaṃ caiva bhartuś caivānujaṃ śubhā
GE09ram_04_u:790: 4.019.026c tān atītya samāsādya bhartāraṃ nihataṃ raṇe
GE09ram_04_u:791: 4.019.027a samīkṣya vyathitā bhūmau saṃbhrāntā nipapāta ha
GE09ram_04_u:792: 4.019.027c supteva punar utthāya āryaputreti krośatī 4.019.028a ruroda sā patiṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃditaṃ mṛtyudāmabhiḥ
GE09ram_04_u:793: 4.019.028c tām avekṣya tu sugrīvaḥ krośantīṃ kurarīm iva
GE09ram_04_u:794: 4.019.029a viṣādam agamat kaṣṭaṃ dṛṣṭvā cāṅgadam āgatam
GE09ram_04_u:796: 4.020.001c dṛṣṭvā vinihataṃ bhūmau tārā tārādhipānanā 4.020.002a sā samāsādya bhartāraṃ paryaṣvajata bhāminī 4.020.002c iṣuṇābhihataṃ dṛṣṭvā vālinaṃ kuñjaropamam
GE09ram_04_u:798: 4.020.003c tārā tarum ivonmūlaṃ paryadevayad āturā 4.020.004a raṇe dāruṇavikrānta pravīra plavatāṃ vara 4.020.004c kiṃ dīnām apurobhāgām adya tvaṃ nābhibhāṣase
GE09ram_04_u:800: 4.020.005c naivaṃvidhāḥ śerate hi bhūmau nṛpatisattamāḥ 4.020.006a atīva khalu te kāntā vasudhā vasudhādhipa
GE09ram_04_u:801: 4.020.006c gatāsur api yāṃ gātrair māṃ vihāya niṣevase
GE09ram_04_u:802: 4.020.007a vyaktam anyā tvayā vīra dharmataḥ saṃpravartatā
GE09ram_04_u:803: 4.020.007c kiṣkindheva purī ramyā svargamārge vinirmitā 4.020.008a yāny asmābhis tvayā sārdhaṃ vaneṣu madhugandhiṣu
GE09ram_04_u:804: 4.020.008c vihṛtāni tvayā kāle teṣām uparamaḥ kṛtaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:807: 4.020.010a hṛdayaṃ susthiraṃ mahyaṃ dṛṣṭvā vinihataṃ bhuvi
GE09ram_04_u:809: 4.020.011a sugrīvasya tvayā bhāryā hṛtā sa ca vivāsitaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:810: 4.020.011c yat tat tasya tvayā vyuṣṭiḥ prāpteyaṃ plavagādhipa
GE09ram_04_u:811: 4.020.012a niḥśreyasaparā mohāt tvayā cāhaṃ vigarhitā 4.020.012c yaiṣābruvaṃ hitaṃ vākyaṃ
GE09ram_04_u:812: 4.020.013a kālo niḥsaṃśayo nūnaṃ jīvitāntakaras tava 4.020.013c balād yenāvapanno 'si sugrīvasyāvaśo vaśam 4.020.014a vaidhavyaṃ śokasaṃtāpaṃ kṛpaṇaṃ kṛpaṇā satī 4.020.014c aduḥkhopacitā pūrvaṃ vartayiṣyāmy anāthavat
GE09ram_04_u:813: 4.020.015a lālitaś cāṅgado vīraḥ sukumāraḥ sukhocitaḥ 4.020.015c vatsyate kām avasthāṃ me pitṛvye krodhamūrchite
GE09ram_04_u:814: 4.020.016a kuruṣva pitaraṃ putra sudṛṣṭaṃ dharmavatsalam 4.020.016c durlabhaṃ darśanaṃ tv asya tava vatsa bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_04_u:815: 4.020.017a samāśvāsaya putraṃ tvaṃ saṃdeśaṃ saṃdiśasva ca
GE09ram_04_u:816: 4.020.017c mūrdhni cainaṃ samāghrāya pravāsaṃ prasthito hy asi
GE09ram_04_u:817: 4.020.018a rāmeṇa hi mahat karma kṛtaṃ tvām abhinighnatā
GE09ram_04_u:818: 4.020.018c ānṛṇyaṃ tu gataṃ tasya sugrīvasya pratiśrave
GE09ram_04_u:819: 4.020.019a sakāmo bhava sugrīva rumāṃ tvaṃ pratipatsyase
GE09ram_04_u:820: 4.020.019c bhuṅkṣva rājyam anudvignaḥ śasto bhrātā ripus tava
GE09ram_04_u:821: 4.020.020a kiṃ mām evaṃ vilapatīṃ preṃṇā tvaṃ nābhibhāṣase
GE09ram_04_u:822: 4.020.020c imāḥ paśya varā bahvīr bhāryās te vānareśvara
GE09ram_04_u:823: 4.020.021a tasyā vilapitaṃ śrutvā vānaryaḥ sarvataś ca tāḥ
GE09ram_04_u:825: 4.020.022a kim aṅgadaṃ sāṅgada vīra bāho; vihāya yāsy adya cirapravāsaṃ
GE09ram_04_u:826: 4.020.022c na yuktam evaṃ guṇasaṃnikṛṣṭaṃ; vihāya putraṃ priyaputra gantum
GE09ram_04_u:827: 4.020.023a kim apriyaṃ te priyacāruveṣa; kṛtaṃ mayā nātha sutena vā te
GE09ram_04_u:828: 4.020.023c sahāyinīm adya vihāya vīra; yamakṣayaṃ gacchasi durvinītam
GE09ram_04_u:829: 4.020.024a yady apriyaṃ kiṃ cid asaṃpradhārya; kṛtaṃ mayā syāt tava dīrghabāho 4.020.024c kṣamasva me tad dharivaṃśa nātha; vrajāmi mūrdhnā tava vīra pādau 4.020.025a tathā tu tārā karuṇaṃ rudantī; bhartuḥ samīpe saha vānarībhiḥ
GE09ram_04_u:830: 4.020.025c vyavasyata prāyam anindyavarṇā; upopaveṣṭuṃ bhuvi yatra vālī
GE09ram_04_u:831: 4.021.001a tato nipatitāṃ tārāṃ cyutāṃ tārām ivāmbarāt
GE09ram_04_u:832: 4.021.001c śanair āśvāsayām āsa hanūmān hariyūthapaḥ 4.021.002a guṇadoṣakṛtaṃ jantuḥ svakarmaphalahetukam
GE09ram_04_u:833: 4.021.002c avyagras tad avāpnoti sarvaṃ pretya śubhāśubham
GE09ram_04_u:834: 4.021.003a śocyā śocasi kaṃ śocyaṃ dīnaṃ dīnānukampase
GE09ram_04_u:836: 4.021.004a aṅgadas tu kumāro 'yaṃ draṣṭavyo jīvaputrayā 4.021.004c āyatyā ca vidheyāni samarthāny asya cintaya
GE09ram_04_u:837: 4.021.005a jānāsy aniyatām evaṃ bhūtānām āgatiṃ gatim
GE09ram_04_u:838: 4.021.005c tasmāc chubhaṃ hi kartavyaṃ paṇḍite naihalaukikam
GE09ram_04_u:839: 4.021.006a yasmin harisahasrāṇi prayutāny arbudāni ca 4.021.006c vartayanti kṛtāṃśāni so 'yaṃ diṣṭāntam āgataḥ 4.021.007a yad ayaṃ nyāyadṛṣṭārthaḥ sāmadānakṣamāparaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:840: 4.021.007c gato dharmajitāṃ bhūmiṃ nainaṃ śocitum arhasi
GE09ram_04_u:841: 4.021.008a sarve ca hariśārdūla putraś cāyaṃ tavāṅgadaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:843: 4.021.009a tāv imau śokasaṃtaptau śanaiḥ preraya bhāmini
GE09ram_04_u:845: 4.021.010a saṃtatiś ca yathādṛṣṭā kṛtyaṃ yac cāpi sāmpratam
GE09ram_04_u:846: 4.021.010c rājñas tat kriyatāṃ sarvam eṣa kālasya niścayaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:847: 4.021.011a saṃskāryo harirājas tu aṅgadaś cābhiṣicyatām 4.021.011c siṃhāsanagataṃ putraṃ paśyantī śāntim eṣyasi 4.021.012a sā tasya vacanaṃ śrutvā bhartṛvyasanapīḍitā 4.021.012c abravīd uttaraṃ tārā hanūmantam avasthitam 4.021.013a aṅgada pratirūpāṇāṃ putrāṇām ekataḥ śatam 4.021.013c hatasyāpy asya vīrasya gātrasaṃśleṣaṇaṃ varam 4.021.014a na cāhaṃ harirājasya prabhavāmy aṅgadasya vā
GE09ram_04_u:849: 4.021.015a na hy eṣā buddhir āstheyā hanūmann aṅgadaṃ prati 4.021.015c pitā hi bandhuḥ putrasya na mātā harisattama
GE09ram_04_u:850: 4.021.016a na hi mama harirājasaṃśrayāt; kṣamataram asti paratra ceha vā 4.021.016c abhimukhahatavīrasevitaṃ; śayanam idaṃ mama sevituṃ kṣamam 4.022.001a vīkṣamāṇas tu mandāsuḥ sarvato mandam ucchvasan
GE09ram_04_u:851: 4.022.001c ādāv eva tu sugrīvaṃ dadarśa tv ātmajāgrataḥ
GE09ram_04_u:852: 4.022.002a taṃ prāptavijayaṃ vālī sugrīvaṃ plavageśvaram 4.022.002c ābhāṣya vyaktayā vācā sasneham idam abravīt
GE09ram_04_u:853: 4.022.003a sugrīvadoṣeṇa na māṃ gantum arhasi kilbiṣāt
GE09ram_04_u:854: 4.022.003c kṛṣyamāṇaṃ bhaviṣyeṇa buddhimohena māṃ balāt 4.022.004a yugapadvihitaṃ tāta na manye sukham āvayoḥ
GE09ram_04_u:855: 4.022.004c sauhārdaṃ bhrātṛyuktaṃ hi tad idaṃ jātam anyathā
GE09ram_04_u:856: 4.022.005a pratipadya tvam adyaiva rājyam eṣāṃ vanaukasām
GE09ram_04_u:857: 4.022.005c mām apy adyaiva gacchantaṃ viddhi vaivasvatakṣayam
GE09ram_04_u:858: 4.022.006a jīvitaṃ ca hi rājyaṃ ca śriyaṃ ca vipulām imām
GE09ram_04_u:859: 4.022.006c prajahāmy eṣa vai tūrṇaṃ mahac cāgarhitaṃ yaśaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:860: 4.022.007a asyāṃ tv aham avasthāyāṃ vīra vakṣyāmi yad vacaḥ 4.022.007c yady apy asukaraṃ rājan kartum eva tad arhasi 4.022.008a sukhārhaṃ sukhasaṃvṛddhaṃ bālam enam abāliśam 4.022.008c bāṣpapūrṇamukhaṃ paśya bhūmau patitam aṅgadam 4.022.009a mama prāṇaiḥ priyataraṃ putraṃ putram ivaurasaṃ
GE09ram_04_u:861: 4.022.009c mayā hīnam ahīnārthaṃ sarvataḥ paripālaya 4.022.010a tvam apy asya hi dātā ca paritrātā ca sarvataḥ
GE09ram_04_u:862: 4.022.010c bhayeṣv abhayadaś caiva yathāhaṃ plavageśvara 4.022.011a eṣa tārātmajaḥ śrīmāṃs tvayā tulyaparākramaḥ 4.022.011c rakṣasāṃ tu vadhe teṣām agratas te bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_04_u:863: 4.022.012a anurūpāṇi karmāṇi vikramya balavān raṇe 4.022.012c kariṣyaty eṣa tāreyas tarasvī taruṇo 'ṅgadaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:865: 4.022.013c autpātike ca vividhe sarvataḥ pariniṣṭhitā 4.022.014a yad eṣā sādhv iti brūyāt kāryaṃ tan muktasaṃśayam 4.022.014c na hi tārāmataṃ kiṃ cid anyathā parivartate
GE09ram_04_u:866: 4.022.015a rāghavasya ca te kāryaṃ kartavyam aviśaṅkayā
