GE09ram_04_u:1839: 4.041.049a bhavantaś cāpi vikrāntāḥ pramāṇaṃ sarvakarmasu 4.041.049c pramāṇam enaṃ saṃsthāpya paśyadhvaṃ paścimāṃ diśam
GE09ram_04_u:1840: 4.041.050a dṛṣṭāyāṃ tu narendrasyā patnyām amitatejasaḥ 4.041.050c kṛtakṛtyā bhaviṣyāmaḥ kṛtasya pratikarmaṇā
GE09ram_04_u:1841: 4.041.051a ato 'nyad api yat kiṃ cit kāryasyāsya hitaṃ bhavet
GE09ram_04_u:1843: 4.041.052a tataḥ suṣeṇa pramukhāḥ plavaṃgamāḥ; sugrīvavākyaṃ nipuṇaṃ niśamya
GE09ram_04_u:1844: 4.041.052c āmantrya sarve plavagādhipaṃ te; jagmur diśaṃ tāṃ
GE09ram_04_u:1846: 4.042.001a tataḥ saṃdiśya sugrīvaḥ śvaśuraṃ paścimāṃ diśam
GE09ram_04_u:1847: 4.042.001c vīraṃ śatabaliṃ nāma vānaraṃ vānararṣabhaḥ 4.042.002a uvāca rājā mantrajñaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:1848: 4.042.002c vākyam ātmahitaṃ caiva rāmasya ca hitaṃ tathā
GE09ram_04_u:1850: 4.042.003c vaivasvata sutaiḥ sārdhaṃ pratiṣṭhasva svamantribhiḥ 4.042.004a diśaṃ hy udīcīṃ vikrāntāṃ himaśailāvataṃsakām 4.042.004c sarvataḥ parimārgadhvaṃ rāmapatnīm aninditām
GE09ram_04_u:1851: 4.042.005a asmin kārye vinivṛtte kṛte dāśaratheḥ priye

GE09ram_04_u:2010: 4.046.008c āgataḥ saha sainyena vīraḥ śatabalis tadā
GE09ram_04_u:2011: 4.046.009a suṣeṇaḥ paścimām āśāṃ vicitya saha vānaraiḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2012: 4.046.009c sametya māse saṃpūrṇe sugrīvam upacakrame 4.046.010a taṃ prasravaṇapṛṣṭhasthaṃ samāsādyābhivādya ca
GE09ram_04_u:2013: 4.046.010c āsīnaṃ saha rāmeṇa sugrīvam idam abruvan
GE09ram_04_u:2014: 4.046.011a vicitāḥ parvatāḥ sarve vanāni nagarāṇi ca
GE09ram_04_u:2015: 4.046.011c nimnagāḥ sāgarāntāś ca sarve janapadās tathā
GE09ram_04_u:2016: 4.046.012a guhāś ca vicitāḥ sarvā yās tvayā parikīrtitāḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2018: 4.046.013a gahaneṣu ca deśeṣu durgeṣu viṣameṣu ca
GE09ram_04_u:2019: 4.046.013c sattvāny atipramāṇāni vicitāni hatāni ca 4.046.013e ye caiva gahanā deśā vicitās te punaḥ punaḥ 4.046.014a udārasattvābhijano mahātmā; sa maithilīṃ drakṣyati vānarendraḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2020: 4.046.014c diśaṃ tu yām eva gatā tu sītā; tām āsthito vāyusuto hanūmān
GE09ram_04_u:2021: 4.047.001a sahatārāṅgadābhyāṃ tu gatvā sa hanumān kapiḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2022: 4.047.001c sugrīveṇa yathoddiṣṭaṃ taṃ deśam upacakrame 4.047.002a sa tu dūram upāgamya sarvais taiḥ kapisattamaiḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2023: 4.047.002c vicinoti sma vindhyasya guhāś ca gahanāni ca
GE09ram_04_u:2024: 4.047.003a parvatāgrān nadīdurgān sarāṃsi vipulān drumān 4.047.003c vṛkṣaṣaṇḍāṃś ca vividhān parvatān ghanapādapān 4.047.004a anveṣamāṇās te sarve vānarāḥ sarvato diśam
GE09ram_04_u:2025: 4.047.004c na sītāṃ dadṛśur vīrā maithilīṃ janakātmajām
GE09ram_04_u:2026: 4.047.005a te bhakṣayanto mūlāni phalāni vividhāni ca
GE09ram_04_u:2027: 4.047.005c anveṣamāṇā durdharṣā nyavasaṃs tatra tatra ha
GE09ram_04_u:2028: 4.047.005e sa tu deśo duranveṣo guhāgahanavān mahān
GE09ram_04_u:2029: 4.047.006a tyaktvā tu taṃ tadā deśaṃ sarve vai hariyūthapāḥ 4.047.006c deśam anyaṃ durādharṣaṃ viviśuś cākutobhayāḥ 4.047.007a yatra vandhyaphalā vṛkṣā vipuṣpāḥ parṇavarjitāḥ 4.047.007c nistoyāḥ sarito yatra mūlaṃ yatra sudurlabham
GE09ram_04_u:2030: 4.047.008a na santi mahiṣā yatra na mṛgā na ca hastinaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2031: 4.047.008c śārdūlāḥ pakṣiṇo vāpi ye cānye vanagocarāḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2032: 4.047.009a snigdhapatrāḥ sthale yatra padminyaḥ phullapaṅkajāḥ 4.047.009c prekṣaṇīyāḥ sugandhāś ca bhramaraiś cāpi varjitāḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2033: 4.047.010a kaṇḍur nāma mahābhāgaḥ satyavādī tapodhanaḥ 4.047.010c maharṣiḥ paramāmarṣī niyamair duṣpradharṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2034: 4.047.011a tasya tasmin vane putro bālako daśavārṣikaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2035: 4.047.011c pranaṣṭo jīvitāntāya kruddhas tatra mahāmuniḥ 4.047.012a tena dharmātmanā śaptaṃ kṛtsnaṃ tatra mahad vanam
GE09ram_04_u:2037: 4.047.013a tasya te kānanāntāṃs tu girīṇāṃ kandarāṇi ca
GE09ram_04_u:2039: 4.047.014a tatra cāpi mahātmāno nāpaśyañ janakātmajām 4.047.014c hartāraṃ rāvaṇaṃ vāpi
GE09ram_04_u:2040: 4.047.015a te praviśya tu taṃ bhīmaṃ latāgulmasamāvṛtam
GE09ram_04_u:2042: 4.047.016a taṃ dṛṣṭvā vanarā ghoraṃ sthitaṃ śailam ivāparam
GE09ram_04_u:2043: 4.047.016c gāḍhaṃ parihitāḥ sarve dṛṣṭvā taṃ parvatopamam
GE09ram_04_u:2044: 4.047.017a so 'pi tān vānarān sarvān naṣṭāḥ sthety abravīd balī
GE09ram_04_u:2045: 4.047.017c abhyadhāvata saṃkruddho muṣṭim udyamya saṃhitam 4.047.018a tam āpatantaṃ sahasā vāliputro 'ṅgadas tadā
GE09ram_04_u:2047: 4.047.019a sa vāliputrābhihato vaktrāc choṇitam udvaman 4.047.020a asuro nyapatad bhūmau paryasta iva parvataḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2048: 4.047.020c te tu tasmin nirucchvāse vānarā jitakāśinaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2049: 4.047.020e vyacinvan prāyaśas tatra sarvaṃ tad girigahvaram
GE09ram_04_u:2050: 4.047.021a vicitaṃ tu tataḥ kṛtvā sarve te kānanaṃ punaḥ 4.047.021c anyadevāparaṃ ghoraṃ viviśur girigahvaram
GE09ram_04_u:2051: 4.047.022a te vicintya punaḥ khinnā viniṣpatya samāgatāḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2052: 4.047.022c ekānte vṛkṣamūle tu niṣedur dīnamānasāḥ 4.048.001a athāṅgadas tadā sarvān vānarān idam abravīt
GE09ram_04_u:2053: 4.048.001c pariśrānto mahāprājñaḥ samāśvāsya śanair vacaḥ 4.048.002a vanāni girayo nadyo durgāṇi gahanāni ca
GE09ram_04_u:2054: 4.048.002c daryo giriguhāś caiva vicitā naḥ samantataḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2055: 4.048.003a tatra tatra sahāsmābhir jānakī na ca dṛśyate
GE09ram_04_u:2056: 4.048.003c tad vā rakṣo hṛtā yena sītā surasutopamā
GE09ram_04_u:2057: 4.048.004a kālaś ca no mahān yātaḥ sugrīvaś cograśāsanaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2058: 4.048.004c tasmād bhavantaḥ sahitā vicinvantu samantataḥ 4.048.005a vihāya tandrīṃ śokaṃ ca nidrāṃ caiva samutthitām
GE09ram_04_u:2059: 4.048.005c vicinudhvaṃ yathā sītāṃ paśyāmo janakātmajām 4.048.006a anirvedaṃ ca dākṣyaṃ ca manasaś cāparājayam
GE09ram_04_u:2060: 4.048.006c kāryasiddhikarāṇy āhus tasmād etad bravīmy aham
GE09ram_04_u:2061: 4.048.007a adyāpīdaṃ vanaṃ durgaṃ vicinvantu vanaukasaḥ 4.048.007c khedaṃ tyaktvā punaḥ sarvaṃ vanam etad vicīyatām
GE09ram_04_u:2062: 4.048.008a avaśyaṃ kriyamāṇasya dṛśyate karmaṇaḥ phalam 4.048.008c alaṃ nirvedam āgamya na hi no malinaṃ kṣamam 4.048.009a sugrīvaḥ krodhano rājā tīkṣṇadaṇḍaś ca vānarāḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2063: 4.048.009c bhetavyaṃ tasya satataṃ rāmasya ca mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2064: 4.048.010a hitārtham etad uktaṃ vaḥ kriyatāṃ yadi rocate
GE09ram_04_u:2065: 4.048.010c ucyatāṃ vā kṣamaṃ yan naḥ sarveṣām eva vānarāḥ 4.048.011a aṅgadasya vacaḥ śrutvā vacanaṃ gandhamādanaḥ 4.048.011c uvācāvyaktayā vācā pipāsā śramakhinnayā
GE09ram_04_u:2066: 4.048.012a sadṛśaṃ khalu vo vākyam aṅgado yad uvāca ha 4.048.012c hitaṃ caivānukūlaṃ ca kriyatām asya bhāṣitam
GE09ram_04_u:2067: 4.048.013a punar mārgāmahe śailān kandarāṃś ca darīs tathā
GE09ram_04_u:2068: 4.048.013c kānanāni ca śūnyāni giriprasravaṇāni ca 4.048.014a yathoddiṣṭhāni sarvāṇi sugrīveṇa
GE09ram_04_u:2069: 4.048.014c vicinvantu vanaṃ sarve giridurgāṇi sarvaśaḥ 4.048.015a tataḥ samutthāya punar vānarās te mahābalāḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2072: 4.048.016c śṛṅgavantaṃ darīvantam adhiruhya ca vānarāḥ 4.048.017a tatra lodhravanaṃ ramyaṃ saptaparṇavanāni ca 4.048.017c vicinvanto harivarāḥ sītādarśanakāṅkṣiṇaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2073: 4.048.018a tasyāgram adhirūḍhās te śrāntā vipulavikramāḥ 4.048.018c na paśyanti sma vaidehīṃ rāmasya mahiṣīṃ priyām
GE09ram_04_u:2074: 4.048.019a te tu dṛṣṭigataṃ kṛtvā taṃ śailaṃ bahukandaram
GE09ram_04_u:2076: 4.048.020a avaruhya tato bhūmiṃ śrāntā vigatacetasaḥ 4.048.020c sthitvā muhūrtaṃ tatrātha vṛkṣamūlam upāśritāḥ 4.048.021a te muhūrtaṃ samāśvastāḥ kiṃ cid bhagnapariśramāḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2077: 4.048.021c punar evodyatāḥ kṛtsnāṃ mārgituṃ dakṣiṇāṃ diśam
GE09ram_04_u:2078: 4.048.022a hanumatpramukhās te tu prasthitāḥ plavagarṣabhāḥ 4.048.022c vindhyam evāditas tāvad vicerus te samantataḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2079: 4.049.001a saha tārāṅgadābhyāṃ tu saṃgamya hanumān kapiḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2080: 4.049.001c vicinoti sma vindhyasya guhāś ca gahanāni ca
GE09ram_04_u:2081: 4.049.002a siṃhaśārdūlajuṣṭāś ca guhāś ca paritas tathā
GE09ram_04_u:2083: 4.049.003a teṣāṃ tatraiva vasatāṃ sa kālo vyatyavartata
GE09ram_04_u:2084: 4.049.004a sa hi deśo duranveṣo guhā gahanavān mahān
GE09ram_04_u:2085: 4.049.004c tatra vāyusutaḥ sarvaṃ vicinoti sma parvatam
GE09ram_04_u:2087: 4.049.005c gajo gavākṣo gavayaḥ śarabho gandhamādanaḥ 4.049.006a maindaś ca dvividaś caiva hanumāñ jāmbavān api
GE09ram_04_u:2088: 4.049.006c aṅgado yuvarājaś ca tāraś ca vanagocaraḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2089: 4.049.007a girijālāvṛtān deśān mārgitvā dakṣiṇāṃ diśam 4.049.007c kṣutpipāsā parītāś ca śrāntāś ca salilārthinaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2090: 4.049.007e avakīrṇaṃ latāvṛkṣair dadṛśus te mahābilam 4.049.008a tataḥ krauñcāś ca haṃsāś ca sārasāś cāpi niṣkraman 4.049.008c jalārdrāś cakravākāś ca raktāṅgāḥ padmareṇubhiḥ 4.049.009a tatas tad bilam āsādya sugandhi duratikramam
GE09ram_04_u:2092: 4.049.010a saṃjātapariśaṅkās te tad bilaṃ plavagottamāḥ 4.049.010c abhyapadyanta saṃhṛṣṭās tejovanto mahābalāḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2094: 4.049.011c abravīd vānarān sarvān kāntāra vanakovidaḥ 4.049.012a girijālāvṛtān deśān mārgitvā dakṣiṇāṃ diśam 4.049.012c vayaṃ sarve pariśrāntā na ca paśyāmi maithilīm
GE09ram_04_u:2095: 4.049.013a asmāc cāpi bilād dhaṃsāḥ krauñcāś ca saha sārasaiḥ 4.049.013c jalārdrāś cakravākāś ca niṣpatanti sma sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2096: 4.049.014a nūnaṃ salilavān atra kūpo vā yadi vā hradaḥ 4.049.014c tathā ceme biladvāre snigdhās tiṣṭhanti pādapāḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2097: 4.049.015a ity uktās tad bilaṃ sarve viviśus timirāvṛtam
GE09ram_04_u:2099: 4.049.016a tatas tasmin bile durge nānāpādapasaṃkule 4.049.016c anyonyaṃ saṃpariṣvajya jagmur yojanam antaram 4.049.017a te naṣṭasaṃjñās tṛṣitāḥ saṃbhrāntāḥ salilārthinaḥ 4.049.017c paripetur bile tasmin kaṃ cit kālam atandritāḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2100: 4.049.018a te kṛśā dīnavadanāḥ pariśrāntāḥ plavaṃgamāḥ 4.049.018c ālokaṃ dadṛśur vīrā nirāśā jīvite tadā
GE09ram_04_u:2101: 4.049.019a tatas taṃ deśam āgamya saumyaṃ vitimiraṃ vanam
GE09ram_04_u:2103: 4.049.020a sālāṃs tālāṃś ca puṃnāgān kakubhān vañjulān dhavān
GE09ram_04_u:2104: 4.049.020c campakān nāgavṛkṣāṃś ca karṇikārāṃś ca puṣpitān
GE09ram_04_u:2106: 4.049.022a mahadbhiḥ kāñcanair vṛkṣair vṛtaṃ bālārka saṃnibhaiḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2107: 4.049.022c jātarūpamayair matsyair mahadbhiś ca sakacchapaiḥ 4.049.023a nalinīs tatra dadṛśuḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2108: 4.049.023c kāñcanāni vimānāni rājatāni tathaiva ca 4.049.024a tapanīyagavākṣāṇi muktājālāvṛtāni
GE09ram_04_u:2110: 4.049.025a dadṛśus tatra harayo gṛhamukhyāni sarvaśaḥ 4.049.025c puṣpitān phalino vṛkṣān
GE09ram_04_u:2111: 4.049.026a kāñcanabhramarāṃś caiva madhūni ca samantataḥ 4.049.026c maṇikāñcanacitrāṇi śayanāny āsanāni ca
GE09ram_04_u:2112: 4.049.027a mahārhāṇi ca yānāni dadṛśus te samantataḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2114: 4.049.028a agarūṇāṃ ca divyānāṃ candanānāṃ ca saṃcayān
GE09ram_04_u:2115: 4.049.028c śucīny abhyavahāryāṇi mūlāni ca phalāni ca
GE09ram_04_u:2116: 4.049.029a mahārhāṇi ca pānāni madhūni rasavanti ca
GE09ram_04_u:2117: 4.049.029c divyānām ambarāṇāṃ ca mahārhāṇāṃ ca saṃcayān
GE09ram_04_u:2118: 4.049.029e kambalānāṃ ca citrāṇām ajinānāṃ ca saṃcayān
GE09ram_04_u:2119: 4.049.030a tatra tatra vicinvanto bile tatra mahāprabhāḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2120: 4.049.030c dadṛśur vānarāḥ śūrāḥ striyaṃ kāṃ cid adūrataḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2122: 4.049.031c tāpasīṃ niyatāhārāṃ jvalantīm iva tejasā 4.049.032a tato hanūmān girisaṃnikāśaḥ; kṛtāñjalis tām abhivādya vṛddhām
GE09ram_04_u:2123: 4.049.032c papraccha kā tvaṃ bhavanaṃ bilaṃ ca; ratnāni cemāni vadasva
GE09ram_04_u:2125: 4.050.001a ity uktvā hanumāṃs tatra punaḥ kṛṣṇājināmbarām
GE09ram_04_u:2126: 4.050.001c abravīt tāṃ mahābhāgāṃ tāpasīṃ dharmacāriṇīm 4.050.002a idaṃ praviṣṭāḥ sahasā bilaṃ timirasaṃvṛtam 4.050.002c kṣutpipāsā pariśrāntāḥ parikhinnāś ca sarvaśaḥ 4.050.003a mahad dhiraṇyā vivaraṃ praviṣṭāḥ sma pipāsitāḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2127: 4.050.003c imāṃs tv evaṃ vidhān bhāvān vividhān adbhutopamān
GE09ram_04_u:2128: 4.050.003e dṛṣṭvā vayaṃ pravyathitāḥ saṃbhrāntā naṣṭacetasaḥ 4.050.004a kasyeme kāñcanā vṛkṣās taruṇādityasaṃnibhāḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2129: 4.050.004c śucīny abhyavahāryāṇi mūlāni ca phalāni ca
GE09ram_04_u:2130: 4.050.005a kāñcanāni vimānāni rājatāni gṛhāṇi ca 4.050.005c tapanīya gavākṣāṇi maṇijālāvṛtāni
GE09ram_04_u:2131: 4.050.006a puṣpitāḥ phālavantaś ca puṇyāḥ surabhigandhinaḥ 4.050.006c ime jāmbūnadamayāḥ pādapāḥ kasya tejasā 4.050.007a kāñcanāni ca padmāni jātāni vimale jale
GE09ram_04_u:2132: 4.050.007c kathaṃ matsyāś ca sauvarṇā caranti saha kacchapaiḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2133: 4.050.008a ātmānam anubhāvaṃ ca kasya caitat tapobalam
GE09ram_04_u:2134: 4.050.008c ajānatāṃ naḥ sarveṣāṃ sarvam ākhyātum arhasi
GE09ram_04_u:2135: 4.050.009a evam uktā hanumatā tāpasī dharmacāriṇī 4.050.009c pratyuvāca hanūmantaṃ sarvabhūtahite
GE09ram_04_u:2136: 4.050.010a mayo nāma mahātejā māyāvī dānavarṣabhaḥ 4.050.010c tenedaṃ nirmitaṃ sarvaṃ māyayā kāñcanaṃ vanam
GE09ram_04_u:2137: 4.050.011a purā dānavamukhyānāṃ viśvakarmā babhūva ha 4.050.011c yenedaṃ kāñcanaṃ divyaṃ nirmitaṃ bhavanottamam 4.050.012a sa tu varṣasahasrāṇi tapas taptvā mahāvane
GE09ram_04_u:2138: 4.050.012c pitāmahād varaṃ lebhe sarvam auśasanaṃ dhanam
GE09ram_04_u:2139: 4.050.013a vidhāya sarvaṃ balavān sarvakāmeśvaras tadā 4.050.013c uvāsa sukhitaḥ kālaṃ kaṃ cid asmin mahāvane
GE09ram_04_u:2140: 4.050.014a tam apsarasi hemāyāṃ saktaṃ dānavapuṃgavam 4.050.014c vikramyaivāśaniṃ gṛhya jaghāneśaḥ puraṃdaraḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2141: 4.050.015a idaṃ ca brahmaṇā dattaṃ hemāyai vanam uttamam
GE09ram_04_u:2142: 4.050.015c śāśvataḥ kāmabhogaś ca gṛhaṃ cedaṃ hiraṇmayam
GE09ram_04_u:2143: 4.050.016a duhitā merusāvarṇer ahaṃ tasyāḥ svayaṃ prabhā
GE09ram_04_u:2144: 4.050.016c idaṃ rakṣāmi bhavanaṃ hemāyā vānarottama 4.050.017a mama priyasakhī hemā nṛttagītaviśāradā
GE09ram_04_u:2145: 4.050.017c tayā dattavarā cāsmi rakṣāmi bhavanottamam 4.050.018a kiṃ kāryaṃ kasya vā hetoḥ kāntārāṇi prapadyatha
GE09ram_04_u:2146: 4.050.018c kathaṃ cedaṃ vanaṃ durgaṃ yuṣmābhir upalakṣitam
GE09ram_04_u:2147: 4.050.019a imāny abhyavahāryāṇi mūlāni ca phalāni ca
GE09ram_04_u:2148: 4.050.019c bhuktvā pītvā ca pānīyaṃ sarvaṃ me vaktum arhatha 4.051.001a atha tān abravīt sarvān viśrāntān hariyūthapān
GE09ram_04_u:2149: 4.051.001c idaṃ vacanam ekāgrā tāpasī dharmacāriṇī 4.051.002a vānarā yadi vaḥ khedaḥ pranaṣṭaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2150: 4.051.002c yadi caitan mayā śrāvyaṃ śrotum icchāmi kathyatām
GE09ram_04_u:2151: 4.051.003a tasyās tad vacanaṃ śrutvā hanumān mārutātmajaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2154: 4.051.004c rāmo dāśarathiḥ śrīmān praviṣṭo daṇḍakāvanam 4.051.005a lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā vaidehyā cāpi bhāryayā
GE09ram_04_u:2155: 4.051.005c tasya bhāryā janasthānād rāvaṇena hṛtā balāt
GE09ram_04_u:2156: 4.051.006a vīras tasya sakhā rājñaḥ sugrīvo nāma vānaraḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2157: 4.051.006c rājā vānaramukhyānāṃ yena prasthāpitā vayam 4.051.007a agastyacaritām āśāṃ dakṣiṇāṃ
GE09ram_04_u:2158: 4.051.007c sahaibhir vānarair mukhyair aṅgadapramukhair vayam 4.051.008a rāvaṇaṃ sahitāḥ sarve rākṣasaṃ kāmarūpiṇam 4.051.008c sītayā saha vaidehyā mārgadhvam iti coditāḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2159: 4.051.009a vicitya tu vayaṃ sarve samagrāṃ dakṣiṇāṃ diśam
GE09ram_04_u:2163: 4.051.011a cārayantas tataś cakṣur dṛṣṭavanto mahad bilam
GE09ram_04_u:2165: 4.051.012a asmād dhaṃsā jalaklinnāḥ pakṣaiḥ salilareṇubhiḥ 4.051.012c kurarāḥ sārasāś caiva niṣpatanti patatriṇaḥ 4.051.012e sādhv atra praviśāmeti mayā tūktāḥ plavaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2166: 4.051.013a teṣām api hi sarveṣām anumānam upāgatam
GE09ram_04_u:2168: 4.051.014a tato gāḍhaṃ nipatitā gṛhya hastau parasparam
GE09ram_04_u:2169: 4.051.014c idaṃ praviṣṭāḥ sahasā bilaṃ timirasaṃvṛtam 4.051.015a etan naḥ kāyam etena kṛtyena vayam āgatāḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2170: 4.051.015c tvāṃ caivopagatāḥ sarve paridyūnā bubhukṣitāḥ 4.051.016a ātithyadharmadattāni mūlāni ca phalāni ca 4.051.016c asmābhir upabhuktāni bubhukṣāparipīḍitaiḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2171: 4.051.017a yat tvayā rakṣitāḥ sarve mriyamāṇā bubhukṣayā
GE09ram_04_u:2172: 4.051.017c brūhi pratyupakārārthaṃ kiṃ te kurvantu vānarāḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2173: 4.051.018a evam uktā tu sarvajñā vānarais taiḥ svayaṃprabhā
GE09ram_04_u:2174: 4.051.018c pratyuvāca tataḥ sarvān idaṃ vānarayūthapam 4.051.019a sarveṣāṃ parituṣṭāsmi vānarāṇāṃ tarasvinām
GE09ram_04_u:2175: 4.051.019c carantyā mama dharmeṇa na kāryam iha kena cit 4.052.001a evam uktaḥ śubhaṃ vākyaṃ tāpasyā dharmasaṃhitam
GE09ram_04_u:2176: 4.052.001c uvāca hanumān vākyaṃ tām aninditaceṣṭitām 4.052.002a śaraṇaṃ tvāṃ prapannāḥ smaḥ sarve vai dharmacāriṇi
GE09ram_04_u:2177: 4.052.002c yaḥ kṛtaḥ samayo 'smākaṃ sugrīveṇa mahātmanā 4.052.002e sa tu kālo vyatikrānto bile ca parivartatām
GE09ram_04_u:2178: 4.052.003a sā tvam asmād bilād ghorād uttārayitum arhasi
GE09ram_04_u:2180: 4.052.004c trātum arhasi naḥ sarvān sugrīvabhayaśaṅkitān 4.052.005a mahac ca kāryam asmābhiḥ kartavyaṃ dharmacāriṇi
GE09ram_04_u:2181: 4.052.005c tac cāpi na kṛtaṃ kāryam asmābhir iha vāsibhiḥ 4.052.006a evam uktā hanumatā tāpasī vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_04_u:2182: 4.052.006c jīvatā duṣkaraṃ manye praviṣṭena nivartitum 4.052.007a tapasas tu prabhāvena niyamopārjitena ca 4.052.007c sarvān eva bilād asmād uddhariṣyāmi vānarān
GE09ram_04_u:2184: 4.052.008c na hi niṣkramituṃ śakyam animīlitalocanaiḥ 4.052.009a tataḥ saṃmīlitāḥ sarve sukumārāṅgulaiḥ karaiḥ 4.052.009c sahasā pidadhur dṛṣṭiṃ hṛṣṭā gamanakāṅkṣiṇaḥ 4.052.010a vānarās tu mahātmāno hastaruddhamukhās tadā 4.052.010c nimeṣāntaramātreṇa bilād uttāritās tayā
GE09ram_04_u:2185: 4.052.011a tatas tān vānarān sarvāṃs tāpasī dharmacāriṇī
GE09ram_04_u:2186: 4.052.011c niḥsṛtān viṣamāt tasmāt samāśvāsyedam abravīt 4.052.012a eṣa vindhyo giriḥ śrīmān nānādrumalatāyutaḥ 4.052.012c eṣa prasavaṇaḥ śailaḥ sāgaro 'yaṃ mahodadhiḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2188: 4.052.013c ity uktvā tad bilaṃ śrīmat praviveśa svayaṃprabhā
GE09ram_04_u:2189: 4.052.014a tatas te dadṛśur ghoraṃ sāgaraṃ varuṇālayam
GE09ram_04_u:2190: 4.052.014c apāram abhigarjantaṃ ghorair ūrmibhir ākulam 4.052.015a mayasya māyā vihitaṃ giridurgaṃ vicinvatām 4.052.015c teṣāṃ māso vyatikrānto yo rājñā samayaḥ kṛtaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2191: 4.052.016a vindhyasya tu gireḥ pāde saṃprapuṣpitapādape 4.052.016c upaviśya mahābhāgāś cintām āpedire tadā 4.052.017a tataḥ puṣpātibhārāgrāṃl latāśatasamāvṛtān
GE09ram_04_u:2192: 4.052.017c drumān vāsantikān dṛṣṭvā babhūvur bhayaśaṅkitāḥ 4.052.018a te vasantam anuprāptaṃ prativedya parasparam 4.052.018c naṣṭasaṃdeśakālārthā nipetur dharaṇītale
GE09ram_04_u:2193: 4.052.019a sa tu siṃharṣabha skandhaḥ pīnāyatabhujaḥ kapiḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2194: 4.052.019c yuvarājo mahāprājña aṅgado vākyam abravīt 4.052.020a śāsanāt kapirājasya vayaṃ sarve vinirgatāḥ 4.052.020c māsaḥ pūrṇo bilasthānāṃ harayaḥ kiṃ na budhyate
GE09ram_04_u:2195: 4.052.021a tasminn atīte kāle tu sugrīveṇa kṛte svayam
GE09ram_04_u:2196: 4.052.021c prāyopaveśanaṃ yuktaṃ sarveṣāṃ ca vanaukasām 4.052.022a tīkṣṇaḥ prakṛtyā sugrīvaḥ svāmibhāve vyavasthitaḥ 4.052.022c na kṣamiṣyati naḥ sarvān aparādhakṛto gatān
GE09ram_04_u:2197: 4.052.023a apravṛttau ca sītāyāḥ pāpam eva kariṣyati
GE09ram_04_u:2198: 4.052.023c tasmāt kṣamam ihādyaiva prāyopaviśanaṃ hi naḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2199: 4.052.024a tyaktvā putrāṃś ca dārāṃś ca dhanāni ca gṛhāṇi ca
GE09ram_04_u:2200: 4.052.024c yāvan na ghātayed rājā sarvān pratigatān itaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2201: 4.052.024e vadhenāpratirūpeṇa śreyān mṛtyur ihaiva naḥ 4.052.025a na cāhaṃ yauvarājyena
GE09ram_04_u:2203: 4.052.026a sa pūrvaṃ baddhavairo māṃ rājā dṛṣṭvā vyatikramam
GE09ram_04_u:2205: 4.052.027a kiṃ me suhṛdbhir vyasanaṃ paśyadbhir jīvitāntare
GE09ram_04_u:2206: 4.052.027c ihaiva prāyam āsiṣye puṇye sāgararodhasi 4.052.028a etac chrutvā kumāreṇa yuvarājena bhāṣitam 4.052.028c sarve te vānaraśreṣṭhāḥ karuṇaṃ vākyam abruvan
GE09ram_04_u:2207: 4.052.029a tīkṣṇaḥ prakṛtyā sugrīvaḥ priyāsaktaś ca rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2208: 4.052.029c adṛṣṭāyāṃ ca vaidehyāṃ dṛṣṭvāsmāṃś ca samāgatān
GE09ram_04_u:2210: 4.052.030c na kṣamaṃ cāparāddhānāṃ gamanaṃ svāmipārśvataḥ 4.052.031a plavaṃgamānāṃ tu bhayārditānāṃ; śrutvā vacas tāra idaṃ babhāṣe 4.052.031c alaṃ viṣādena bilaṃ praviśya; vasāma sarve yadi rocate vaḥ 4.052.032a idaṃ hi māyā vihitaṃ sudurgamaṃ; prabhūtavṛkṣodakabhojyapeyam
GE09ram_04_u:2211: 4.052.032c ihāsti no naiva bhayaṃ puraṃdarān; na rāghavād vānararājato 'pi
GE09ram_04_u:2213: 4.052.033a śrutvāṅgadasyāpi vaco 'nukūlam; ūcuś ca sarve harayaḥ pratītāḥ 4.052.033c yathā na hanyema tathāvidhānam; asaktam adyaiva vidhīyatāṃ naḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2214: 4.053.001a tathā bruvati tāre tu tārādhipativarcasi 4.053.001c atha mene hṛtaṃ rājyaṃ hanumān aṅgadena tat
GE09ram_04_u:2215: 4.053.002a buddhyā hy aṣṭāṅgayā yuktaṃ caturbalasamanvitam 4.053.002c caturdaśaguṇaṃ mene hanumān vālinaḥ sutam 4.053.003a āpūryamāṇaṃ śaśvac ca tejobalaparākramaiḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2216: 4.053.003c śaśinaṃ śuklapakṣādau vardhamānam iva śriyā 4.053.004a bṛhaspatisamaṃ buddhyā vikrame sadṛśaṃ pituḥ 4.053.004c śuśrūṣamāṇaṃ tārasya śukrasyeva puraṃdaram
GE09ram_04_u:2218: 4.053.005c abhisaṃdhātum ārebhe hanumān aṅgadaṃ tataḥ 4.053.006a sa caturṇām upāyānāṃ tṛtīyam upavarṇayan 4.053.006c bhedayām āsa tān sarvān vānarān vākyasaṃpadā
GE09ram_04_u:2221: 4.053.008a tvaṃ samarthataraḥ pitrā yuddhe tāreya vai dhuram
GE09ram_04_u:2222: 4.053.008c dṛḍhaṃ dhārayituṃ śaktaḥ kapirājyaṃ yathā pitā
GE09ram_04_u:2223: 4.053.009a nityam asthiracittā hi kapayo haripuṃgava 4.053.009c nājñāpyaṃ viṣahiṣyanti putradārān vinā tvayā 4.053.010a tvāṃ naite hy anuyuñjeyuḥ pratyakṣaṃ pravadāmi te
GE09ram_04_u:2224: 4.053.010c yathāyaṃ jāmbavān nīlaḥ suhotraś ca mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2225: 4.053.011a na hy ahaṃ ta ime sarve sāmadānādibhir guṇaiḥ 4.053.011c daṇḍena na tvayā śakyāḥ sugrīvād apakarṣitum
GE09ram_04_u:2226: 4.053.012a vigṛhyāsanam apy āhur durbalena balīyasaḥ 4.053.012c ātmarakṣākaras tasmān na vigṛhṇīta durbalaḥ 4.053.013a yāṃ cemāṃ manyase dhātrīm etad bilam iti śrutam 4.053.013c etal lakṣmaṇabāṇānām īṣatkāryaṃ vidāraṇe
GE09ram_04_u:2227: 4.053.014a svalpaṃ hi kṛtam indreṇa kṣipatā hy aśaniṃ purā 4.053.014c lakṣmaṇo niśitair bāṇair bhindyāt patrapuṭaṃ yathā
GE09ram_04_u:2228: 4.053.014e lakṣmaṇasya ca nārācā bahavaḥ santi tadvidhāḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2229: 4.053.015a avasthāne yadaiva tvam āsiṣyasi paraṃtapa 4.053.015c tadaiva harayaḥ sarve tyakṣyanti kṛtaniścayāḥ 4.053.016a smarantaḥ putradārāṇāṃ nityodvignā bubhukṣitāḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2230: 4.053.016c kheditā duḥkhaśayyābhis tvāṃ kariṣyanti pṛṣṭhataḥ 4.053.017a sa tvaṃ hīnaḥ suhṛdbhiś ca hitakāmaiś ca bandhubhiḥ 4.053.017c tṛṇād api bhṛśodvignaḥ spandamānād bhaviṣyasi 4.053.018a na ca jātu na hiṃsyus tvāṃ ghorā lakṣmaṇasāyakāḥ 4.053.018c apavṛttaṃ jighāṃsanto mahāvegā durāsadāḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2231: 4.053.019a asmābhis tu gataṃ sārdhaṃ vinītavad upasthitam
GE09ram_04_u:2232: 4.053.019c ānupūrvyāt tu sugrīvo rājye tvāṃ sthāpayiṣyati
GE09ram_04_u:2233: 4.053.020a dharmakāmaḥ pitṛvyas te prītikāmo dṛḍhavrataḥ 4.053.020c śuciḥ satyapratijñaś ca nā tvāṃ jātu jighāṃsati
GE09ram_04_u:2234: 4.053.021a priyakāmaś ca te mātus tadarthaṃ cāsya jīvitam
GE09ram_04_u:2235: 4.053.021c tasyāpatyaṃ ca nāsty anyat tasmād aṅgada gamyatām
GE09ram_04_u:2236: 4.054.001a śrutvā hanumato vākyaṃ praśritaṃ dharmasaṃhitam 4.054.001c svāmisatkārasaṃyuktam aṅgado vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_04_u:2237: 4.054.002a sthairyaṃ sarvātmanā śaucam ānṛśaṃsyam athārjavam 4.054.002c vikramaiś caiva dhairyaṃ ca sugrīve nopapadyate
GE09ram_04_u:2238: 4.054.003a bhrātur jyeṣṭhasya yo bhāryāṃ jīvito mahiṣīṃ priyām
GE09ram_04_u:2239: 4.054.003c dharmeṇa mātaraṃ yas tu svīkaroti jugupsitaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2240: 4.054.004a kathaṃ sa dharmaṃ jānīte yena bhrātrā durātmanā
GE09ram_04_u:2242: 4.054.005a satyāt pāṇigṛhītaś ca kṛtakarmā mahāyaśāḥ 4.054.005c vismṛto rāghavo yena sa kasya sukṛtaṃ smaret
GE09ram_04_u:2244: 4.054.006c ādiṣṭā mārgituṃ sītāṃ dharmam asmin kathaṃ bhavet
GE09ram_04_u:2245: 4.054.007a tasmin pāpe kṛtaghne tu smṛtihīne calātmani
GE09ram_04_u:2246: 4.054.007c āryaḥ ko viśvasej jātu tat kulīno jijīviṣuḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2247: 4.054.008a rājye putraṃ pratiṣṭhāpya saguṇo nirguṇo 'pi vā
GE09ram_04_u:2248: 4.054.008c kathaṃ śatrukulīnaṃ māṃ sugrīvo jīvayiṣyati 4.054.009a bhinnamantro 'parāddhaś ca hīnaśaktiḥ kathaṃ hy aham 4.054.009c kiṣkindhāṃ prāpya jīveyam anātha iva durbalaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2250: 4.054.010c śaṭhaḥ krūro nṛśaṃsaś ca sugrīvo rājyakāraṇāt
GE09ram_04_u:2251: 4.054.011a bandhanāc cāvasādān me śreyaḥ prāyopaveśanam 4.054.011c anujānīta māṃ sarve gṛhān gacchantu vānarāḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2252: 4.054.012a ahaṃ vaḥ pratijānāmi na gamiṣyāmy ahaṃ purīm
GE09ram_04_u:2253: 4.054.012c ihaiva prāyam āsiṣye śreyo maraṇam eva me
GE09ram_04_u:2254: 4.054.013a abhivādanapūrvaṃ tu rājā kuśalam eva ca
GE09ram_04_u:2255: 4.054.013c vācyas tato yavīyān me sugrīvo vānareśvaraḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2256: 4.054.014a ārogyapūrvaṃ kuśalaṃ vācyā mātā rumā ca me
GE09ram_04_u:2257: 4.054.014c mātaraṃ caiva me tārām āśvāsayitum arhatha
GE09ram_04_u:2258: 4.054.015a prakṛtyā priyaputrā sā sānukrośā tapasvinī 4.054.015c vinaṣṭaṃ mām iha śrutvā vyaktaṃ hāsyati jīvitam
GE09ram_04_u:2259: 4.054.016a etāvad uktvā vacanaṃ vṛddhān apy abhivādya ca
GE09ram_04_u:2260: 4.054.016c saṃviveśāṅgado bhūmau rudan darbheṣu durmanāḥ 4.054.017a tasya saṃviśatas tatra rudanto vānararṣabhāḥ 4.054.017c nayanebhyaḥ pramumucur uṣṇaṃ vai vāriduḥkhitāḥ 4.054.018a sugrīvaṃ caiva nindantaḥ praśaṃsantaś ca vālinam
GE09ram_04_u:2261: 4.054.018c parivāryāṅgado sarve vyavasyan prāyam āsitum 4.054.019a mataṃ tad vāliputrasya vijñāya plavagarṣabhāḥ 4.054.019c upaspṛśyodakaṃ sarve prāṅmukhāḥ samupāviśan
GE09ram_04_u:2263: 4.054.020a sa saṃviśadbhir bahubhir mahīdharo; mahādrikūṭapramitaiḥ plavaṃgamaiḥ 4.054.021c babhūva saṃnāditanirjharāntaro; bhṛśaṃ nadadbhir jaladair
GE09ram_04_u:2265: 4.055.001a upaviṣṭās tu te sarve yasmin prāyaṃ giristhale
GE09ram_04_u:2266: 4.055.001c harayo gṛdhrarājaś ca taṃ deśam upacakrame
GE09ram_04_u:2267: 4.055.002a sāmpātir nāma nāmnā tu cirajīvī vihaṃgamaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2269: 4.055.003a kandarād abhiniṣkramya sa vindhyasya mahāgireḥ 4.055.003c upaviṣṭān harīn dṛṣṭvā hṛṣṭātmā giram abravīt
GE09ram_04_u:2270: 4.055.004a vidhiḥ kila naraṃ loke vidhānenānuvartate 4.055.004c yathāyaṃ vihito bhakṣyaś cirān mahyam upāgataḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2271: 4.055.005a paramparāṇāṃ bhakṣiṣye vānarāṇāṃ mṛtaṃ mṛtam 4.055.005c uvācaivaṃ vacaḥ pakṣī tān nirīkṣya plavaṃgamān
GE09ram_04_u:2272: 4.055.006a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā bhakṣalubdhasya pakṣiṇaḥ 4.055.006c aṅgadaḥ param āyasto hanūmantam athābravīt 4.055.007a paśya sītāpadeśena sākṣād vaivasvato yamaḥ 4.055.007c imaṃ deśam anuprāpto vānarāṇāṃ vipattaye 4.055.008a rāmasya na kṛtaṃ kāryaṃ rājño na ca vacaḥ kṛtam
GE09ram_04_u:2273: 4.055.008c harīṇām iyam ajñātā vipattiḥ sahasāgatā 4.055.009a vaidehyāḥ priyakāmena kṛtaṃ karma jaṭāyuṣā 4.055.009c gṛdhrarājena yat tatra śrutaṃ vas tad aśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2274: 4.055.010a tathā sarvāṇi bhūtāni tiryagyonigatāny api 4.055.010c priyaṃ kurvanti rāmasya tyaktvā prāṇān yathā vayam
GE09ram_04_u:2276: 4.055.011c kāntārāṇi prapannāḥ sma na ca paśyāma maithilīm
GE09ram_04_u:2277: 4.055.012a sa sukhī gṛdhrarājas tu rāvaṇena hato raṇe
GE09ram_04_u:2278: 4.055.012c muktaś ca sugrīvabhayād gataś ca paramāṃ gatim
GE09ram_04_u:2279: 4.055.013a jaṭāyuṣo vināśena rājño daśarathasya ca 4.055.013c haraṇena ca vaidehyāḥ saṃśayaṃ harayo gatāḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2280: 4.055.014a rāmalakṣmaṇayor vāsām araṇye saha sītayā 4.055.014c rāghavasya ca bāṇena vālinaś ca tathā vadhaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2281: 4.055.015a rāmakopād aśeṣāṇāṃ rākṣasānāṃ tathā vadhaḥ 4.055.015c kaikeyyā varadānena idaṃ hi vikṛtaṃ kṛtam
GE09ram_04_u:2282: 4.055.016a tat tu śrutvā tadā vākyam aṅgadasya mukhodgatam
GE09ram_04_u:2283: 4.055.016c abravīd vacanaṃ gṛdhras tīkṣṇatuṇḍo mahāsvanaḥ 4.055.017a ko 'yaṃ girā ghoṣayati prāṇaiḥ priyatarasya me 4.055.017c jaṭāyuṣo vadhaṃ bhrātuḥ kampayann iva me manaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2284: 4.055.018a katham āsīj janasthāne yuddhaṃ rākṣasagṛdhrayoḥ 4.055.018c nāmadheyam idaṃ bhrātuś cirasyādya mayā śrutam
GE09ram_04_u:2286: 4.055.019c tad iccheyam ahaṃ śrotuṃ vināśaṃ vānararṣabhāḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2288: 4.055.020c tasyaiva ca mama bhrātuḥ sakhā daśarathaḥ katham
GE09ram_04_u:2289: 4.055.020e yasya rāmaḥ priyaḥ putro jyeṣṭho gurujanapriyaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2291: 4.055.021c iccheyaṃ parvatād asmād avatartum ariṃdamāḥ 4.056.001a śokād bhraṣṭasvaram api śrutvā te hariyūthapāḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2292: 4.056.001c śraddadhur naiva tad vākyaṃ karmaṇā tasya śaṅkitāḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2293: 4.056.002a te prāyam upaviṣṭās tu dṛṣṭvā gṛdhraṃ plavaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2294: 4.056.002c cakrur buddhiṃ tadā raudrāṃ sarvān no bhakṣayiṣyati
GE09ram_04_u:2295: 4.056.003a sarvathā prāyam āsīnān yadi no bhakṣayiṣyati
GE09ram_04_u:2296: 4.056.003c kṛtakṛtyā bhaviṣyāmaḥ kṣipraṃ siddhim ito gatāḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2297: 4.056.004a etāṃ buddhiṃ tataś cakruḥ sarve te vānararṣabhāḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2298: 4.056.004c avatārya gireḥ śṛṅgād gṛdhram āhāṅgadas tadā
GE09ram_04_u:2299: 4.056.005a babhūvur kṣarajo nāma vānarendraḥ pratāpavān 4.056.005c mamāryaḥ pārthivaḥ pakṣin dhārmikau tasya cātmajau
GE09ram_04_u:2300: 4.056.006a sugrīvaś caiva valī ca putrāv oghabalāv ubhau
GE09ram_04_u:2301: 4.056.006c loke viśrutakarmābhūd rājā vālī pitā mama
GE09ram_04_u:2302: 4.056.007a rājā kṛtsnasya jagata ikṣvākūṇāṃ mahārathaḥ 4.056.007c rāmo dāśarathiḥ śrīmān praviṣṭo daṇḍakāvanam 4.056.008a lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā vaidehyā cāpi bhāryayā
GE09ram_04_u:2303: 4.056.008c pitur nideśanirato dharmyaṃ panthānam āśritaḥ 4.056.008e tasya bhāryā janasthānād rāvaṇena hṛtā balāt
GE09ram_04_u:2304: 4.056.009a rāmasya ca pitur mitraṃ jaṭāyur nāma gṛdhrarāṭ
GE09ram_04_u:2305: 4.056.009c dadarśa sītāṃ vaidehīṃ hriyamāṇāṃ vihāyasā 4.056.010a rāvaṇaṃ virathaṃ kṛtvā sthāpayitvā ca maithilīm
GE09ram_04_u:2306: 4.056.010c pariśrāntaś ca vṛddhaś ca rāvaṇena hato raṇe
GE09ram_04_u:2307: 4.056.011a evaṃ gṛdhro hatas tena rāvaṇena bahīyasā
GE09ram_04_u:2308: 4.056.011c saṃskṛtaś cāpi rāmeṇa gataś ca gatim uttamām
GE09ram_04_u:2309: 4.056.012a tato mama pitṛvyeṇa sugrīveṇa mahātmanā 4.056.012c cakāra rāghavaḥ sakhyaṃ so 'vadhīt pitaraṃ mama 4.056.013a māma pitrā viruddho hi sugrīvaḥ sacivaiḥ saha
GE09ram_04_u:2310: 4.056.013c nihatya vālinaṃ rāmas tatas tam abhiṣecayat
GE09ram_04_u:2311: 4.056.014a sa rājye sthāpitas tena sugrīvo vānareśvaraḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2312: 4.056.014c rājā vānaramukhyānāṃ yena prasthāpitā vayam 4.056.015a evaṃ rāmaprayuktās tu mārgamāṇās tatas tataḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2313: 4.056.015c vaidehīṃ nādhigacchāmo rātrau sūryaprabhām iva 4.056.016a te vayaṃ daṇdakāraṇyaṃ vicitya susamāhitāḥ 4.056.016c ajñānāt tu praviṣṭāḥ sma dharaṇyā vivṛtaṃ bilam
GE09ram_04_u:2314: 4.056.017a mayasya māyā vihitaṃ tad bilaṃ ca vicinvatām
GE09ram_04_u:2315: 4.056.017c vyatītas tatra no māso yo rājñā sāmayaḥ kṛtaḥ 4.056.018a te vayaṃ kapirājasya sarve vacanakāriṇaḥ 4.056.018c kṛtāṃ saṃsthām atikrāntā bhayāt prāyam upāsmahe
GE09ram_04_u:2316: 4.056.019a kruddhe tasmiṃs tu kākutsthe sugrīve ca salakṣmaṇe
GE09ram_04_u:2317: 4.056.019c gatānām api sarveṣāṃ tatra no nāsti jīvitam
GE09ram_04_u:2318: 4.057.001a ity uktaḥ karuṇaṃ vākyaṃ vānarais tyaktajīvitaiḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2319: 4.057.001c sabāṣpo vānarān gṛdhraḥ pratyuvāca mahāsvanaḥ 4.057.002a yavīyān mama sa bhrātā jaṭāyur nāma vānarāḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2320: 4.057.002c yamākhyāta hataṃ yuddhe rāvaṇena balīyasā 4.057.003a vṛddhabhāvād apakṣatvāc chṛṇvaṃs tad api marṣaye
GE09ram_04_u:2321: 4.057.003c na hi me śaktir adyāsti bhrātur vairavimokṣaṇe
GE09ram_04_u:2322: 4.057.004a purā vṛtravadhe vṛtte sa cāhaṃ ca jayaiṣiṇau
GE09ram_04_u:2323: 4.057.004c ādityam upayātau svo jvalantaṃ raśmimālinam 4.057.005a āvṛtyākāśamārgeṇa javena sma gatau bhṛśam 4.057.005c madhyaṃ prāpte ca sūrye ca jaṭāyur avasīdati
GE09ram_04_u:2324: 4.057.006a tam ahaṃ bhrātaraṃ dṛṣṭvā sūryaraśmibhir arditam
GE09ram_04_u:2325: 4.057.006c pakṣābhyaṃ chādayām āsa snehāt paramavihvalam 4.057.007a nirdagdhapakṣaḥ patito vindhye 'haṃ vānarottamāḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2326: 4.057.007c aham asmin vasan bhrātuḥ pravṛttiṃ nopalakṣaye
GE09ram_04_u:2327: 4.057.008a jaṭāyuṣas tv evam ukto bhrātrā saṃpātinā tadā
GE09ram_04_u:2329: 4.057.009a jaṭāyuṣo yadi bhrātā śrutaṃ te gaditaṃ mayā
GE09ram_04_u:2330: 4.057.009c ākhyāhi yadi jānāsi nilayaṃ tasya rakṣasaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2331: 4.057.010a adīrghadarśinaṃ taṃ vā rāvaṇaṃ rākṣasādhipam 4.057.010c antike yadi vā dūre yadi jānāsi śaṃsa naḥ 4.057.011a tato 'bravīn mahātejā jyeṣṭho bhrātā jaṭāyuṣaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2333: 4.057.012a nirdagdhapakṣo gṛdhro 'haṃ gatavīryaḥ plavaṃgamāḥ 4.057.012c vāṅmātreṇa tu rāmasya kariṣye sāhyam uttamam
GE09ram_04_u:2334: 4.057.013a jānāmi vāruṇāl lokān viṣṇos traivikramān api
GE09ram_04_u:2335: 4.057.013c devāsuravimardāṃś ca amṛtasya ca manthanam 4.057.014a rāmasya yad idaṃ kāryaṃ kartavyaṃ prathamaṃ mayā
GE09ram_04_u:2336: 4.057.014c jarayā ca hṛtaṃ tejaḥ prāṇāś ca śithilā mama 4.057.015a taruṇī rūpasaṃpannā
GE09ram_04_u:2337: 4.057.015c hriyamāṇā mayā dṛṣṭā rāvaṇena durātmanā 4.057.016a krośantī rāma rāmeti lakṣmaṇeti ca bhāminī
GE09ram_04_u:2338: 4.057.016c bhūṣaṇāny apavidhyantī gātrāṇi ca vidhunvatī 4.057.017a sūryaprabheva śailāgre tasyāḥ kauśeyam uttamam 4.057.017c asite rākṣase bhāti yathā vā taḍidambude
GE09ram_04_u:2339: 4.057.018a tāṃ tu sītām ahaṃ manye rāmasya parikīrtanāt
GE09ram_04_u:2340: 4.057.018c śrūyatāṃ me kathayato nilayaṃ tasya rakṣasaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2341: 4.057.019a putro viśravasaḥ sākṣād bhrātā vaiśravaṇasya ca
GE09ram_04_u:2342: 4.057.019c adhyāste nagarīṃ laṅkāṃ rāvaṇo nāma rākasaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2343: 4.057.020a ito dvīpe samudrasya saṃpūrṇe śatayojane 4.057.020c tasmiṃl laṅkā purī ramyā nirmitā viśvakarmaṇā
GE09ram_04_u:2344: 4.057.021a tasyāṃ vasati vaidehī dīnā kauśeyavāsinī 4.057.021c rāvaṇāntaḥpure ruddhā rākṣasībhiḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2345: 4.057.022a janakasyātmajāṃ rājñas tasyāṃ drakṣyatha maithilīm 4.057.022c laṅkāyām atha guptāyāṃ sāgareṇa samantataḥ 4.057.023a saṃprāpya sāgarasyāntaṃ saṃpūrṇaṃ śatayojanam
GE09ram_04_u:2346: 4.057.023c āsādya dakṣiṇaṃ kūlaṃ tato drakṣyatha rāvaṇam
GE09ram_04_u:2347: 4.057.024a tatraiva tvaritāḥ kṣipraṃ vikramadhvaṃ plavaṃgamāḥ 4.057.024c jñānena khalu paśyāmi dṛṣṭvā pratyāgamiṣyatha 4.057.025a ādyaḥ panthāḥ kuliṅgānāṃ ye cānye dhānyajīvinaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2348: 4.057.025c dvitīyo balibhojānāṃ ye ca vṛkṣaphalāśinaḥ 4.057.026a bhāsās tṛtīyaṃ gacchanti krauñcāś ca kuraraiḥ saha
GE09ram_04_u:2349: 4.057.026c śyenāś caturthaṃ gacchanti gṛdhrā gacchanti pañcamam
GE09ram_04_u:2350: 4.057.027a balavīryopapannānāṃ rūpayauvanaśālinām 4.057.027c ṣaṣṭhas tu panthā haṃsānāṃ vainateyagatiḥ parā
GE09ram_04_u:2351: 4.057.027e vainateyāc ca no janma sarveṣāṃ vānararṣabhāḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2352: 4.057.028a garhitaṃ tu kṛtaṃ karma yena sma piśitāśanāḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2354: 4.057.029a asmākam api sauvarṇaṃ divyaṃ cakṣurbalaṃ tathā
GE09ram_04_u:2355: 4.057.029c tasmād āhāravīryeṇa nisargeṇa ca vānarāḥ 4.057.029e āyojanaśatāt sāgrād vayaṃ paśyāma nityaśaḥ 4.057.030a asmākaṃ vihitā vṛttir nisārgeṇa ca dūrataḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2356: 4.057.030c vihitā pādamūle tu vṛttiś caraṇayodhinām 4.057.031a upāyo dṛśyatāṃ kaś cil laṅghane
GE09ram_04_u:2357: 4.057.031c abhigamya tu vaidehīṃ samṛddhārthā gamiṣyatha 4.057.032a samudraṃ netum icchāmi bhavadbhir varuṇālayam 4.057.032c pradāsyāmy udakaṃ bhrātuḥ svargatasya mahātmanaḥ 4.057.033a tato nītvā tu taṃ deśaṃ tīre nadanadīpateḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2359: 4.057.034a punaḥ pratyānayitvā vai taṃ deśaṃ patageśvaram
GE09ram_04_u:2360: 4.057.034c babhūvur vānarā hṛṣṭāḥ pravṛttim upalabhya te
GE09ram_04_u:2361: 4.058.001a tatas tad amṛtāsvādaṃ gṛdhrarājena bhāṣitam 4.058.001c niśamya vadato hṛṣṭās te vacaḥ plavagarṣabhāḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2362: 4.058.002a jāmbavān vai hariśreṣṭhaḥ saha sarvaiḥ plavaṃgamaiḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2364: 4.058.003a kva sītā kena vā dṛṣṭā ko vā harati maithilīm
GE09ram_04_u:2365: 4.058.003c tad ākhyātu bhavān sarvaṃ gatir bhava vanaukasām
GE09ram_04_u:2367: 4.058.004c svayaṃ lakṣmaṇam uktānāṃ na cintayati vikramam
GE09ram_04_u:2368: 4.058.005a sa harīn prītisaṃyuktān sītā śrutisamāhitān 4.058.005c punar āśvāsayan prīta idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_04_u:2369: 4.058.006a śrūyatām iha vaidehyā yathā me haraṇaṃ śrutam
GE09ram_04_u:2370: 4.058.006c yena cāpi mamākhyātaṃ yatra cāyatalocanā 4.058.007a aham asmin girau durge bahuyojanam
GE09ram_04_u:2372: 4.058.008a taṃ mām evaṃgataṃ putraḥ supārśvo nāma nāmataḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2373: 4.058.008c āhāreṇa yathākālaṃ bibharti patatāṃ varaḥ 4.058.009a tīkṣṇakāmās tu gandharvās tīkṣṇakopā bhujaṃgamāḥ 4.058.009c mṛgāṇāṃ tu bhayaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ tatas tīkṣṇakṣudhā vayam
GE09ram_04_u:2374: 4.058.010a sa kadā cit kṣudhārtasya mama cāhārakāṅkṣiṇaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2375: 4.058.010c gatasūryo 'hani prāpto mama putro hy anāmiṣaḥ 4.058.011a sa mayā vṛddhabhāvāc ca kopāc ca paribhartsitaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2376: 4.058.011c kṣutpipāsā parītena kumāraḥ patatāṃ varaḥ 4.058.012a sa mamāhārasaṃrodhāt pīḍitaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2377: 4.058.012c anumānya yathātattvam idaṃ vacanam abravīt 4.058.013a ahaṃ tāta yathākālam āmiṣārthī kham āplutaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2378: 4.058.013c mahendrasya girer dvāram āvṛtya ca samāsthitaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2380: 4.058.014c panthānam eko 'dhyavasaṃ saṃniroddhum avāṅmukhaḥ 4.058.015a tatra kaś cin mayā dṛṣṭaḥ sūryodayasamaprabhām
GE09ram_04_u:2381: 4.058.015c striyam ādāya gacchan vai bhinnāñjanacayopamaḥ 4.058.016a so 'ham abhyavahārārthī tau dṛṣṭvā kṛtaniścayaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2382: 4.058.016c tena sāmnā vinītena panthānam abhiyācitaḥ 4.058.017a na hi sāmopapannānāṃ prahartā vidyate kva cit
GE09ram_04_u:2383: 4.058.017c nīceṣv api janaḥ kaś cit kim aṅga bata madvidhaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2384: 4.058.018a sa yātas tejasā vyoma saṃkṣipann iva vegataḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2385: 4.058.018c athāhaṃ khe carair bhūtair abhigamya sabhājitaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2386: 4.058.019a diṣṭyā jīvasi tāteti abruvan māṃ maharṣayaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2387: 4.058.019c kathaṃ cit sakalatro 'sau gatas te svasty asaṃśayam
GE09ram_04_u:2388: 4.058.020a evam uktas tato 'haṃ taiḥ siddhaiḥ paramaśobhanaiḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2389: 4.058.020c sa ca me rāvaṇo rājā rakṣasāṃ prativeditaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2390: 4.058.021a haran dāśarather bhāryāṃ rāmasya janakātmajām 4.058.021c bhraṣṭābharaṇakauśeyāṃ śokavegaparājitām 4.058.022a rāmalakṣmaṇayor nāma krośantīṃ muktamūrdhajām
GE09ram_04_u:2391: 4.058.022c eṣa kālātyayas tāvad iti vākyavidāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2392: 4.058.023a etam arthaṃ samagraṃ me supārśvaḥ pratyavedayat
GE09ram_04_u:2393: 4.058.023c tac chrutvāpi hi me buddhir nāsīt kā cit parākrame
GE09ram_04_u:2394: 4.058.024a apakṣo hi kathaṃ pakṣī karma kiṃ cid upakramet 4.058.024c yat tu śakyaṃ mayā kartuṃ vāgbuddhiguṇavartinā
GE09ram_04_u:2395: 4.058.025a śrūyatāṃ tat pravakṣyāmi bhavatāṃ pauruṣāśrayam 4.058.025c vāṅmatibhyāṃ hi sārveṣāṃ kariṣyāmi priyaṃ hi vaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2396: 4.058.025e yad dhi dāśaratheḥ kāryaṃ mama tan nātra saṃśayaḥ 4.058.026a te bhavanto matiśreṣṭhā balavanto manasvinaḥ 4.058.026c sahitāḥ kapirājena devair api durāsadāḥ 4.058.027a rāmalakṣmaṇabāṇāś ca niśitāḥ kaṅkapatriṇaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2397: 4.058.027c trayāṇām api lokānāṃ paryāptās trāṇanigrahe 4.058.028a kāmaṃ khalu daśagrīvas
GE09ram_04_u:2398: 4.058.028c bhavatāṃ tu samarthānāṃ na kiṃ cid api duṣkaram 4.058.029a tad alaṃ kālasaṃgena kriyatāṃ buddhiniścayaḥ 4.058.029c na hi karmasu sajjante buddhimanto bhavadvidhāḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2399: 4.059.001a tataḥ kṛtodakaṃ snātaṃ taṃ gṛdhraṃ hariyūthapāḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2400: 4.059.001c upaviṣṭā girau durge parivārya samantataḥ 4.059.002a tam aṅgadam upāsīnaṃ taiḥ sarvair haribhir vṛtam
GE09ram_04_u:2401: 4.059.002c janitapratyayo harṣāt saṃpātiḥ punar abravīt 4.059.003a kṛtvā niḥśabdam ekāgrāḥ śṛṇvantu harayo mama
GE09ram_04_u:2402: 4.059.003c tattvaṃ saṃkīrtayiṣyāmi yathā jānāmi maithilīm 4.059.004a asya vindhyasya śikhare patito 'smi purā vane 4.059.004c sūryātapaparītāṅgo nirdagdhaḥ sūryaraśmibhiḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2403: 4.059.005a labdhasaṃjñas tu ṣaḍrātrād vivaśo vihvalann iva
GE09ram_04_u:2404: 4.059.005c vīkṣamāṇo diśaḥ sarvā nābhijānāmi kiṃ cana
GE09ram_04_u:2405: 4.059.006a tatas tu sāgarāñ śailān nadīḥ sarvāḥ sarāṃsi ca 4.059.006c vanāny aṭavideśāṃś ca samīkṣya matir āgamat
GE09ram_04_u:2406: 4.059.007a hṛṣṭapakṣigaṇākīrṇaḥ kandarāntarakūṭavān 4.059.007c dakṣiṇasyodadhes tīre vindhyo 'yam iti niścitaḥ 4.059.008a āsīc cātrāśramaṃ puṇyaṃ surair api supūjitam
GE09ram_04_u:2407: 4.059.008c ṛṣir niśākaro nāma yasminn ugratapābhavat 4.059.009a aṣṭau varṣasahasrāṇi tenāsminn ṛṣiṇā vinā 4.059.009c vasato mama dharmajñāḥ svargate tu niśākare
GE09ram_04_u:2408: 4.059.010a avatīrya ca vindhyāgrāt kṛcchreṇa viṣamāc chanaiḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2409: 4.059.010c tīkṣṇadarbhāṃ vasumatīṃ duḥkhena punar āgataḥ 4.059.011a tam ṛṣiṃ draṣṭu kāmo 'smi duḥkhenābhyāgato bhṛśam 4.059.011c jaṭāyuṣā mayā caiva bahuśo 'bhigato hi saḥ 4.059.012a tasyāśramapadābhyāśe vavur vātāḥ sugandhinaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2410: 4.059.012c vṛkṣo nāpuṣpitaḥ kaś cid aphalo vā na dṛśyate 4.059.013a upetya cāśramaṃ puṇyaṃ vṛkṣamūlam upāśritaḥ 4.059.013c draṣṭukāmaḥ pratīkṣe ca bhagavantaṃ niśākaram 4.059.014a athāpaśyam adūrastham ṛṣiṃ jvalitatejasaṃ
GE09ram_04_u:2412: 4.059.015a tam ṛkṣāḥ sṛmarā vyāghrāḥ siṃhā nāgāḥ sarīsṛpāḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2414: 4.059.016a tataḥ prāptam ṛṣiṃ jñātvā tāni sattvāni vai yayuḥ 4.059.016c praviṣṭe rājani yathā sarvaṃ sāmātyakaṃ balam
GE09ram_04_u:2415: 4.059.017a ṛṣis tu dṛṣṭvā māṃ tuṣṭaḥ praviṣṭaś cāśramaṃ punaḥ 4.059.017c muhūrtamātrān niṣkramya tataḥ kāryam apṛcchata 4.059.018a saumya vaikalyatāṃ dṛṣṭvā roṃṇāṃ te nāvagamyate
GE09ram_04_u:2416: 4.059.018c agnidagdhāv imau pakṣau tvak caiva vraṇitā tava
GE09ram_04_u:2417: 4.059.019a dvau gṛdhrau dṛṣṭapūrvau me mātariśvasamau jave
GE09ram_04_u:2418: 4.059.019c gṛdhrāṇāṃ caiva rājānau bhrātarau kāmarūpiṇau 4.059.020a jyeṣṭhas tvaṃ tu ca saṃpātir jaṭāyur anujas tava 4.059.020c mānuṣaṃ rūpam āsthāya gṛhṇītāṃ caraṇau mama
GE09ram_04_u:2419: 4.059.021a kiṃ te vyādhisamutthānaṃ pakṣayoḥ patanaṃ katham
GE09ram_04_u:2420: 4.059.021c daṇḍo vāyaṃ dhṛtaḥ kena sarvam ākhyāhi pṛcchataḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2421: 4.060.001a tatas tad dāruṇaṃ karma duṣkaraṃ sāhasāt kṛtam
GE09ram_04_u:2422: 4.060.001c ācacakṣe muneḥ sarvaṃ sūryānugamanaṃ tathā 4.060.002a bhagavan vraṇayuktatvāl lajjayā cākulendriyaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2423: 4.060.002c pariśrānto na śaknomi vacanaṃ paribhāṣitum 4.060.003a ahaṃ caiva jaṭāyuś ca saṃgharṣād darpamohitau
GE09ram_04_u:2424: 4.060.003c ākāśaṃ patitau vīrau jighāsantau parākramam 4.060.004a kailāsaśikhare baddhvā munīnām agrataḥ paṇam 4.060.004c raviḥ syād anuyātavyo yāvad astaṃ mahāgirim
GE09ram_04_u:2425: 4.060.005a athāvāṃ yugapat prāptāv apaśyāva mahītale 4.060.005c rathacakrapramāṇāni nagarāṇi pṛthak pṛthak
GE09ram_04_u:2426: 4.060.006a kva cid vāditraghoṣāṃś ca brahmaghoṣāṃś ca śuśruva
GE09ram_04_u:2427: 4.060.006c gāyantīś cāṅganā bahvīḥ paśyāvo raktavāsasaḥ 4.060.007a tūrṇam utpatya cākāśam ādityapatham āsthitau 4.060.007c āvām ālokayāvas tad vanaṃ śādvalasaṃsthitam 4.060.008a upalair iva saṃchannā dṛśyate bhūḥ śiloccayaiḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2428: 4.060.008c āpagābhiś ca saṃvītā sūtrair iva vasuṃdharā
GE09ram_04_u:2429: 4.060.009a himavāṃś caiva vindhyaś ca meruś ca sumahān nagaḥ 4.060.009c bhūtale saṃprakāśante nāgā iva jalāśaye 4.060.010a tīvrasvedaś ca khedaś ca bhayaṃ cāsīt tadāvayoḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2430: 4.060.010c samāviśata mohaś ca mohān mūrchā ca dāruṇā
GE09ram_04_u:2431: 4.060.011a na dig vijñāyate yāmyā nāgenyā na ca vāruṇī 4.060.011c yugānte niyato loko hato dagdha ivāgninā
GE09ram_04_u:2432: 4.060.012a yatnena mahatā bhūyo raviḥ samavalokitaḥ 4.060.012c tulyaḥ pṛthvīpramāṇena bhāskaraḥ pratibhāti nau 4.060.013a jaṭāyur mām anāpṛcchya nipapāta mahīṃ tataḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2433: 4.060.013c taṃ dṛṣṭvā tūrṇam ākāśād ātmānaṃ muktavān aham
GE09ram_04_u:2434: 4.060.014a pakṣibhyāṃ ca mayā gupto jaṭāyur na pradahyata
GE09ram_04_u:2435: 4.060.014c pramādāt tatra nirdagdhaḥ patan vāyupathād aham
GE09ram_04_u:2436: 4.060.015a āśaṅke taṃ nipatitaṃ janasthāne jaṭāyuṣam 4.060.015c ahaṃ tu patito vindhye dagdhapakṣo jaḍīkṛtaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2437: 4.060.016a rājyena hīno bhrātrā ca pakṣābhyāṃ vikrameṇa ca
GE09ram_04_u:2438: 4.060.016c sarvathā martum evecchan patiṣye śikharād gireḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2439: 4.061.001a evam uktvā muniśreṣṭham arudaṃ duḥkhito bhṛśam
GE09ram_04_u:2440: 4.061.001c atha dhyātvā muhūrtaṃ tu bhagavān idam abravīt
GE09ram_04_u:2441: 4.061.002a pakṣau ca te prapakṣau ca punar anyau bhaviṣyataḥ 4.061.002c cakṣuṣī caiva prāṇāś ca vikramaś ca balaṃ ca te
GE09ram_04_u:2442: 4.061.003a purāṇe sumahat kāryaṃ bhaviṣyaṃ hi mayā śrutam
GE09ram_04_u:2443: 4.061.003c dṛṣṭaṃ me tapasā caiva śrutvā ca viditaṃ mama 4.061.004a rājā daśaratho nāma kaś cid ikṣvākunandanaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2444: 4.061.004c tasya putro mahātejā rāmo nāma bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_04_u:2445: 4.061.005a araṇyaṃ ca saha bhrātrā lakṣmaṇena gamiṣyati
GE09ram_04_u:2446: 4.061.005c tasminn arthe niyuktaḥ san pitrā satyaparākramaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2447: 4.061.006a nairṛto rāvaṇo nāma tasyā bhāryāṃ hariṣyati
GE09ram_04_u:2449: 4.061.007a sā ca kāmaiḥ pralobhyantī bhakṣyair bhojyaiś ca maithilī 4.061.007c na bhokṣyati mahābhāgā duḥkhamagnā yaśasvinī 4.061.008a paramānnaṃ tu vaidehyā jñātvā dāsyati vāsavaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2450: 4.061.008c yad annam amṛtaprakhyaṃ surāṇām api durlabham
GE09ram_04_u:2451: 4.061.009a tad annaṃ maithilī prāpya vijñāyendrād idaṃ tv iti 4.061.009c agram uddhṛtya rāmāya bhūtale nirvapiṣyati 4.061.010a yadi jīvati me bhartā lakṣmaṇena saha prabhuḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2452: 4.061.010c devatvaṃ gatayor vāpi tayor annam idaṃ tv iti 4.061.011a eṣyanty anveṣakās tasyā rāmadūtāḥ plavaṃgamāḥ 4.061.011c ākhyeyā rāmamahiṣī tvayā tebhyo vihaṃgama 4.061.012a sarvathā tu na gantavyam īdṛśaḥ kva gamiṣyasi
GE09ram_04_u:2453: 4.061.012c deśakālau pratīkṣasva pakṣau tvaṃ pratipatsyase 4.061.013a utsaheyam ahaṃ kartum adyaiva tvāṃ sapakṣakam
GE09ram_04_u:2454: 4.061.013c ihasthas tvaṃ tu lokānāṃ hitaṃ kāryaṃ kariṣyasi
GE09ram_04_u:2455: 4.061.014a tvayāpi khalu tat kāryaṃ tayoś ca nṛpaputrayoḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2456: 4.061.014c brāhmaṇānāṃ surāṇāṃ ca munīnāṃ vāsavasya ca
GE09ram_04_u:2457: 4.061.015a icchāmy aham api draṣṭuṃ bhrātaru rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_04_u:2458: 4.061.015c necche ciraṃ dhārayituṃ prāṇāṃs tyakṣye kalevaram
GE09ram_04_u:2459: 4.062.001a etair anyaiś ca bahubhir vākyair vākyaviśāradaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2460: 4.062.001c māṃ praśasyābhyanujñāpya praviṣṭaḥ sa svam āśramam
GE09ram_04_u:2461: 4.062.002a kandarāt tu visarpitvā parvatasya śanaiḥ śanaiḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2462: 4.062.002c ahaṃ vindhyaṃ samāruhya bhavataḥ pratipālaye 4.062.003a adya tv etasya kālasya sāgraṃ varṣaśataṃ gatam
GE09ram_04_u:2464: 4.062.004a mahāprasthānam āsādya svargate tu niśākare 4.062.004c māṃ nirdahati saṃtāpo vitarkair bahubhir vṛtam
GE09ram_04_u:2465: 4.062.005a utthitāṃ maraṇe buddhiṃ muni vākyair nivartaye
GE09ram_04_u:2466: 4.062.005c buddhir yā tena me dattā prāṇasaṃrakṣaṇāya tu
GE09ram_04_u:2468: 4.062.006a budhyatā ca mayā vīryaṃ rāvaṇasya durātmanaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2469: 4.062.006c putraḥ saṃtarjito vāgbhir na trātā maithilī katham
GE09ram_04_u:2470: 4.062.007a tasyā vilapitaṃ śrutvā tau ca sītā vinākṛtau
GE09ram_04_u:2471: 4.062.007c na me daśarathasnehāt putreṇotpāditaṃ priyam 4.062.008a tasya tv evaṃ bruvāṇasya saṃpāter vānaraiḥ saha
GE09ram_04_u:2472: 4.062.008c utpetatus tadā pakṣau samakṣaṃ vanacāriṇām 4.062.009a sa dṛṣṭvā svāṃ tanuṃ pakṣair udgatair aruṇacchadaiḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2473: 4.062.009c praharṣam atulaṃ lebhe vānarāṃś cedam abravīt
GE09ram_04_u:2475: 4.062.010c ādityaraśminirdagdhau pakṣau me punar utthitau 4.062.011a yauvane vartamānasya mamāsīd yaḥ parākramaḥ 4.062.011c tam evādyāvagacchāmi balaṃ pauruṣam eva ca
GE09ram_04_u:2476: 4.062.012a sarvathā kriyatāṃ yatnaḥ sītām adhigamiṣyatha 4.062.012c pakṣalābho mamāyaṃ vaḥ siddhipratyaya kārakaḥ 4.062.013a ity uktvā tān harīn sarvān saṃpātiḥ patatāṃ varaḥ 4.062.013c utpapāta gireḥ śṛṅgāj jijñāsuḥ khagamo gatim
GE09ram_04_u:2480: 4.062.015c abhijidabhimukhāṃ diśaṃ yayur; janakasutā parimārgaṇonmukhāḥ 4.063.001a ākhyātā gṛdhrarājena samutpatya plavaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2482: 4.063.002a saṃpāter vacanaṃ śrutvā harayo rāvaṇakṣayam 4.063.002c hṛṣṭāḥ sāgaram ājagmuḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2483: 4.063.003a abhikramya tu taṃ deśaṃ dadṛśur bhīmavikramāḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2484: 4.063.003c kṛtsnaṃ lokasya mahataḥ pratibimbam iva sthitam
GE09ram_04_u:2486: 4.063.004c saṃniveśaṃ tataś cakruḥ sahitā vānarottamāḥ 4.063.005a sattvair mahadbhir vikṛtaiḥ krīḍadbhir vividhair jale
GE09ram_04_u:2487: 4.063.005c vyāttāsyaiḥ sumahākāyair ūrmibhiś ca samākulam 4.063.006a prasuptam iva cānyatra krīḍantam iva cānyataḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2488: 4.063.006c kva cit parvatamātraiś ca jalarāśibhir āvṛtam
GE09ram_04_u:2491: 4.063.008a ākāśam iva duṣpāraṃ sāgaraṃ prekṣya vānarāḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2492: 4.063.008c viṣeduḥ sahasā sarve kathaṃ kāryam iti bruvan
GE09ram_04_u:2493: 4.063.009a viṣaṇṇāṃ vāhinīṃ dṛṣṭvā sāgarasya nirīkṣaṇāt 4.063.009c āśvāsayām āsa harīn bhayārtān harisattamaḥ 4.063.010a na niṣādena naḥ kāryaṃ viṣādo doṣavattaraḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2494: 4.063.010c viṣādo hanti puruṣaṃ bālaṃ kruddha ivoragaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2496: 4.063.011c tejasā tasya hīnasya puruṣārtho na sidhyati
GE09ram_04_u:2497: 4.063.012a tasyāṃ rātryāṃ vyatītāyām aṅgado vānaraiḥ saha
GE09ram_04_u:2498: 4.063.012c harivṛddhaiḥ samāgamya punar mantram amantrayat 4.063.013a sā vānarāṇāṃ dhvajinī parivāryāṅgadaṃ babhau 4.063.013c vāsavaṃ parivāryeva marutāṃ vāhinī sthitā 4.063.014a ko 'nyas tāṃ vānarīṃ senāṃ śaktaḥ stambhayituṃ bhavet
GE09ram_04_u:2499: 4.063.014c anyatra vālitanayād anyatra ca hanūmataḥ 4.063.015a tatas tān harivṛddhāṃś ca tac ca sainyam ariṃdamaḥ 4.063.015c anumānyāṅgadaḥ śrīmān vākyam arthavad abravīt 4.063.016a ka idānīṃ mahātejā laṅghayiṣyati sāgaram 4.063.016c kaḥ kariṣyati sugrīvaṃ satyasaṃdham ariṃdamam 4.063.017a ko vīro yojanaśataṃ laṅghayeta plavaṃgamāḥ 4.063.017c imāṃś ca yūthapān sarvān mocayet ko mahābhayāt
GE09ram_04_u:2500: 4.063.018a kasya prasādād dārāṃś ca putrāṃś caiva gṛhāṇi ca 4.063.018c ito nivṛttāḥ paśyema siddhārthāḥ sukhino vayam
GE09ram_04_u:2501: 4.063.019a kasya prasādād rāmaṃ ca lakṣmaṇaṃ ca mahābalam
GE09ram_04_u:2502: 4.063.019c abhigacchema saṃhṛṣṭāḥ sugrīvaṃ ca mahābalam 4.063.020a yadi kaś cit samartho vaḥ sāgaraplavane hariḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2503: 4.063.020c sa dadātv iha naḥ śīghraṃ puṇyām abhayadakṣiṇām
GE09ram_04_u:2504: 4.063.021a aṅgadasya vacaḥ śrutvā na kaś cit kiṃ cid abravīt
GE09ram_04_u:2505: 4.063.021c stimitevābhavat sarvā sā tatra harivāhinī 4.063.022a punar evāṅgadaḥ prāha tān harīn harisattamaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2506: 4.063.022c sarve balavatāṃ śreṣṭhā bhavanto dṛḍhavikramāḥ 4.063.023a vyapadeśya kule jātāḥ pūjitāś cāpy abhīkṣṇaśaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2507: 4.063.023c na hi vo gamane saṃgaḥ kadā cid api kasya cit
GE09ram_04_u:2508: 4.063.024a bruvadhvaṃ yasya yā śaktir gamane plavagarṣabhāḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2510: 4.064.001c svaṃ svaṃ gatau samutsāham āhus tatra yathākramam
GE09ram_04_u:2511: 4.064.002a gajo gavākṣo gavayaḥ śarabho gandhamādanaḥ 4.064.002c maindaś ca dvividaś caiva suṣeṇo jāmbavāṃs tathā
GE09ram_04_u:2512: 4.064.003a ābabhāṣe gajas tatra plaveyaṃ daśayojanam 4.064.003c gavākṣo yojanāny āha gamiṣyāmīti viṃśatim 4.064.004a gavayo vānaras tatra vānarāṃs tān uvāca ha
GE09ram_04_u:2513: 4.064.004c triṃśataṃ tu gamiṣyāmi yojanānāṃ plavaṃgamāḥ 4.064.005a śarabho vānaras tatra vānarāṃs tān uvāca ha
GE09ram_04_u:2514: 4.064.005c catvāriṃśad gamiṣyāmi yojanānāṃ na saṃśayaḥ 4.064.006a vānarāṃs tu mahātejā abravīd gandhamādanaḥ 4.064.006c yojanānāṃ gamiṣyāmi pañcāśat tu na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2515: 4.064.007a maindas tu vānaras tatra vānarāṃs tān uvāca ha 4.064.007c yojanānāṃ paraṃ ṣaṣṭim ahaṃ plavitum utsahe
GE09ram_04_u:2516: 4.064.008a tatas tatra mahātejā dvividaḥ pratyabhāṣata 4.064.008c gamiṣyāmi na saṃdehaḥ saptatiṃ yojanāny aham
GE09ram_04_u:2517: 4.064.009a suṣeṇas tu hariśreṣṭhaḥ proktavān kapisattamān 4.064.009c aśītiṃ yojanānāṃ tu plaveyaṃ plavagarṣabhāḥ 4.064.010a teṣāṃ kathayatāṃ tatra sarvāṃs tān anumānya ca
GE09ram_04_u:2518: 4.064.010c tato vṛddhatamas teṣāṃ jāmbavān pratyabhāṣata 4.064.011a pūrvam asmākam apy āsīt kaś cid gatiparākramaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2519: 4.064.011c te vayaṃ vayasaḥ pāram anuprāptāḥ sma sāmpratam
GE09ram_04_u:2520: 4.064.012a kiṃ tu naivaṃ gate śakyam idaṃ kāryam upekṣitum 4.064.012c yad arthaṃ kapirājaś ca rāmaś ca kṛtaniścayau
GE09ram_04_u:2521: 4.064.013a sāmprataṃ kālabhedena yā gatis tāṃ nibodhata
GE09ram_04_u:2522: 4.064.013c navatiṃ yojanānāṃ tu gamiṣyāmi na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2523: 4.064.014a tāṃś ca sarvān hariśreṣṭhāñ jāmbavān punar abravīt
GE09ram_04_u:2524: 4.064.014c na khalv etāvad evāsīd gamane me parākramaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2525: 4.064.015a mayā mahābalaiś caiva yajñe viṣṇuḥ sanātanaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2527: 4.064.016a sa idānīm ahaṃ vṛddhaḥ plavane mandavikramaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2528: 4.064.016c yauvane ca tadāsīn me balam apratimaṃ paraiḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2529: 4.064.017a saṃpraty etāvatīṃ śaktiṃ gamane tarkayāmy aham
GE09ram_04_u:2530: 4.064.017c naitāvatā ca saṃsiddhiḥ kāryasyāsya bhaviṣyati 4.064.018a athottaram udārārtham abravīd aṅgadas tadā 4.064.018c anumānya mahāprājño jāmbavantaṃ mahākapim
GE09ram_04_u:2531: 4.064.019a aham etad gamiṣyāmi yojanānāṃ śataṃ mahat
GE09ram_04_u:2532: 4.064.019c nivartane tu me śaktiḥ syān na veti na niścitam
GE09ram_04_u:2533: 4.064.020a tam uvāca hariśreṣṭho jāmbavān vākyakovidaḥ 4.064.020c jñāyate gamane śaktis tava haryṛkṣasattama 4.064.021a kāmaṃ śatasahasraṃ vā na hy eṣa vidhir ucyate 4.064.021c yojanānāṃ bhavāñ śakto gantuṃ pratinivartitum 4.064.022a na hi preṣayitā tata svāmī preṣyaḥ kathaṃ cana 4.064.022c bhavatāyaṃ janaḥ sarvaḥ preṣyaḥ plavagasattama 4.064.023a bhavān kalatram asmākaṃ svāmibhāve vyavasthitaḥ 4.064.023c svāmī kalatraṃ sainyasya gatir eṣā paraṃtapa
GE09ram_04_u:2534: 4.064.024a tasmāt kalatravat tāta pratipālyaḥ sadā bhavān
GE09ram_04_u:2535: 4.064.024c api caitasya kāryasya bhavān mūlam ariṃdama
GE09ram_04_u:2536: 4.064.025a mūlam arthasya saṃrakṣyam eṣa kāryavidāṃ nayaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2537: 4.064.025c mūle hi sati sidhyanti guṇāḥ puṣpaphalādayaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2538: 4.064.026a tad bhavān asyā kāryasya sādhane satyavikramaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2540: 4.064.027a guruś ca guruputraś ca tvaṃ hi naḥ kapisattama 4.064.027c bhavantam āśritya vayaṃ samarthā hy arthasādhane
GE09ram_04_u:2543: 4.064.029a yadi nāhaṃ gamiṣyāmi nānyo vānarapuṃgavaḥ 4.064.029c punaḥ khalv idam asmābhiḥ kāryaṃ prāyopaveśanam
GE09ram_04_u:2544: 4.064.030a na hy akṛtvā haripateḥ saṃdeśaṃ tasya dhīmataḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2545: 4.064.030c tatrāpi gatvā prāṇānāṃ paśyāmi parirakṣaṇam 4.064.031a sa hi prasāde cātyarthaṃ kope ca harir īśvaraḥ 4.064.031c atītya tasya saṃdeśaṃ vināśo gamane bhavet
GE09ram_04_u:2546: 4.064.032a tad yathā hy asya kāryasya na bhavaty anyathā gatiḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2547: 4.064.032c tad bhavān eva dṛṣṭārthaḥ saṃcintayitum arhati
GE09ram_04_u:2550: 4.064.034a asya te vīra kāryasya na kiṃ cit parihīyate 4.064.034c eṣa saṃcodayāmy enaṃ yaḥ kāryaṃ sādhayiṣyati
GE09ram_04_u:2551: 4.064.035a tataḥ pratītaṃ plavatāṃ variṣṭham; ekāntam āśritya sukhopaviṣṭam
GE09ram_04_u:2552: 4.064.035c saṃcodayām āsa haripravīro; haripravīraṃ hanumantam eva
GE09ram_04_u:2556: 4.065.002c tūṣṇīm ekāntam āśritya hanuman kiṃ na jalpasi
GE09ram_04_u:2557: 4.065.003a hanuman harirājasya sugrīvasya samo hy asi
GE09ram_04_u:2558: 4.065.003c rāmalakṣmaṇayoś cāpi tejasā ca balena ca
GE09ram_04_u:2560: 4.065.004c garutmān iva vikhyāta uttamaḥ sarvapakṣiṇām 4.065.005a bahuśo hi mayā dṛṣṭaḥ sāgare sa mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2561: 4.065.005c bhujagān uddharan pakṣī mahāvego mahāyaśāḥ 4.065.006a pakṣayor yad balaṃ tasya tāvad bhujabalaṃ tava
GE09ram_04_u:2562: 4.065.006c vikramaś cāpi vegaś ca na te tenāpahīyate
GE09ram_04_u:2563: 4.065.007a balaṃ buddhiś ca tejaś ca sattvaṃ ca harisattama 4.065.007c viśiṣṭaṃ sarvabhūteṣu kim ātmānaṃ na budhyase
GE09ram_04_u:2565: 4.065.008c ajñaneti parikhyātā patnī kesariṇo hareḥ 4.065.009a abhiśāpād abhūt tāta vānarī kāmarūpiṇī 4.065.009c duhitā vānarendrasya kuñjarasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2566: 4.065.010a kapitve cārusarvāṅgī kadā cit kāmarūpiṇī 4.065.010c mānuṣaṃ vigrahaṃ kṛtvā yauvanottamaśālinī
GE09ram_04_u:2568: 4.065.011c vicitramālyābharaṇā mahārhakṣaumavāsinī 4.065.012a tasyā vastraṃ viśālākṣyāḥ pītaṃ raktadaśaṃ śubham
GE09ram_04_u:2570: 4.065.013a sa dadarśa tatas tasyā vṛttāv ūrū susaṃhatau
GE09ram_04_u:2571: 4.065.013c stanau ca pīnau sahitau sujātaṃ cāru cānanam
GE09ram_04_u:2574: 4.065.015a sa tāṃ bhujābhyāṃ pīnābhyāṃ paryaṣvajata mārutaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2576: 4.065.016a sā tu tatraiva saṃbhrāntā suvṛttā vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_04_u:2577: 4.065.016c ekapatnīvratam idaṃ ko nāśayitum icchati 4.065.017a añjanāyā vacaḥ śrutvā mārutaḥ pratyabhāṣata 4.065.017c na tvāṃ hiṃsāmi suśroṇi mā bhūt te subhage bhayam
GE09ram_04_u:2578: 4.065.018a manasāsmi gato yat tvāṃ pariṣvajya yaśasvini
GE09ram_04_u:2579: 4.065.018c vīryavān buddhisaṃpannaḥ putras tava bhaviṣyati 4.065.019a abhyutthitaṃ tataḥ sūryaṃ bālo dṛṣṭvā mahāvane
GE09ram_04_u:2580: 4.065.019c phalaṃ ceti jighṛkṣus tvam utplutyābhyapato divam
GE09ram_04_u:2581: 4.065.020a śatāni trīṇi gatvātha yojanānāṃ mahākape 4.065.020c tejasā tasya nirdhūto na viṣādaṃ tato gataḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2582: 4.065.021a tāvad āpatatas tūrṇam antarikṣaṃ mahākape 4.065.021c kṣiptam indreṇa te vajraṃ krodhāviṣṭena dhīmatā
GE09ram_04_u:2583: 4.065.022a tataḥ śailāgraśikhare vāmo hanur abhajyata 4.065.022c tato hi nāmadheyaṃ te hanumān iti kīrtyate
GE09ram_04_u:2584: 4.065.023a tatas tvāṃ nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā vāyur gandhavahaḥ svayam
GE09ram_04_u:2585: 4.065.023c trailokye bhṛśasaṃkruddho na vavau vai prabhañjanaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2586: 4.065.024a saṃbhrāntāś ca surāḥ sarve trailokye kṣubhite sati
GE09ram_04_u:2588: 4.065.025a prasādite ca pavane brahmā tubhyaṃ varaṃ dadau
GE09ram_04_u:2590: 4.065.026a vajrasya ca nipātena virujaṃ tvāṃ samīkṣya ca
GE09ram_04_u:2591: 4.065.026c sahasranetraḥ prītātmā dadau te varam uttamam
GE09ram_04_u:2592: 4.065.027a svacchandataś ca maraṇaṃ te bhūyād iti vai prabho 4.065.027c sa tvaṃ kesariṇaḥ putraḥ kṣetrajo bhīmavikramaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2593: 4.065.028a mārutasyaurasaḥ putras tejasā cāpi tatsamaḥ 4.065.028c tvaṃ hi vāyusuto vatsa plavane cāpi tatsamaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2594: 4.065.029a vayam adya gataprāṇā bhavān asmāsu sāmpratam
GE09ram_04_u:2597: 4.065.030c triḥ saptakṛtvaḥ pṛthivī parikrāntā pradakṣiṇam 4.065.031a tadā cauṣadhayo 'smābhiḥ saṃcitā devaśāsanāt 4.065.031c niṣpannam amṛtaṃ yābhis tadāsīn no mahad balam
GE09ram_04_u:2598: 4.065.032a sa idānīm ahaṃ vṛddhaḥ parihīnaparākramaḥ 4.065.032c sāmprataṃ kālam asmākaṃ bhavān sarvaguṇānvitaḥ 4.065.033a tad vijṛmbhasva vikrāntaḥ plavatām uttamo hy asi
GE09ram_04_u:2601: 4.065.034c parā hi sarvabhūtānāṃ hanuman yā gatis tava
GE09ram_04_u:2602: 4.065.035a viṣāṇṇā harayaḥ sarve hanuman kim upekṣase
GE09ram_04_u:2603: 4.065.035c vikramasva mahāvego viṣṇus trīn vikramān iva
GE09ram_04_u:2604: 4.065.036a tatas tu vai jāmbavatābhicoditaḥ; pratītavegaḥ pavanātmajaḥ kapiḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2605: 4.065.036c praharṣayaṃs tāṃ harivīra vāhinīṃ; cakāra rūpaṃ mahad ātmanas tadā 4.066.001a saṃstūyamāno hanumān vyavardhata mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2606: 4.066.001c samāvidhya ca lāṅgūlaṃ harṣāc ca balam eyivān
GE09ram_04_u:2609: 4.066.003a yathā vijṛmbhate siṃho vivṛddho girigahvare 4.066.003c mārutasyaurasaḥ putras tathā saṃprati jṛmbhate 4.066.004a aśobhata mukhaṃ tasya jṛmbhamāṇasya dhīmataḥ 4.066.004c ambarīṣopamaṃ dīptaṃ vidhūma iva pāvakaḥ 4.066.005a harīṇām utthito madhyāt saṃprahṛṣṭatanūruhaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2610: 4.066.005c abhivādya harīn vṛddhān hanumān idam abravīt
GE09ram_04_u:2612: 4.066.006c balavān aprameyaś ca vāyur ākāśagocaraḥ 4.066.007a tasyāhaṃ śīghravegasya śīghragasya
GE09ram_04_u:2613: 4.066.007c mārutasyaurasaḥ putraḥ plavane nāsti me samaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2614: 4.066.008a utsaheyaṃ hi vistīrṇam ālikhantam ivāmbaram 4.066.008c meruṃ girim asaṃgena parigantuṃ sahasraśaḥ 4.066.009a bāhuvegapraṇunnena sāgareṇāham utsahe
GE09ram_04_u:2619: 4.066.011c vainateyam ahaṃ śaktaḥ parigantuṃ sahasraśaḥ 4.066.012a udayāt prasthitaṃ vāpi jvalantaṃ raśmimālinam 4.066.012c anastamitam ādityam abhigantuṃ samutsahe
GE09ram_04_u:2620: 4.066.013a tato bhūmim asaṃspṛśya punar āgantum utsahe
GE09ram_04_u:2626: 4.066.016a latānāṃ vīrudhāṃ puṣpaṃ pādapānāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2627: 4.066.016c anuyāsyati mām adya plavamānaṃ vihāyasā 4.066.016e bhaviṣyati hi me panthāḥ svāteḥ panthā ivāmbare
GE09ram_04_u:2628: 4.066.017a carantaṃ ghoram ākāśam utpatiṣyantam eva ca
GE09ram_04_u:2629: 4.066.017c drakṣyanti nipatantaṃ ca sarvabhūtāni vānarāḥ 4.066.018a mahāmerupratīkāśaṃ māṃ drakṣyadhvaṃ plavaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2630: 4.066.018c divam āvṛtya gacchantaṃ grasamānam ivāmbaram 4.066.019a vidhamiṣyāmi jīmūtān kampayiṣyāmi parvatān
GE09ram_04_u:2632: 4.066.020a vainateyasya vā śaktir mama vā mārutasya vā
GE09ram_04_u:2633: 4.066.020c ṛte suparṇarājānaṃ mārutaṃ vā mahābalam 4.066.020e na hi bhūtaṃ prapaśyāmi yo māṃ plutam anuvrajet 4.066.021a nimeṣāntaramātreṇa nirālambhanam ambaram
GE09ram_04_u:2634: 4.066.021c sahasā nipatiṣyāmi ghanād vidyud ivotthitā 4.066.022a bhaviṣyati hi me rūpaṃ plavamānasya sāgaram
GE09ram_04_u:2635: 4.066.022c viṣṇoḥ prakramamāṇasya tadā trīn vikramān iva
GE09ram_04_u:2636: 4.066.023a buddhyā cāhaṃ prapaśyāmi manaś ceṣṭā ca me tathā 4.066.023c ahaṃ drakṣyāmi vaidehīṃ pramodadhvaṃ plavaṃgamāḥ 4.066.024a mārutasya samo vege garuḍasya samo jave
GE09ram_04_u:2637: 4.066.024c ayutaṃ yojanānāṃ tu gamiṣyāmīti me matiḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2638: 4.066.025a vāsavasya savajrasya brahmaṇo vā svayambhuvaḥ 4.066.025c vikramya sahasā hastād amṛtaṃ tad ihānaye
GE09ram_04_u:2639: 4.066.025e laṅkāṃ vāpi samutkṣipya gaccheyam iti me matiḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2640: 4.066.026a tam evaṃ vānaraśreṣṭhaṃ garjantam amitaujasaṃ 4.066.026c uvāca parisaṃhṛṣṭo jāmbavān harisattamaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2641: 4.066.027a vīra kesariṇaḥ putra vegavan mārutātmaja 4.066.027c jñātīnāṃ vipulaṃ śokas tvayā tāta praṇāśitaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2644: 4.066.029a ṛṣīṇāṃ ca prasādena kapivṛddhamatena ca 4.066.029c gurūṇāṃ ca prasādena plavasva tvaṃ mahārṇavam
GE09ram_04_u:2646: 4.066.030c tvadgatāni ca sarveṣāṃ jīvitāni vanaukasām 4.066.031a tatas tu hariśārdūlas tān uvāca vanaukasaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2647: 4.066.031c neyaṃ mama mahī vegaṃ plavane dhārayiṣyati
GE09ram_04_u:2649: 4.066.032c śikharāṇi mahendrasya sthirāṇi ca mahānti ca
GE09ram_04_u:2650: 4.066.033a etāni mama niṣpeṣaṃ pādayoḥ patatāṃ varāḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2651: 4.066.033c plavato dhārayiṣyanti yojanānām itaḥ śatam 4.066.034a tatas tu mārutaprakhyaḥ sa harir mārutātmajaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2654: 4.066.035c latākusumasaṃbādhaṃ nityapuṣpaphaladrumam 4.066.036a siṃhaśārdūlacaritaṃ mattamātaṅgasevitam 4.066.036c mattadvijagaṇodghuṣṭaṃ salilotpīḍasaṃkulam 4.066.037a mahadbhir ucchritaṃ śṛṅgair mahendraṃ sa mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2656: 4.066.038a pādābhyāṃ pīḍitas tena mahāśailo mahātmanā 4.066.038c rarāsa siṃhābhihato mahān matta iva dvipaḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2658: 4.066.039c vitrastamṛgamātaṅgaḥ prakampitamahādrumaḥ 4.066.040a nānāgandharvamithunaiḥ pānasaṃsargakarkaśaiḥ 4.066.040c utpatadbhir vihaṃgaiś ca vidyādharagaṇair api 4.066.041a tyajyamānamahāsānuḥ saṃnilīnamahoragaḥ 4.066.041c śailaśṛṅgaśilodghātas tadābhūt sa mahāgiriḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2659: 4.066.042a niḥśvasadbhis tadā tais tu bhujagair ardhaniḥsṛtaiḥ
GE09ram_04_u:2660: 4.066.042c sapatāka ivābhāti sa tadā dharaṇīdharaḥ 4.066.043a ṛṣibhis trāsa saṃbhrāntais tyajyamānaḥ śiloccayaḥ 4.066.043c sīdan mahati kāntāre sārthahīna ivādhvagaḥ 4.066.044a sa vegavān vegasamāhitātmā; haripravīraḥ paravīrahantā 4.066.044c manaḥ samādhāya mahānubhāvo; jagāma laṅkāṃ manasā manasvī
